name: mug
example: 单词 mug 的例句||||What colour is the mug? 这个杯子是什么颜色的？|||| Place one tea bag in your favorite mug. 把茶叶袋子放在你喜欢的杯子里。

name: kettle
interpret: n.(浇水用的)水壶；水壶，水锅
example: 单词 kettle 的例句||||The kettle is boiling. 水壶里的水开了。||||She put the kettle on the gas stove. 她将水壶放在煤气炉上。

name: ferry
interpret: n.渡船，渡口；v.渡运；(越海)空运
example: 单词 ferry 的例句||||You can cross the river by ferry. 你可以搭渡船过河。||||We waited at the ferry for two hours. 我们在渡口等了两个小时。

name: shell
interpret: n.（贝、卵、坚果等的）壳；外壳；炮弹；（人的）表面性格；vt.去壳，脱落；炮击；vi.剥皮；炮轰
example: 单词 shell 的例句||||Please shell some peanuts for the cake. 请为做点心剥点胡花生。||||This kind of beetles have hard shell. 这类甲虫有坚硬的外壳。

name: drill
interpret: vi. 钻孔；训练 vt. 钻孔；训练；条播；n.操练；练习；钻孔(机)
example: 单词 drill 的例句||||He used a drill to bore a hole in the door. 他用钻在门上钻孔。||||You should drill some manners into the boy. 你应该教这孩子懂点礼貌。

name: spin
interpret: vi. 旋转；纺纱；吐丝；晕眩 vt. 使旋转；纺纱；编造；结网 n. 旋转；疾驰
example: 单词 spin 的例句||||A man cannot spin and weave at the same time. [谚]一心不能二用。||||We can go for a spin on a bicycle on campus. 我们可以骑自行车在校园里兜一圈。

name: rough
interpret: adj.粗糙的；粗略的，大致的；粗野的，粗暴的
example: 单词 rough 的例句||||It's just a very rough translation. 这只是一篇非常粗糙的译稿。||||His reply was a bit rough. 他的答复过于粗鲁了一点。

name: lorry
interpret: n.（英）卡车；[车辆]货车；运料车
example: 单词 lorry 的例句||||The old woman was run down by a big lorry. 那个老人被一辆大卡车撞倒了。||||A lorry ran down the hill out of control. 卡车失去了控制，直往山下冲去。

name: fountain
interpret: n.喷泉，源泉，储水容器，泉水；v.使像喷泉一样流
example: 单词 fountain 的例句||||At the centre of the park there is a fountain. 公园正中有一个喷泉。||||Ancient Greece was a fountain of wisdom and philosophy. 古希腊是智慧和哲学的发源地。

name: dig
interpret: vt. 挖，掘；探究 vi. 挖掘
example: 单词 dig 的例句||||It is difficult to dig the ground when it is frozen. 地面冻住了就不易挖掘。||||In those days we often went to dig for wild vegetables. 那时候我们常常出去挖野菜。

name: mop
interpret: n.拖把，乱蓬蓬的头发；v.用拖把洗擦，擦，拭
example: 单词 mop 的例句||||She bought a new white mop. 她买了一个白色的新拖把。||||You have quite a mop of hair. 你的头发蓬松凌乱。

name: swan
example: 单词 swan 的例句||||A swan has white feathers and a long thin neck. 天鹅长着白色的羽毛和长而细的脖子。||||Swan Lake is the name of a famous ballet. 天鹅湖是一出著名的芭蕾舞剧。

name: tram
example: 单词 tram 的例句||||We crossed the tram tracks. 我们跨过了电车轨道。|||| How will you come, by taxi or by tram? 你怎样来这里? 坐出租车还是电车？

name: diver
example: 单词 diver 的例句||||He is a deep sea diver. 他是深海潜水员。||||The diver comes up for air. 潜水员升到水面呼吸空气。

name: cushion
interpret: n.垫子，橡皮软垫&vt.加垫褥，缓冲，掩盖
example: 单词 cushion 的例句||||He lay on the floor with a cushion under his head. 他躺在地板上，头下枕着一个垫子。|||| His hat helped to cushion the blow. 他的帽子帮助缓冲了打击。

name: parcel
interpret: n.小包；包裹；vt.分配；打包；adj.部分的；adv.局部地
example: 单词 parcel 的例句||||Shall I tie up your things in a parcel? 我把您的东西包起来，好吗？||||The parcel was sent by express. 这包裹是用快递方式寄出去的。

name: pitch
interpret: n.球场；声音的高低度；沥青；程度；v.投掷
example: 单词 pitch 的例句||||The pitch is too small to play football on. 球场太小了，无法踢足球。||||People just pitch their rubbish over the wall. 人们径直把垃圾扔过墙去。

name: poll
interpret: n.民意测验，民意调查，选举投票
example: 单词 poll 的例句||||The result of the poll won't be known until midnight. 选举结果要到午夜才能揭晓。||||They expected a heavy poll. 他们期望会有很高的投票数。

name: pavement
interpret: n.铺砌，铺设，铺筑；铺路石，铺石路，人行道，车道
example: 单词 pavement 的例句||||He stopped his bike just off the pavement. 他把自行车就停在人行道旁边。||||There are trees on each side of the pavement. 人行道两边有树。

name: squid
example: 单词 squid 的例句||||I like eating squid. 我喜欢吃鱿鱼。||||The seals feed mainly on fish and squid. 海豹主要以鱼和乌贼为食。

name: brochure
example: 单词 brochure 的例句||||Can I have a tour brochure? 能给我一个观光册子吗? ||||I want you to read the brochure completely. 我想让你把这个小册子看完。

name: sword
example: 单词 sword 的例句||||The soldier cut at his enemy with his sword. 那位士兵用自己的剑向敌人砍去。||||With a sweep of his sword he cut through the rope. 他用剑一挥把绳子砍断了。

name: microscope
interpret: n.显微镜；vt.仔细检查，放大，夸大
example: 单词 microscope 的例句||||The students were looking through a microscope at plant cells. 学生们正在通过显微镜观察植物细胞。||||What is a microscope for? 显微镜是做什么用的？

name: helicopter
interpret: n.直升飞机；vt.用直升飞机载送；vi.乘直升飞机
example: 单词 helicopter 的例句||||The helicopter is flying at a height of 5,000 meters. 这架直升机正在五千米的高空飞行。||||The pilot landed the helicopter in a rice field. 飞行员将直升飞机降落在一片稻田里。

name: litre
interpret: n. 升； 公升(容量单位) (美liter)
example: 单词 litre 的例句||||This bottle holds one litre. 这个瓶子装得下一升。|||| He drank off a whole litre of beer all at once. 他一口气喝完了一升啤酒。

name: motel
example: 单词 motel 的例句||||Late that night he landed at a motel. 那晚他到了一家汽车旅馆。||||The motel manager showed the guests to their room. 汽车旅馆经理把旅客领到他们房间。

name: spit
interpret: n.唾液，唾吐，小雨；v.唾吐，吐出，降小雨
example: 单词 spit 的例句||||It's very rude to spit at someone. 向人吐唾沫是非常粗野的行为。||||Don't spit on the sidewalk. 别在人行道上吐痰。

name: flu
example: 单词 flu 的例句||||I've been laid up with flu for a week. 我患流感已在家休息一个星期了。||||Mind that your children don't catch the flu. 小心别让你孩子传上流感。

name: dizzy
interpret: adj.晕眩的，眼花缭乱的；vt.使晕眩
example: 单词 dizzy 的例句||||I feel a dizzy spell. 我感到一阵头晕。||||Lean on me if you feel dizzy. 如果你觉得头晕，就靠在我身上好了。

name: closet
example: 单词 closet 的例句||||I'll clear out that closet for you. 我要替你把那个小衣橱清理出来。||||Hang your overcoat in the closet. 把你的大衣挂在衣橱里。

name: sharpener
example: 单词 sharpener 的例句||||I have a sharpener. 我有一个卷笔刀。||||Who else has a pencil sharpener? 还有谁有卷笔刀？

name: stocking
example: 单词 stocking 的例句||||My stocking is always full of presents at Christmas. 我的长袜在圣诞节经常装满了礼物。||||It's no use keeping this odd stocking. 单只的袜子留着没什么用。

name: golden
interpret: adj.金的，含金的，可贵的，金色的，贵重的，繁盛的
example: 单词 golden 的例句||||My teacher is an Englishman with golden hair. 我的老师是一个金黄色头发的英国人。||||It's a balmy evening, the golden time for lovers. 这是一个暖和的夜晚，是恋人们的黄金时光。

name: balcony
example: 单词 balcony 的例句||||You can see the sea from our balcony. 你从我们的阳台上就能看见大海。||||The balcony was closed with bars. 阳台用铁条封上了。

name: fence
interpret: n.围墙，剑术；v.用篱笆围住，练习剑术，防护；[计算机]栅栏
example: 单词 fence 的例句||||They put a fence around the garden. 他们在园子的周围建起了篱笆。||||The thief jumped himself over a fence and escaped. 贼纵身跃过篱笆逃走了。

name: hairdresser
example: 单词 hairdresser 的例句||||My hairdresser has opened a new salon. 我的理发师新开了一家理发店。||||The hairdresser made a good job of my hair. 理发师把我的头发理得很好。

name: mailman
interpret: n.邮递员(现在常改称mail carrier)
example: 单词 mailman 的例句||||The mailman always comes at 9 o'clock. 邮递员总是九点钟来。||||The mailman brought a small packet. 邮差送来了一个小邮包。

name: hiking
example: 单词 hiking 的例句||||He has been hiking round Scotland for a month. 他围着苏格兰徒步旅行了一个月。||||Hiking is not yet popular in China. 徒步旅行在中国还不流行。

name: scissors
example: 单词 scissors 的例句||||He took a pair of scissors and cut her hair. 他拿起一把剪刀给她剪发。||||We cut paper and cloth with scissors. 我们用剪刀裁纸和布。

name: hike
interpret: n.徒步旅行，远足，涨价；v.健行，徒步旅行，使...高涨
example: 单词 hike 的例句||||I don't care to go on a hike. 我不喜欢徒步旅行。|||| The children are choosing a hike in the country park. 孩子们在选郊外公园的远足路线。

name: Tibet
example: 单词 Tibet 的例句||||It was the year before last that he went to Tibet. 他前年去的西藏。||||I have determined on going to Tibet after graduation. 我已决定毕业后去西藏。

name: stadium
example: 单词 stadium 的例句||||The new football stadium can hold eighty thousand people. 新的足球场可以容纳八万人。||||The stadium is being used for a match. 那个露天运动场正在进行一场比赛。

name: commercial
interpret: adj.商业的，商用的，商品化的；n.广告节目
example: 单词 commercial 的例句||||He has gained a footing in the commercial world. 他已在商界取得立足之地。||||The plane did not fly the usual commercial route. 飞机没有沿通常的商业航线飞。

name: crack
interpret: vi.发破裂声；噼啪地响；vt.（使）开裂；破裂；n.裂缝，缝隙；爆裂声，破裂声，劈啪声
example: 单词 crack 的例句||||There's a crack in this cup. 这个杯子上有个裂缝。||||There's a crack on the underneath of the bowl. 碗底有一道裂缝。

name: pepper
interpret: n.辣椒；胡椒；胡椒粉；vt.在…上撒胡椒粉；使布满
example: 单词 pepper 的例句||||He put some pepper in the bowl. 他放了一些胡椒粉在碗里。||||This pepper is really hot. 这辣椒真辣。

name: quiz
interpret: n.智力竞赛；测验，小型考试
example: 单词 quiz 的例句||||They are having a quiz now. 他们正进行小测验。|||| He took part in a television quiz and won a prize. 他参加了一个电视知识竞赛并得了奖。

name: sauce
example: 单词 sauce 的例句||||Some cream will enrich the sauce. 在调味汁里加一些奶油会使其味道更加丰富。||||This sauce is too thick -- add some milk. 调味汁太稠，再加点奶。

name: vinegar
example: 单词 vinegar 的例句||||Do we need some soy sauce and vinegar? 我们需要酱油和醋吗？||||Vinegar is used in preserving food. 醋可用来保存食物。

name: rhyme
interpret: n.韵，押韵，韵文；vi.押韵，作诗；vt.使押韵，用韵诗表达
example: 单词 rhyme 的例句||||I cannot find a rhyme to "hiccups". 我不能找到和“hiccups”同韵的词。||||The last two lines of this poem don't rhyme properly. 这首诗后两句不怎么压韵。

name: souvenir
example: 单词 souvenir 的例句||||Please accept this little gift as a souvenir. 请留下这个小小礼物作为纪念。||||I was going to save that as a souvenir. 我本来准备把它做为纪念品保存下来的。

name: mammal
example: 单词 mammal 的例句||||A whale is a kind of mammal. 鲸是一种哺乳动物。|||| The bat is the only mammal that can fly. 蝙蝠是唯一会飞的哺乳动物。

name: compose
interpret: vt. 构成；写作；使平静；排…的版 vi. 组成；作曲；排字
example: 单词 compose 的例句||||Nine players compose a team. 9名选手组成一队。|||| We should compose ourselves in the face of fear. 我们在危险时要保持镇静。

name: hippo
example: 单词 hippo 的例句||||Look at the hippo splashing about in the river. 看那只在河里溅水的河马。||||In fact, a hippo can stay under water for up to six minutes. 实际上，河马一口气可以在水下待六分钟。

name: koala
example: 单词 koala 的例句||||The koala is the most popular animal in this zoo. 树袋熊是这个动物园里最受欢迎的动物。||||Some species sleep day and night such as the Koala Bear. 一些物种白天和夜晚都睡觉，例如树袋熊。

name: Oceania
example: 单词 Oceania 的例句||||Oceania is mainly made up of Australia and New Zealand. 大洋洲主要是由澳大利亚和新西兰组成的。|||| Oceania is the smallest continent. 大洋洲是最小的洲。

name: pyramid
example: 单词 pyramid 的例句||||The Great Pyramid is the biggest of all. 大金字塔是其中最大的一座。||||Pyramid is one of the miracles in the world. 金字塔是世界奇迹之一。

name: fantasy
example: 单词 fantasy 的例句||||Your husband is living in a world of fantasy. 你丈夫正生活在一个虚幻世界。||||The whole story is a fantasy. 整个故事只是一个虚构。

name: claw
interpret: n.爪，钩，抓伤；vi./vt.用爪抓，搔，搜刮
example: 单词 claw 的例句||||What is the function of a cat's claw? 猫爪的作用是什么？||||A hen's claw has three toes. 母鸡的脚爪有三个脚趾。

name: photography
example: 单词 photography 的例句||||He goes in for photography. 他酷爱摄影。|||| Photography is not taught in our school. 我们学校不教摄影术。

name: Quebec
example: 单词 Quebec 的例句||||Quebec is a good place to enjoy French cuisine. 魁北克是品尝法国风味的好地方。||||After roaming around nearly half his life, he finally settled down in Quebec. 他过了半辈子的流浪生活，最后在魁北克定居了下来。

name: radium
example: 单词 radium 的例句||||Radium can be used to treat cancer. 镭可以用来治疗癌症。||||He was the discoverer of the element radium. 他是镭元素的发现者。

name: wizard
interpret: n.男巫，术士，鬼才；adj.男巫的，巫术的
example: 单词 wizard 的例句||||Edison was a wizard at invention. 爱迪生是一个发明奇才。||||That's a fairy story about a wizard. 那是讲一个男巫的童话。

name: ceiling
interpret: n.天花板；(规定价格、工资等的)最高限额
example: 单词 ceiling 的例句||||It took more or less a whole day to paint the ceiling. 粉刷天花板用了将近一整天的时间。||||A fly is on the ceiling. 一只苍蝇在天花板上。

name: clown
example: 单词 clown 的例句||||Doesn't the clown look funny! 这小丑看上去真是滑稽！ ||||A clown's job is to amuse the spectators. 小丑的工作就是娱乐观众。

name: spice
interpret: n.香料，调味品；趣味，风味；vt.加香料于
example: 单词 spice 的例句||||There is too much spice in the cake. 饼中的香料太多。||||He is bored and needs a little spice in his life. 他对生活感到厌倦，需要点刺激。

name: alphabet
example: 单词 alphabet 的例句||||There are 26 letters in the English alphabet. 英语字母表中有26个字母。||||The last letter of the alphabet is Z. 字母表的最后一个字母是Z。

name: worm
interpret: n.虫，蠕虫，蚯蚓，小人物，螺纹，蜗杆；vi.蠕行，慢慢前进；vt.使蠕行，慢慢地走；网络病毒，（可以在网络上传播的病毒）
example: 单词 worm 的例句||||She believes that an early bird can catch the worm. 她相信早起的鸟儿有虫吃。||||The bird had a worm in its beak. 鸟儿嘴里叼着一条虫。

name: snore
interpret: n.鼾声，打鼾；vi.打鼾；vt.打鼾度过
example: 单词 snore 的例句||||His loud snore kept me awake. 他的鼾声大得使我睡不着。||||He soon fell asleep and began to snore. 他很快睡着并开始打起鼾来。

name: minus
interpret: n.负号；adj.减的，负的，阴性的；prep.减，缺
example: 单词 minus 的例句||||The temperature was minus 30 degrees. 气温为零下30度。||||He seems to have mistaken a minus for a plus. 他似乎把负号误作正号了。

name: ideal
interpret: adj.理想的，完美的；空想的，观念的；n.理想
example: 单词 ideal 的例句||||The weather at the seaside was ideal—bright and breezy. 海边的天气最宜人，风和日丽的。||||They promised to be faithful to their ideal for ever. 他们保证永远忠于自己的理想。

name: tunnel
interpret: n.隧道，地下道；vi.挖隧道；vt.掘隧道于
example: 单词 tunnel 的例句||||They will have to block up the entrance to the tunnel. 他们将不得不封闭通往隧道的入口。||||The train passed through a tunnel. 火车通过了一条隧道。

name: lid
interpret: n.盖子，眼睑；v.加盖，盖上；制止，取缔
example: 单词 lid 的例句||||She shut the lid down. 她扣上了盖儿。||||Put the lid on the garbage can. 把盖子盖在垃圾筒上。

name: scary
example: 单词 scary 的例句||||What animal do you think is the most scary? 你认为什么动物最可怕？|||| Are you afraid of scary movies? 你害怕恐怖电影吗？

name: tomb
example: 单词 tomb 的例句||||They had dug out an ancient tomb. 他们已发掘到一座古墓。||||They dug many ancient coins out of the tomb. 他们从墓中掘出了许多古钱。

name: clay
example: 单词 clay 的例句||||The children like making houses of sticks and clay. 孩子们喜欢用树枝或黏土盖房子玩。||||What a love of a clay doll! 多么可爱的泥娃娃！

name: torch
example: 单词 torch 的例句||||They are looking for volunteers to carry the torch. 他们正在寻找火炬传递的志愿者。||||A famous athlete held a torch and ran to the stadium. 一个著名的运动员举着火炬跑到运动场。

name: paintbrush
example: 单词 paintbrush 的例句||||Can this brush go for a paintbrush? 这把刷子可以用作画刷吗？||||Please give me a clean paintbrush. 请给我一支干净的画笔。

name: bookshelf
example: 单词 bookshelf 的例句||||Please take the bookshelf away. 把书架搬开。||||He put the books all together on the bookshelf. 他把每本书都放在书架上。

name: brake
interpret: n.制动器，刹车，闸；vt.制动，刹车
example: 单词 brake 的例句||||The brake is ineffective. 刹车失灵。||||The cause of the accident was the brake of the car. 这个事故的原因是汽车的刹车问题。

name: donut
example: 单词 donut 的例句||||I want to eat a donut. 我想吃甜甜圈。 ||||How much for one donut? 一个面包圈多少钱？

name: ski
example: 单词 ski 的例句||||The ski is wooden. 这滑雪板是木制的。||||Do you have the skill to ski such a difficult slope? 你有沿着这样一个陡坡滑雪的本事吗？

name: Carol
example: 单词 Carol 的例句||||Silent Night is my favourite carol. 《平安夜》是我最喜欢的圣诞颂歌。||||The people in the church are singing a christmas carol. 教堂里的人们正在唱圣诞颂歌。

name: roast
interpret: vt. 烤，焙；烘，烘烤；vi. 烤；烘；n.烤肉；adj.烤(烘)过的
example: 单词 roast 的例句||||There's a piece of roast beef. 这儿有一块烤牛肉。 |||| Put the meat into the oven to roast. 把肉放到炉子里去烤。

name: dragonfly
example: 单词 dragonfly 的例句||||Tom caught me a dragonfly. 汤姆给我抓了一只蜻蜓。|||| It looks like a blue dragonfly. 它看上去像只蓝色蜻蜓。

name: tulip
example: 单词 tulip 的例句||||The Netherlands is the tulip kingdom. 荷兰是郁金香的王国。||||In a vase on the table stood a tulip. 桌上的花瓶里插着一束郁金香。

name: lotus
example: 单词 lotus 的例句||||Lotus grows in Africa and Asia. 荷花产于非洲和亚洲。||||I like enjoying the moonlight beside a lotus pond. 我喜欢独自欣赏荷塘的月色。

name: vase
example: 单词 vase 的例句||||She knocked the vase off by accident. 她不小心把花瓶打掉了。||||I saw the vase in the window of a shop. 我在一家商店的橱窗里看见了这个花瓶。

name: zip
interpret: n. 拉链；活力，精力；尖啸声，撕裂声；vi. 拉开或拉上；以尖啸声行进 vt. 给...以速度；拉上或拉开拉链
example: 单词 zip 的例句||||Better zip your jacket. It's cold outside. 最好还是把你上衣的拉链拉上，外面很冷。||||Zip up your coat before going out. 出去前先把你的上衣拉链拉上。

name: auntie
example: 单词 auntie 的例句||||She's staying with her auntie for the time being. 她暂时住在她姨妈那里。||||My auntie brought up four children. 我姑姑养了四个孩子。

name: radish
example: 单词 radish 的例句||||This radish has gone spongy. 这萝卜糠了。||||The blade of this knife is so dull that it will not cut a radish. 这把刀的刀刃太钝，不能切萝卜。

name: Wales
interpret: n.威尔士(在大不列颠岛西南部)
example: 单词 Wales 的例句||||The company are opening up a new factory in Wales. 公司将在威尔士开一家新工厂。||||She teaches English at the University of Wales. 她在威尔士大学教英语。

name: album
interpret: n.集子，粘贴集，影集，邮集，歌曲集
example: 单词 album 的例句||||The photos belong in an album. 这些照片应该放在相册里。||||Will you look over his album? 你要不要去看看他的歌集唱片？

name: palm
interpret: n.手掌，棕榈，胜利；vt.与…握手，藏…于掌中
example: 单词 palm 的例句||||That woman had her husband in the palm of her hand. 那女人牢牢地控制住她丈夫。||||Palm trees grow all around the island. 岛上到处长着棕榈树。

name: slave
interpret: n.奴隶，附件，卑鄙的人；vi.拼命工作
example: 单词 slave 的例句||||Don't be a slave to custom. 不要做风俗习惯的奴隶。||||Why should I slave away all my life! 我为什么要辛辛苦苦地干一辈子呀！

name: Mongolian
interpret: n.蒙古人，蒙古国民，蒙古语；adj.蒙古的；蒙古人的；蒙古语的；蒙古族的
example: 单词 Mongolian 的例句||||Mongolian people had replaced them. 蒙古人已经取代了他们。||||This letter is written in Mongolian, and I can not understand it. 这封信是用蒙文写的，我看不懂。

name: drove
example: 单词 drove 的例句||||He drove at a speed of sixty miles per hour. 他以每小时60英里的速度开车。||||They drove foreign goods out of the market. 他们把外国货驱逐出市场。

name: lip
interpret: n.唇，口缘，唇状构造；v.以嘴唇碰，轻轻说出
example: 单词 lip 的例句||||He bit his lip nervously, trying not to cry. 他紧张地咬着唇，努力忍着不哭出来。||||He has a scar on his upper lip. 他的上唇有一道疤痕。

name: horn
example: 单词 horn 的例句||||This horn is out of tune. 这小号音调不正。||||He played the tune on the horn. 他用号吹奏了这首曲子。

name: messy
example: 单词 messy 的例句||||Working underneath the car is always a messy job. 在汽车底下工作是件脏活。||||She found herself in a messy spot. 她发现自己陷入了窘境。

name: oops
interpret: int.哎哟（ 表示惊讶；沮丧；狼狈；轻度道歉等）
example: 单词 oops 的例句||||Oops! I'm on the wrong plane! 糟糕！我上错飞机了！  ||||Oops! I nearly dropped my cup of tea! 哎呀!我险些儿把自己的一杯茶掉到地上！

name: bitter
interpret: adj.激烈的，苦涩的，辛酸的，厉害的，悲痛的；n.辛酸，苦味，苦酒
example: 单词 bitter 的例句||||The bitter winter was coming. 寒冬到了。||||The two countries fell out in a bitter wrangle over imports. 这两个国家在有关进口问题的激烈争吵中闹翻了。

name: ache
example: 单词 ache 的例句||||He has an ache in the back. 他的背痛。||||My muscles are going to ache all over tomorrow. 明天我全身肌肉都会痛了。

name: haircut
example: 单词 haircut 的例句||||Get yourself a haircut! 快去理个发吧！||||He is going to have a haircut. 他要去理发。

name: grocery
example: 单词 grocery 的例句||||There used to be a grocery store on the corner. 以前在这个街角有家杂货店。||||Her mother began operation of a small grocery. 她母亲开始经营一家小杂货店。

name: bunch
interpret: n.群；串；突出物；vi.隆起；打褶；形成一串；vt.使成一串；使打褶
example: 单词 bunch 的例句||||A bunch of girls were sitting on the grass. 一群女孩坐在草地上。||||I received a bunch of flowers yesterday. 昨天我收到了一束鲜花。

name: muddy
interpret: adj.泥泞的，污的，肮脏的；vt.使污浊，使沾上泥污
example: 单词 muddy 的例句||||The road is very muddy. 这条路非常泥泞。||||They passed a muddy track through the forest. 他们穿过森林的泥泞小路。

name: penny
example: 单词 penny 的例句||||I will not lent you a penny. 我一便士都不愿借给你。||||Sugar has risen a penny per pound. 糖价每磅涨了1便士。

name: nail
example: 单词 nail 的例句||||He drove a nail into the wall. 他把钉子钉在墙上。||||In order to hang the picture, he had to hammer a nail. 为了挂那幅画，他必须钉枚钉子。

name: leak
interpret: vi.漏，渗；泄漏；vt.使渗漏，使泄漏；n.漏洞，漏隙；泄漏，漏出
example: 单词 leak 的例句||||There is a leak in the roof. 房顶上有个漏洞。||||There has been a leak of information. 走漏了风声。

name: bald
interpret: adj.秃头的；无发的或少发的
example: 单词 bald 的例句||||He shaved his head bald. 他把头发剃光了。||||The mountain is bald. 这座山光秃秃的。

name: poison
example: 单词 poison 的例句||||The bottle is labelled "Poison". 瓶上标明“有毒”。||||Don't allow evil thoughts to poison young people's minds. 不允许邪念毒害青年。

name: cart
interpret: n.（二轮或四轮）运货马车，手推车；vt.用马车装载，用手提（笨重物品），强行带走
example: 单词 cart 的例句||||We use this to cart the goods. 我们用这个来拉运货物。||||Let's go over and help them pull the cart. 咱们过去帮他们拉车。

name: untidy
interpret: adj.不整齐的，懒散的，懒惰的
example: 单词 untidy 的例句||||This is an untidy plan. 这是一个杂乱无章的计划。||||I must apologize for the untidy state of the room. 屋子这么不整洁，实在抱歉。

name: Athens
example: 单词 Athens 的例句||||Athens is often called the queen of the Aegean. 雅典时常被人称为爱琴海上的皇后。||||China did very well in the last Olympics in Athens. 中国在上届雅典奥运会上取得了优异的成绩。

name: polish
interpret: vt.修正；文饰；（涂蜡等）打光滑；使（人、举止、仪表等）变得优雅；n.擦亮剂；擦亮，磨光；优美，优雅，精良；adj.使完美，使优美，使精炼；vi.得到改进，变得完美
example: 单词 polish 的例句||||I'm going to New York, so I must polish up my English. 我要去纽约，因此我必须提高英语水平。||||The wood won't polish. 这种木材无法磨光。

name: switch
interpret: n.开关，电闸，转换，软枝；vt.转变，切换，摆动，转换，使转轨；vi.转换，变换，摆动
example: 单词 switch 的例句||||The switch on the wall was beyond the baby's reach. 墙上的开关小孩子是够不到的。||||There's been a switch in our plans. 我们的计划改变了。

name: marble
interpret: n.大理石，石弹，雕刻品；adj.大理石的，冷酷无情的，坚硬的
example: 单词 marble 的例句||||Marble is a precious stone. 大理石是一种珍贵的石料。||||The statue was carved out of marble. 这尊像是大理石雕成的。

name: Mozart
example: 单词 Mozart 的例句||||Mozart was a great musician. 莫扎特是伟大的音乐家。||||Will we ever see the like of Mozart again? 我们还会再见到莫扎特那样的天才吗？

name: iron
interpret: n.铁，熨斗，坚强，烙铁，镣铐；vt.烫平，熨，用铁包；vi. 烫衣服
example: 单词 iron 的例句||||The iron has lost its magnetic force. 这块铁已失去了磁力。||||We need an electrician to mend the iron. 我们要请电工修理熨斗。

name: fairly
interpret: adv.公正地，正当地；相当；完全，简直
example: 单词 fairly 的例句||||I think I was quite fairly treated by the police. 我认为警察对我非常公正。||||It fairly destroyed the machine. 它将那部机器完全毁了。

name: grown-up
interpret: adj.成熟的，已经成人的；n.成人，大人
example: 单词 grown-up 的例句||||She has a grown-up daughter who lives abroad. 她有一个已经长大成人的女儿，在海外生活。||||The boy eats like a grown-up. 那男孩的食量像个成人。

name: reliable
example: 单词 reliable 的例句||||I'm afraid the information is not reliable. 恐怕消息不可靠。||||Do you think she's reliable? 你看她这个人可靠吗？

name: whisper
interpret: n.耳语，密谈，谣传，飒飒的声音；vi.耳语，密谈，飒飒地响；vt.低声说
example: 单词 whisper 的例句||||Their voices fell to a whisper. 他们的话音低到成了耳语。||||I've heard a whisper that he's going to resign. 我听到了一个传闻说他准备辞职。

name: depth
example: 单词 depth 的例句||||What is the depth of this lake? 这个湖有多深？|||| He was in the depth of despair. 他处于绝望的深渊。

name: centigrade
example: 单词 centigrade 的例句||||The temperature in this room is twenty degrees centigrade. 这个房间里的温度是摄氏20度。||||It's at 10 degrees centigrade. 气温是10℃。

name: recognise
example: 单词 recognise 的例句||||Blind people recognise things by feeling them. 盲人靠触觉辩认东西。||||I didn't recognise your voice on the phone. 在电话里我没听出你的声音。

name: Arabic
interpret: n.阿拉伯语；adj.阿拉伯语的，阿拉伯人的，阿拉伯式的
example: 单词 Arabic 的例句||||It is not easy to learn Arabic. 学阿拉伯语不容易。||||Arabic script reads from right to left. 阿拉伯文是从右至左读的。

name: Arab
interpret: n.阿拉伯人，阿拉伯马；adj.阿拉伯人的，阿拉伯的
example: 单词 Arab 的例句||||It's a story about an Arab in the desert. 这是一个生活在沙漠地区的阿拉伯人的故事。||||An Arab is travelling in the desert on his camel. 一个阿拉伯人正骑着骆驼在沙漠中旅行。

name: surely
interpret: adv.确实地，无疑地；必定地，一定地
example: 单词 surely 的例句||||It's surely be possible for them to reach an agreement. 想必他们可以达成协议。||||Surely we'll profit from your work. 我们肯定会从你的工作中得到益处。

name: slope
interpret: n.倾斜，斜坡，斜率，掮枪的姿势；vt.使倾斜，弄斜，掮；vi.倾斜，逃走；[美俚][贬]东方人（尤指越南人）
example: 单词 slope 的例句||||The slope is too steep for us to climb. 这斜坡太陡,我们爬不上去。||||The slope of the roof is low. 屋顶的斜度很低。

name: explorer
example: 单词 explorer 的例句||||His father is an Arctic explorer. 他父亲是一位北极探险者。||||The explorer organized an expedition to the North Pole. 那位考察者组织了一个去北极的探险队。

name: excite
interpret: vt. 激起；刺激…，使…兴奋 vi. 激动
example: 单词 excite 的例句||||The boy gets excite at once. 这个男孩立刻变得很激动。||||Try not to excite your baby too much before bedtime. 睡觉前尽量别使宝宝太兴奋。

name: forgetful
example: 单词 forgetful 的例句||||I am so forgetful I often leave my keys at home. 我这么健忘，老把钥匙忘在家里。||||I'm getting so forgetful these days. 近来我变得如此健忘。

name: surrounding
interpret: adj.周围的；n.环境，周围的事物
example: 单词 surrounding 的例句||||They came from the surrounding villages. 他们来自周围的村庄。||||The pond mirrors the surrounding trees. 那个池塘映出周围的树木。

name: Dutch
interpret: adj.荷兰(人)的；荷兰语(或文化)的；n.[the~]荷兰人；荷兰语
example: 单词 Dutch 的例句||||The British and Dutch belong to the same race. 英国人和荷兰人是同一种族。||||Do you know anyone who speaks Dutch? 你认识会讲荷兰语的人吗？

name: coastline
example: 单词 coastline 的例句||||The sea is eating away the coastline. 海水侵蚀着海岸线。||||The road follows the Pacific coastline. 公路沿着太平洋海岸线延伸。

name: Austria
example: 单词 Austria 的例句||||Austria lies to the southeast of Germany. 奥地利位于德国东南。||||I always confuse Australia with Austria. 我总是把澳大利亚同奥地利弄混。

name: equally
example: 单词 equally 的例句||||Divide the cake into quarters and share it equally. 把蛋糕分成四份，大家平均享用。||||The blue sky belongs equally to us all. 蓝天为人所共有。

name: Holland
example: 单词 Holland 的例句||||There are many dairies in Holland. 荷兰有很多牛奶场。||||Holland is one of Germany's neighbours. 荷兰是德国的邻国之一。

name: arrange
interpret: vt.安排，整理，计划，改编(乐曲)；vi.协商，计划
example: 单词 arrange 的例句||||He began to arrange the flowers in the vase. 他开始把花瓶内的花摆好。||||We must arrange about that. 这事我们得安排一下。

name: heroine
interpret: n.女英雄；女主角，女主人公
example: 单词 heroine 的例句||||She became the heroine of France. 她成为法国的女英雄。||||I cannot believe she is the heroine of the movie. 我难以相信她是这部电影的女主角。

name: criminal
interpret: n.罪犯，犯人，刑事；adj.犯了罪的，罪的，有罪的
example: 单词 criminal 的例句||||He is a habitual criminal. 他是一个惯犯。||||We captured the criminal. 我们捕获了那个犯人。

name: bun
interpret: n.小而圆的甜面包；(头发扎成的)髻
example: 单词 bun 的例句||||He stole a bun from the shop. 他从店里偷了一个圆面包。||||She wears her hair in a bun. 她把头发盘成一个髻。

name: pasta
example: 单词 pasta 的例句||||Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water. 在一大锅沸水中煮意大利面。||||Would you like some pasta? 想来点意大利面食吗？

name: horrible
interpret: adj.可怕的，极可憎的，极可厌的
example: 单词 horrible 的例句||||This is a horrible monster. 这是一个可怕的怪物。|||| That is a horrible accident. 那是一次可怕的事故。

name: jasmine
example: 单词 jasmine 的例句||||It's a kind of green tea with the smell of jasmine. 这是一种带有茉莉花香的绿茶。||||You can smell the perfume of jasmine. 你可以闻到茉莉花的香味。

name: peony
example: 单词 peony 的例句||||Peony is one of my favourite flowers. 牡丹是我最喜欢的花之一。||||The peony is the city flower of Luoyang. 牡丹是洛阳的市花。

name: queue
interpret: n.队列；辫子；长队；vt.梳成辫子；vi. 排队
example: 单词 queue 的例句||||To what window are you standing in a queue? 你在排哪个窗口的队？||||I had to queue for quite a while. 我不得不排一会儿队。

name: nationality
example: 单词 nationality 的例句||||I am of Chinese nationality. 我是中国籍。||||She lives in France but has British nationality. 她住在法国但拥有英国国籍。

name: upside
example: 单词 upside 的例句||||The children hung the picture upside down. 小孩把画挂倒了。||||If you turn the envelope upside down, the key will fall out. 你如果把信封倒过来，钥匙就会掉出。

name: telescope
example: 单词 telescope 的例句||||I looked through a telescope. 我用望远镜看东西。|||| Many stars are invisible without a telescope. 许多星辰不用望远镜便看不见。

name: rarely
interpret: adv.很少，难得；非常地，非凡地
example: 单词 rarely 的例句||||Such fish is rarely met with in the north country. 这种鱼在北方难得看到。||||He rarely comes here anymore. 现在他难得来这儿了。

name: tight
example: 单词 tight 的例句||||Time is going to be tight, so you'd better hurry. 时间很紧，你最好抓紧一点。||||The box is so tight that I can't open it. 这个盒子太紧，我打不开。

name: aeroplane
example: 单词 aeroplane 的例句||||I can see that aeroplane, but I can't see a bird. 我能看见那架飞机，但是小鸟我就看不见了。||||The aeroplane was flying a few feet above the sea. 飞机正在距海面几英尺的低空飞行。

name: tyre
example: 单词 tyre 的例句||||This is a waste and useless tyre. 这是个废弃无用的轮胎。||||The tyre is flat. 车胎瘪了。

name: tube
interpret: n.（英）地铁；管，软管，隧道；vt.把…装管，使通过管子
example: 单词 tube 的例句||||You may get to the railway station by tube. 你可以乘地铁到火车站。||||Take care not to break the test tube! 当心别把试管打碎了！

name: basin
example: 单词 basin 的例句||||He washed his hands in a basin. 他在盆里洗了手。|||| The water was even with the rim of the basin. 盆里的水与盆边平齐了。

name: Washington
interpret: n.华盛顿特区(是美国首都)
example: 单词 Washington 的例句||||His birthplace is Washington, but he lives in San Francisco. 他出生于华盛顿，但住在旧金山。||||They, together with my father, have gone to Washington. 他们和我父亲一起去华盛顿了。

name: midday
example: 单词 midday 的例句||||It is now past midday. 现在已过中午了。||||I awoke to bright sunlight filling my room. It was already midday. 我一醒来就看见屋里阳光灿烂，原来已是中午了。

name: funfair
example: 单词 funfair 的例句||||They had a whale of a time at the funfair. 他们在游乐场玩得很开心。||||We really enjoyed ourselves at the funfair. 我们在娱乐场确实玩得很开心。

name: labourer
example: 单词 labourer 的例句||||He got a job as a builder's labourer. 他找到了一份建筑工人的工作。||||He used to be a long-term labourer for a landlord. 他早先给地主扛过长活。

name: hut
example: 单词 hut 的例句||||The hut is in the midst of the forest. 小屋在森林深处。||||The poor old man lived in a little wooden hut. 那个贫穷的老人住在一间小木屋内。

name: priceless
example: 单词 priceless 的例句||||It is a priceless treasure. 这是一件无价之宝。|||| The findings could be priceless. 这些调查结果可能是极为重要的。

name: bridegroom
example: 单词 bridegroom 的例句||||Raise your glasses and drink to the bride and bridegroom. 请大家举杯为新娘新郎干杯。||||The bridegroom was dressed in a grey suit. 新郎穿一套灰色礼服。

name: scare
example: 单词 scare 的例句||||I like reading scare stories. 我喜欢读恐怖故事。|||| The sound of the explosion gave me quite a scare. 爆炸声把我吓了一跳。

name: ribbon
interpret: n.缎带，色带，带状物；vt.用丝带装饰，撕成条状；vi.形成带状
example: 单词 ribbon 的例句||||Her hair was tied up with a ribbon. 她用一条丝带系着头发。||||We decorated our car with ribbon. 我们在汽车上挂满了缎带。

name: chest
interpret: n.胸，大箱子，金库，资金，一箱，密封室，衣橱
example: 单词 chest 的例句||||The bear's chest is hairy. 那只熊的胸部毛茸茸的。||||Mother has a pain in her chest. 母亲胸口疼。

name: slip
interpret: n.滑倒，事故，片，纸片；vi.滑动，滑倒，失足；减退；vt.使滑动，滑过，摆脱，闪开，塞入；adj.滑动的，活络的，有活结的
example: 单词 slip 的例句||||One slip and you could fall off the building. 脚下一滑就可能从建筑物上跌下去。||||I hope you will pardon me for that slip. 我希望您原谅我那次失误。

name: icy
example: 单词 icy 的例句||||Father will not chance driving on the icy roads. 父亲不愿意冒险在结冰的道路上开车。||||She fixed her questioner with an icy glare. 她冷冷地盯着审问者。

name: melt
interpret: vi. 熔化，溶解；渐混 vt. 使融化；使熔化；使软化；使感动
example: 单词 melt 的例句||||If you warm ice, it will melt into water. 如果你给冰加热它会融化成水。||||It is easy to melt ice. 融化冰很容易。

name: cozy
interpret: adj.亲如手足的，密切的，暖和舒服的
example: 单词 cozy 的例句||||I like blankets because they are cozy. 我喜欢毛毯，因为他们是舒适的。||||We spent a cozy evening chatting by the fire. 我们在炉火旁聊天度过了一个舒适的晚上。

name: peasant
example: 单词 peasant 的例句||||His father is a peasant. 他父亲是一位农民。||||He was born of a peasant family. 他出生于一个农民家庭。

name: monument
interpret: n.纪念碑；遗址，遗迹；有永久价值的作品，不朽的功业
example: 单词 monument 的例句||||A monument was set up as a memorial to the dead soldiers. 为阵亡将士立了一个纪念碑。||||The monument bears the mark of age. 纪念碑上有年深日久的痕迹。

name: aircraft
example: 单词 aircraft 的例句||||Your seat is in the fore part of the aircraft. 你的座位在飞机的前部。||||They have placed an order with us for three new aircraft. 他们向我们订购了三架新飞机。

name: collar
interpret: n.衣领，项圈；vt.抓住，为...戴上项圈
example: 单词 collar 的例句||||The collar was cut away according to the fashion. 领子是根据流行的款式剪成的。||||He turned up the collar of his coat. 他把大衣领子翻起来。

name: sunset
interpret: n.日落；衰落时期(尤指人的晚年)
example: 单词 sunset 的例句||||They'll work on till sunset. 他们将继续工作，直到日落。||||The sunset was a very beautiful sight. 那落日真是一幅美景。

name: predict
interpret: vt. 预报，预言；预知 vi. 作出预言；作预料，作预报
example: 单词 predict 的例句||||It's hard to predict how things will turn out. 很难预测事情会变成怎么样。||||I cannot predict when to meet her again. 我无法预测什么时候会再见到她。

name: lecturer
example: 单词 lecturer 的例句||||The lecturer tried to settle the audience down. 那位演讲者试图让听众静下来。||||The lecturer is booked for every night of the week. 这位讲演人本星期每晚都有预约。

name: onwards
example: 单词 onwards 的例句||||From now onwards my teacher will be stricter. 从此我的老师会更加严格。||||The crowd began to move onwards. 人群开始向前移动。

name: responsibility
example: 单词 responsibility 的例句||||The safety of the ship is the captain's responsibility. 确保船的安全是船长的责任。||||The matter is outside my area of the responsibility. 此事超出我的责任范围。

name: terrify
example: 单词 terrify 的例句||||Rats terrify me. 老鼠使我害怕。||||The aim of the terrorists is to terrify people! 恐怖份子的目的就是令大众感到恐慌！

name: Hollywood
example: 单词 Hollywood 的例句||||She dreamed of becoming a Hollywood screen goddess. 她梦想成为好莱坞的银幕女神。||||The film has a Hollywood happy ending. 那部电影有一个好莱坞式的美满结局。

name: frequently
interpret: adv.常常，屡次，经常地，频繁地
example: 单词 frequently 的例句||||Please write to me frequently. 请经常给我来信。|||| I like that you should call on me frequently. 我喜欢你经常来拜访我。

name: charity
interpret: n.慈悲，博爱，慈善团体，施舍
example: 单词 charity 的例句||||He founded the charity in memory of his late wife. 他兴办那个慈善机构以纪念他已故的妻子。||||He gave a handsome sum of money to charity. 他向慈善团体捐了一笔相当可观的钱款。

name: juicy
example: 单词 juicy 的例句||||The flesh of the peach was sweet and juicy. 桃子的果肉甜而多汁。||||These pears are very juicy. 这种梨含的水分很多。

name: cheerful
interpret: adj.快活的，高兴的，兴高采烈
example: 单词 cheerful 的例句||||Yellow is a cheerful colour. 黄色是令人高兴的颜色。||||This state of things holds out a cheerful prospect. 事态呈现出可喜的前景。

name: fibre
example: 单词 fibre 的例句||||Most vegetables contain fibre. 大多数蔬菜都含有纤维。||||Nylon is a man-made fibre. 尼龙是一种人造纤维。

name: B.C.
example: 单词 B.C. 的例句||||The Great Wall dates from the third century B. C. 万里长城建成于公元前三世纪。||||The First Emperor of Qin unified China in 221 B. C. 秦始皇于公元前221年统一中国。

name: mat
interpret: n.席子，垫子，团；vt.遮盖；vi.缠结；adj.粗糙的；暗淡的
example: 单词 mat 的例句||||He is hammering down the mat. 他正在钉席子。||||Please wipe your shoes on the mat. 请在蹭鞋垫子上擦擦鞋。

name: weave
interpret: n.编法，织法，编织；vt.编织，组合，编排，使迂回前进；vi.纺织，迂回行进，摇晃
example: 单词 weave 的例句||||People weave threads into cloth. 人们把线织成布。||||I think you can weave a story around this incident. 我想你可以围绕这一事件编一个故事。

name: razor
example: 单词 razor 的例句||||I want to buy an electric razor this weekend. 这个周末我想买一个电动剃须刀。||||A sharp razor gives a close shave. 剃刀锋利刮得就干净。

name: substance
example: 单词 substance 的例句||||There isn't anything of real substance in her book. 她的书中没有任何真正实质性的内容。||||How long will the substance take to salt out? 这种物质需要多长时间来盐析？

name: gallon
example: 单词 gallon 的例句||||The car used a gallon of petrol for the journey. 汽车在路上消耗了一加仑汽油。||||This car runs 5 miles on a gallon of gasoline. 这部汽车一加仑汽油可以行驶五英里。

name: cubic
interpret: adj.立方体的，立方形的；3次的，立方的
example: 单词 cubic 的例句||||We need 3 cubic yards of sand. 我们需要3立方沙子。||||The volume of this container is 1000 cubic metres. 这个集装箱的容量是1000立方米。

name: obtain
interpret: vt.获得，得到；vi.通用，流行，存在
example: 单词 obtain 的例句||||He has enough money to obtain the necessaries of life. 他有足够的钱购买生活必需品。||||Where can I obtain the book? 我在哪里能买到这本书？

name: precious
interpret: adj.宝贵的，珍贵的，过于精致的，珍爱的
example: 单词 precious 的例句||||Each life is precious. 生命都是宝贵的。||||Spring rain is as precious as oil. 春雨贵如油。

name: pretend
interpret: vt.假装，假托，装扮；vi.假装，装作
example: 单词 pretend 的例句||||So you don't need to pretend, do you? 所以你不必装假了，对吧？||||Many people pretend that they understand modern art. 许多人装着自己懂得现代艺术。

name: Scottish
interpret: adj.苏格兰(人)的；n.苏格兰(人)；苏格兰语
example: 单词 Scottish 的例句||||My husband and I are Scottish. 我和我丈夫是苏格兰人。||||Scottish life in London centres round this spot. 苏格兰人在伦敦的生活区集中在这一带。

name: owe
interpret: vt./vi.欠（债等）；感激；把……归功于某人
example: 单词 owe 的例句||||We still owe one hundred dollars for the car. 为这部车我们还欠着100美元。||||We owe it to society to make our country a better place. 把国家建设得更美好是我们对社会应尽的责任。

name: entertain
interpret: vt.招待，款待；使欢乐，使娱乐；vi.款待，请客
example: 单词 entertain 的例句||||Emma will be happy to entertain you. 爱玛会很高兴招待你的。||||They entertain a great deal. 他们常常招待客人。

name: kilogram
example: 单词 kilogram 的例句||||Apple costs five dollars a kilogram. 苹果每千克5美元。||||The kilogram is the international standard of weight. 公斤是国际通用的重量标准。

name: bronze
example: 单词 bronze 的例句||||She won a bronze medal. 她得了铜牌。||||This statue is made of bronze. 这个雕像是青铜做的。

name: cocoa
interpret: n.可可粉，可可饮料，可可色
example: 单词 cocoa 的例句||||They always had a cup of cocoa last thing at night. 他们总是在临睡前喝杯可可饮料。||||Steam rose from her mug of cocoa. 水汽从她那杯可可饮料里升起。

name: folk
example: 单词 folk 的例句||||I am not very fond of folk dance. 我不太喜欢民间舞蹈。||||Difficulties help to forge people into able folk. 困难有助于把人们锻炼成能干的人。

name: gravity
example: 单词 gravity 的例句||||An apple falls down because of gravity. 由于重力的关系，苹果往下掉。||||The stone rolled down the mountain by gravity. 这块石头由于重力作用而滚下山。

name: marathon
interpret: n.长距离赛跑；需要耐力的比赛；(M-)马拉松
example: 单词 marathon 的例句||||I'm hoping to be in the marathon next year. 我希望明年能参加马拉松赛。||||The meeting was a bit of a marathon. 这次会议有点马拉松赛的味道。

name: mud
example: 单词 mud 的例句||||The swimming pool is filled up with mud. 游泳池里全是泥。||||A car ran past, spotting my coat with mud. 一辆汽车驶过，给我的外衣溅上了泥点。

name: splendid
interpret: adj.光亮的，了不起的，灿烂的，壮丽的，显著的，杰出的
example: 单词 splendid 的例句||||He got a splendid present for her. 他送她一件极好的礼物。||||The play was just splendid. 这出戏真是太好了。

name: scenery
example: 单词 scenery 的例句||||The west lake is famous for its beautiful scenery. 西湖以风景优美著称。||||She enjoys mountain scenery. 她喜欢山景。

name: napkin
example: 单词 napkin 的例句||||She handed him a napkin. 她递给他一条餐巾。||||Her father cleaned his glasses with a paper napkin. 她父亲用纸巾把眼镜擦干净。

name: laundry
interpret: n.洗衣店，洗衣房；已洗好的衣物，待洗衣物
example: 单词 laundry 的例句||||Please send clothes to the laundry. 请把这些衣物送往洗衣店。||||There's a lot of laundry in the basket. 筐子里有许多要洗的衣物。

name: violinist
interpret: n.小提琴演奏者，小提琴家
example: 单词 violinist 的例句||||Everyone cheered for the violinist at our school concert. 在学校音乐会上，大家都为小提琴手喝彩叫好。|||| She's a great violinist by any standard. 不论以什么标准看，她都是伟大的小提琴家。

name: sleeve
example: 单词 sleeve 的例句||||Will you please mend the sleeve of my blouse? 请你把我衬衣的袖子补一下好吗？||||He pulled my sleeve, attracted my attention in this way. 他扯了扯我的衣袖以引起我的注意。

name: smoker
interpret: n.吸烟者，吸烟车厢，吸烟室
example: 单词 smoker 的例句||||His wife dislikes him to be a smoker. 他妻子不喜欢他当烟民。||||He is a moderate smoker. 他是一个有节制的烟民。

name: convenience
interpret: n.便利，方便，有益，有用的，方便的用具、机械、安排等
example: 单词 convenience 的例句||||Come by to pick me up at your convenience. 在你方便的时候来接我。||||Please reply at your earliest convenience. 请在您方便时尽早答复。

name: jog
interpret: n. 轻推,轻撞,漫步; v. 轻推,蹒跚行进,慢跑
example: 单词 jog 的例句||||I go for a jog in the park every morning. 每天早晨我在公园里慢跑。|||| I gave him a jog to wake him up. 我轻轻推了他一下,叫醒他。

name: butcher
interpret: n.屠夫，肉商，小贩；vt.屠宰，屠杀
example: 单词 butcher 的例句||||A butcher needs sharp knives. 屠夫需利刃。||||He was as great a butcher as the world has been. 他是有史以来最大的杀人狂。

name: parade
interpret: n.游行，炫耀，阅兵，检阅，阅兵场；v.游行，炫耀，夸耀，（使）列队行进
example: 单词 parade 的例句||||She is on parade in her new dress in the street. 她穿着新衣服在大街上走来走去。||||The boys loved watching the soldiers on parade. 男孩子们爱看士兵们列队行进。

name: furthest
example: 单词 furthest 的例句||||Our house is the furthest from the school. 我们家是离学校最远的。|||| Neptune is the furthest planet from the sun. 海王星是离太阳最远的行星。

name: Venus
interpret: n.金星；维纳斯(罗马神话中爱与美的女神)
example: 单词 Venus 的例句||||Venus is of the same size as Earth. 金星跟地球差不多一样大。|||| Venus was a goddess worshiped by the Romans. 维纳斯是罗马人所崇拜的女神。

name: Vietnam
example: 单词 Vietnam 的例句||||Vietnam is suffering from food shortage. 越南正遭受食物短缺之苦。||||Laos is on the west of Vietnam. 老挝在越南西面。

name: fund
interpret: n.基金，资金，存款，财源，贮藏；vt.提供资金，积累
example: 单词 fund 的例句||||They decided to set up a fund for this purpose. 他们决定为此专立一项基金。||||This fund may not be drawn on without permission. 这笔钱非经批准不得动用。

name: basement
interpret: n.地下室，地窖；建筑物的基部
example: 单词 basement 的例句||||It is rather damp in the basement. 地下室很潮湿。||||They live in a basement flat in North London. 他们住在伦敦北部的一所地下公寓里。

name: chef
example: 单词 chef 的例句||||He started work as a trainee chef. 他开始了见习厨师的工作。||||No one can become a chef without practical experience. 没有实际工作经验，谁也当不了厨师长。

name: helmet
interpret: n.钢盔；头盔；安全帽；vt.给…戴头盔
example: 单词 helmet 的例句||||The man on the motorcycle wore a helmet. 骑摩托车的人戴了一顶头盔。||||Wear your safety helmet when you go down. 戴上安全帽再下去。

name: gymnastics
example: 单词 gymnastics 的例句||||Gymnastics is his favourite sport. 体操是他最喜爱的运动。||||She does gymnastics at school. 她在学校做体操锻炼。

name: librarian
interpret: n.图书管理员；图书馆馆长
example: 单词 librarian 的例句||||His father is the librarian of our school library. 他父亲是我们学校的图书馆馆长。||||The librarian entered a new book in the catalogue. 图书管理员把一本新书编入目录。

name: mild
interpret: adj.温暖的，暖和的，（天气，尤指冬天）；性情温和的
example: 单词 mild 的例句||||That coat is too heavy for such a mild day. 这样暖和的天气，穿那件大衣太厚了。||||He is mild of manner. 他举止温和。

name: track
interpret: n.轨道；足迹；痕迹；磁轨；途径；vt.循路而行；追踪；通过；用纤拉；vi.追踪
example: 单词 track 的例句||||The new race track is nearly six miles in extent. 这条新跑道将近六英里长。||||The police are on his track. 警察在跟踪他。

name: wrestling
example: 单词 wrestling 的例句||||There is a wrestling match tonight. 今晚有摔交比赛。||||He defaulted in the wrestling tournament. 他在摔跤比赛中弃权了。

name: whistle
interpret: n.口哨，汽笛，啸啸声，口哨声；vi. 吹口哨，鸣汽笛，发嘘嘘声；vt.用口哨通知
example: 单词 whistle 的例句||||We heard the whistle of a train. 我们听到了火车的汽笛声。||||He gave a loud whistle of surprise. 他吹了一声响亮的口哨表示惊讶。

name: romantic
interpret: adj.浪漫的，风流的，传奇性的，夸大的，想象的，浪漫派的
example: 单词 romantic 的例句||||She thinks it will be romantic to be an actress. 她认为当个女演员会很浪漫。||||Her husband is very romantic. 她丈夫非常浪漫。

name: typhoon
example: 单词 typhoon 的例句||||A typhoon is now approaching Hong Kong. 台风现正逼近香港。||||The typhoon hit the coastal areas. 台风侵袭沿海地区。

name: broom
example: 单词 broom 的例句||||She is sweeping with a broom. 她在用扫帚扫地。|||| He stood his broom behind the door. 他把扫帚立在门后。

name: architect
example: 单词 architect 的例句||||His father is a notable architect. 他的父亲是一个著名的建筑师。||||The new building was built from the design of a famous architect. 这座新楼是根据一位著名建筑师的设计建成的。

name: accountant
example: 单词 accountant 的例句||||I'm an accountant at a foreign bank. 我在一家外资银行做会计。||||He was satisfied with his earnings as an accountant. 他对自己会计师的收入很满意。

name: Korea
example: 单词 Korea 的例句||||Korea lies to the east of China. 韩国位于中国东面。||||Korea and China are separated only by the Yalu River. 朝鲜和中国只隔一条鸭绿江。

name: pillow
interpret: n.枕头；枕垫；vt.作…的枕头；垫；枕于；vi.靠在枕上
example: 单词 pillow 的例句||||He fell asleep as soon as he touched the pillow. 他脑袋一碰枕头就睡着了。||||She was found asleep on a pillow of leaves. 有人看见她枕着树叶睡着了。

name: weightlifting
example: 单词 weightlifting 的例句||||How many referees are there in a weightlifting competition? 举重比赛有多少个裁判员？||||Is weightlifting an ancient sport? 举重是一项古老的运动吗？

name: firefighter
example: 单词 firefighter 的例句||||John is a New York City firefighter. 约翰是纽约市的一名消防员。||||I want to be a firefighter. 我想要做一名消防员。

name: amuse
interpret: vt.娱乐，逗乐，使高兴，使有趣
example: 单词 amuse 的例句||||Tom makes up stories to amuse his little brother. 汤姆编故事逗他的小弟弟。||||I often amuse myself with reading. 我常以读书自乐。

name: volume
example: 单词 volume 的例句||||This volume records the history of the country's revolution. 这卷书记载了这个国家的革命历史。||||The volume of this container is 1000 cubic metres. 这个集装箱的容量是1000立方米。

name: reserve
interpret: n.储备（物），储藏量，预备队；vt.储备，保存，保留，预定，预约
example: 单词 reserve 的例句||||We'll reserve the ticket for you till tomorrow noon. 票为您保留到明天中午。||||This area was once a wildlife reserve. 该地区曾是一个野生动物保护区。

name: wrap
interpret: n.外套，围巾，包裹，限制，约束，秘密；vt.包装，卷，缠绕，包，裹，覆盖，遮蔽，隐藏
example: 单词 wrap 的例句||||You'd better wrap it with a piece of clean cloth. 你最好用一块干净的布把它包起来。||||You can wrap the skirt around your waist. 你可以把裙子围在腰间。

name: maid
example: 单词 maid 的例句||||I have sent my maid away. 我已把我的女仆解雇了。|||| A maid in white is walking along the boardwalk. 一位白衣少女漫步于海边的木板路上。

name: completely
example: 单词 completely 的例句||||She never completely gave up hope. 她从不完全放弃希望。||||I feel completely in the dark on this question. 这件事使我感到茫然。

name: elderly
example: 单词 elderly 的例句||||He is getting elderly. 他逐渐变老了。||||The elderly man is quite energetic. 这位上了年纪的老人仍精力充沛。

name: faint
interpret: n.昏厥，昏倒；adj.微弱的，无力的，模糊的；vi.昏倒，变得微弱
example: 单词 faint 的例句||||He felt faint at the sight of blood. 他一见到血就发晕了。||||She threw me a faint smile. 她对我微微一笑。

name: resemble
example: 单词 resemble 的例句||||The two boys nearly resemble each other. 这两个男孩极相象。||||They resemble each other in one respect. 他们有一点彼此相似。

name: BBC
interpret: abbr.（=British Broadcasting Corporation）英国广播公司
example: 单词 BBC 的例句||||She works for the BBC. 她为英国广播公司工作。|||| The BBC was founded in 1922. 英国广播公司建于1922年。

name: possess
interpret: vt.持有，占有，使拥有，克制，支配，迷住
example: 单词 possess 的例句||||To possess wealth is not always to be happy. 拥有财富未必一定幸福。||||Some animals possess the characteristic of man. 有些动物具有人类的特征。

name: footprint
example: 单词 footprint 的例句||||I was standing inside a footprint! 我刚才站在一个脚印里！ ||||She was staring at the footprint, full of fear. 她盯着脚印，内心充满了恐惧。

name: horizon
example: 单词 horizon 的例句||||The sun rises above the horizon. 太阳升起在地平线上。||||He descried an island far away on the horizon. 他看到遥远的地平线上有个岛屿。

name: contrast
interpret: vt.使与…对比，使与…对照；vi. 与…形成对照；n.对比，对照，差异
example: 单词 contrast 的例句||||In contrast with her sister, she is very tall. 与姐姐相比，她个子很高。||||Black hair is a sharp contrast to the white skin. 黑发白肤形成鲜明的对照。

name: spill
interpret: n.溢出，溅出，涌出，摔下，暴跌，溢出量，木片，小塞子；vt.使溢出，使散落，洒
example: 单词 spill 的例句||||The coffee is so full that it might spill over. 咖啡太满可能会溢出来。||||He took a spill when he rode the horse. 他骑马时从马上跌了下来。

name: telegram
interpret: n.电报；vt.用电报发送(打电报)
example: 单词 telegram 的例句||||Will you hand on this telegram to your friend? 你把这份电报转交给你的朋友好吗？||||I've got your telegram. 我已经收到了你的电报。

name: wrist
example: 单词 wrist 的例句||||They took her by the wrist. 他们握住她的手腕。|||| He received a bullet in the wrist. 他手腕上中了一弹。

name: politics
interpret: n.政治，政治学；政纲，政见，策略
example: 单词 politics 的例句||||They seldom talk on politics in those days. 那时人们很少谈论政治。||||The two brothers differed about politics. 这兄弟俩政见不同。

name: analyse
example: 单词 analyse 的例句||||The teacher tried to analyse the cause of our failure. 教师设法仔细分析我们失败的原因。||||Analyse the situation before you act. 行动前分析一下形势。

name: punctual
interpret: adj.严格守时的；正确的，精确的；点状的
example: 单词 punctual 的例句||||I have to go now because I must be punctual for class. 我现在不得不走了，因为我得准时去上课。||||If you are punctual you are not late. 如果你严守时间，你就不会迟到。

name: intention
example: 单词 intention 的例句||||I'm sorry I offended you, but it wasn't my intention. 对不起，冒犯你了，但我绝不是有意的。||||We understood her intention. 我们明白了她的心意。

name: recite
example: 单词 recite 的例句||||He is going to recite a poem. 他将要朗诵一首诗。|||| He can recite that poem from memory. 他能凭记忆背诵那首诗。

name: satisfy
interpret: vi. 令人满意；令人满足 vt. 满足；说服，使相信；使满意，使高兴
example: 单词 satisfy 的例句||||Her father tried his best to satisfy her demands. 她的父亲想尽一切办法来满足她的要求。||||She is too poor to satisfy her family's material needs. 她太穷了，无法满足家人的物质需要。

name: separate
interpret: n.分开，抽印本；adj.分开的，各自的，单独的；v.分开，隔开，分居
example: 单词 separate 的例句||||Are they joined together or separate? 它们是合在一起还是分开的？||||Separate the white clothes from the dark ones before laundering. 洗衣前应当把浅色衣服和深色衣服分开。

name: humorous
interpret: adj.富幽默感的，滑稽的，诙谐的
example: 单词 humorous 的例句||||He is quite humorous. 他很幽默。||||The book takes a humorous look at parenthood. 这本书以幽默的笔触论述了父母的身份。

name: vehicle
interpret: n.车辆，交通工具，运载工具；媒介，表现手段
example: 单词 vehicle 的例句||||Air is the vehicle of sound. 空气是声音传播的媒介。||||The power plant burns used vehicle tyres as fuel. 这家电厂用废弃轮胎作燃料。

name: victory
example: 单词 victory 的例句||||Victory will never come if we only wait for it. 如果我们光是等待，胜利永远不会到来。||||It can't be questioned that we will win the final victory. 我们将最终取得胜利，这是确定无疑的。

name: warn
example: 单词 warn 的例句||||I must warn you that my patience is almost at an end. 我必须警告你我已经没有耐心了。||||If you warn me in advance, I will have your order ready for you. 你若预先通知我，我就能给您准备好了。

name: prisoner
example: 单词 prisoner 的例句||||The soldier reported that a prisoner was at large. 士兵报告说一名囚犯在逃。||||The police tried to break down the prisoner's opposition. 警察设法制住了那个囚犯的反抗。

name: motorcycle
example: 单词 motorcycle 的例句||||Tom went there by motorcycle. 汤姆乘摩托车去的那儿。||||He was also the first person in town to buy a motorcycle. 他也是镇里第一个买摩托车的人。

name: policy
example: 单词 policy 的例句||||This policy is very tough. 这个政策是很强硬的。|||| The country has always pursued a policy of peace. 该国一直奉行和平政策。

name: silent
interpret: adj.安静的，不吵闹的，沉默的，无言的；n.(复数)默剧
example: 单词 silent 的例句||||Immediately on his beginning to speak, everyone was silent. 他一讲话，大家顿时安静下来。||||The boys looked at the conjuror in silent wonder. 孩子们目瞪口呆地看着那魔术师。

name: solid
interpret: adj.固体的，结实的，可靠的，实心的；n.固体，实心；adv. 一致地
example: 单词 solid 的例句||||Water may change from a liquid to a solid. 水可以由液体变为固体。||||I know that James is a solid type of person. 我知道詹姆斯是个可信赖的人。

name: sudden
interpret: n.突然，忽然；adj.突然的，意外的，快速的
example: 单词 sudden 的例句||||All of a sudden he turned about and saw me. 他突然转过身来看见了我。||||The horse was badly frightened by the sudden noise. 那匹马被突然而来的嘈杂声吓坏了。

name: wound
interpret: n.创伤，伤口，伤疤，伤害，痛苦；vt.伤害，损害，使受伤；vi.打伤，伤害；wind的过去式和过去分词
example: 单词 wound 的例句||||There was a gush of blood from the wound. 血从伤口流出。||||The nurse gently mopped the blood from the wound. 护士轻轻地抹去伤口上的血。

name: housewife
example: 单词 housewife 的例句||||The cleverest housewife can't cook a meal without rice. 巧妇难为无米之炊。||||She was a housewife of experience. 她是一个有经验的主妇。

name: fierce
interpret: adj.凶猛的，残忍的；狂热的，强烈的
example: 单词 fierce 的例句||||The soldiers got ready for a fierce battle. 战士们准备进行一场恶战。||||What he said met with fierce opposition. 他的话语遭到激烈反对。

name: garlic
example: 单词 garlic 的例句||||His breath smells of garlic. 他的呼气中有大蒜气味。||||This dish smells of garlic. 这菜有大蒜味。

name: firewood
example: 单词 firewood 的例句||||Turn the firewood over and sun it. 把柴火翻过来晒晒。||||He cut down the tree and cut it up for firewood. 他把树砍倒，并把它劈成烧火用的小块。

name: peanut
example: 单词 peanut 的例句||||We don't have peanut oil in our family. 我们家不吃花生油。||||The peanut develops below the ground. 花生在地下结果。

name: classical
interpret: adj.古典的；古典文学的；正统派的；古典主义的
example: 单词 classical 的例句||||This classical poem is hard to understand. 这首古诗很费解。||||She listens to classical music for relaxation. 她听古典音乐放松。

name: barrier
example: 单词 barrier 的例句||||You must show your ticket at the barrier. 你在关卡处必须出示许可证。||||The driver jumped a horse over a barrier. 骑手骑马跳过障碍。

name: recipe
example: 单词 recipe 的例句||||What is your recipe for success? 你取得成功有什麽窍门？||||This recipe is certainly interesting and different. 这种烹饪法的确很有意思而且与众不同。

name: frozen
example: 单词 frozen 的例句||||He was frozen to death on a snowing night. 在一个风雪的晚上，他被冻死了。||||The weather is cold and the ground is frozen. 天寒地冻。

name: gradually
example: 单词 gradually 的例句||||The roaring sea gradually calmed down. 咆哮的大海逐渐平静下来。||||Gradually he became silent. 渐渐地他变得沉默寡言了。

name: deny
interpret: vt.否定，否认；拒绝相信，拒绝接受，拒绝给予；vi.否定，拒绝
example: 单词 deny 的例句||||Don't imagine you can deny that. 你休想低赖。|||| He didn't deny the facts. 他没有否认这些事实。

name: accuse
interpret: vt.指责，控告，归咎于；vi.指责，控告
example: 单词 accuse 的例句||||I've been wrong to accuse him. 我指责他是不正确的。||||Make sure of your facts before you accuse him. 在指责他以前要把材料核实一下。

name: multiply
interpret: vt. 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘 vi. 乘；繁殖；增加；adv.多样地，多倍地，多重地
example: 单词 multiply 的例句||||His son is learning to multiply and divide. 他儿子正在学习乘法和除法。||||These creatures can multiply quickly. 这些动物能迅速繁殖。

name: regularly
interpret: adv.有规则地，一丝不苟地，正式地
example: 单词 regularly 的例句||||Check the engine oil level regularly. 要时常检查机油量。||||We meet regularly to discuss business. 我们定期会面讨论事务。

name: erupt
example: 单词 erupt 的例句||||It's like a volcano ready to erupt. 这就像一座即将喷发的火山。||||A regional conflict would erupt into violent warfare. 地区性冲突会演变成一场大战。

name: bacon
example: 单词 bacon 的例句||||He is frying the bacon. 他在煎咸肉。||||This bacon is too salty for me. 这块熏咸猪肉我觉得太咸了。

name: cosy
example: 单词 cosy 的例句||||We spent a cosy evening chatting by the fire. 我们在炉火旁聊天度过了一个舒适的晚上。||||It was so warm and cosy in bed that Simon didn't want to get out. 床上温暖而又舒适，西蒙简直不想下床了。

name: conductor
interpret: n.领队，指挥；售票员，列车员；导体
example: 单词 conductor 的例句||||The conductor handed the sick man out of the bus. 售票员扶病人下公共汽车。||||Copper is a good conductor of heat. 铜是热的良导体。

name: shuttle
interpret: n.往返汽车（列车、飞机），航天飞机，梭子，穿梭；vi.穿梭往返；vt.使穿梭般来回移动；短程穿梭般运送
example: 单词 shuttle 的例句||||Light travels like an arrow, and time like a shuttle. 光阴似箭，日月如梭。||||The space shuttle is touching down. 那架航天飞机正在着陆。

name: extremely
example: 单词 extremely 的例句||||The film is extremely good, I just cannot miss it. 这部电影太精彩了，我非看不可。||||The old man was extremely difficult to get along with. 这个老人极难相与。

name: left-handed
example: 单词 left-handed 的例句||||She played left-handed to give her opponent a fair chance. 她用左手进行比赛以给对手一个较大的机会。||||If you do most things with your left hand, you are left-handed. 如果你用左手做大部分事情，你就是左撇子。

name: ancestor
example: 单词 ancestor 的例句||||This machine is the ancestor of the modern computer. 这台机器是现代电脑的始祖。||||She has worshipped her ancestor. 她已拜过她的祖先。

name: plot
interpret: vt. 密谋；绘图；划分；标绘 vi. 密谋；策划；绘制；n.小块土地，地区图，图，阴谋，情节；vt.划分，绘图，密谋；vi.密谋，策划
example: 单词 plot 的例句||||The plot of the film is simply dreamed up. 这个电影的情节完全是虚构的。||||It was two young reporters who uncovered the whole plot. 是两位年轻记者揭露了整个阴谋。

name: rocky
interpret: adj.岩石的，像岩石的；多岩石的
example: 单词 rocky 的例句||||She drives carefully up the rocky lane. 她驾车小心地从这条很多石头的小路上驶过去。||||There is only one port along this rocky coast. 这个多岩石的海岸只有一个港口。

name: straw
interpret: n.稻草，麦杆，吸管；adj.用稻草做的，用来作稻草的，麦杆色的，无价值的，象稻草人的，非正式民意测验所发现的
example: 单词 straw 的例句||||The old peasant is twisting pieces of straw into a rope. 这位老农民正把稻草搓成绳子。||||May I have a straw for my drink? 给我一根喝饮料的吸管好吗？

name: muscle
example: 单词 muscle 的例句||||The heart is made of muscle. 心脏是肌肉组织。||||He is a man of muscle. 他是个大力士。

name: bookmark
example: 单词 bookmark 的例句||||I created a bookmark for my favourite website. 我为自己最喜欢的网址创建了一个书签。||||The bookmark is deleted from the list. 书签从列表中删除。

name: keeper
interpret: n.管理人，看守人，看护人，饲养员
example: 单词 keeper 的例句||||He found a job as a keeper. 他找到了一份当饲养员的工作。||||He might lose his job as keeper. 他也许会丢掉他当监护人的职位吧。

name: penfriend
example: 单词 penfriend 的例句||||Helen wants to find a penfriend. 海伦想要找一个笔友。||||I have not received any message from my penfriend for almost half an year. 我已经大约半年没接到我笔友的消息了。

name: appearance
example: 单词 appearance 的例句||||In appearance, he was a little like his father. 他看起来有点像他的父亲。||||She was a young woman of good appearance. 她是一位年轻貌美的女子。

name: celebration
example: 单词 celebration 的例句||||The celebration passed off successfully. 庆祝活动圆满结束。||||The celebration of Christmas is a custom. 庆祝圣诞节是一种习俗。

name: hairstyle
example: 单词 hairstyle 的例句||||Do you like my new hairstyle? 你喜欢我的新发型吗？||||This hairstyle is in the fashion. 这种发型现在很时髦。

name: superstar
example: 单词 superstar 的例句||||And he is a superstar. 而且他还是一位超级明星。|||| She has all the earmarks of a superstar. 她具备超级明星的一切特征。

name: congratulation
example: 单词 congratulation 的例句||||I sent her a gift as a token of my congratulation. 我给她寄去一件礼物表示祝贺。||||He has received many letters in congratulation of his birthday. 他收到许多祝贺他生日的信件。

name: donate
interpret: vt. 捐赠；捐献 vi. 捐赠；捐献
example: 单词 donate 的例句||||They used to donate to the Red Cross every year. 他们每年捐钱给红十字会。||||She is willing to donate money to a worthy cause. 她愿为高尚的事业捐款。

name: location
example: 单词 location 的例句||||It is a suitable location for a new school. 那是建一所新学校的合适地点。||||I have to find a convenient location for the shelves. 我得找一合适的地方放这些书架。

name: questionnaire
example: 单词 questionnaire 的例句||||Headteachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire. 校长们将被要求完成一份问卷调查。||||It took me quite a while to fill out the questionnaire. 填写那份问卷花了我好长一段时间。

name: vitamin
example: 单词 vitamin 的例句||||Oranges are rich in vitamin C. 橙子富含维生素C。|||| Vitamin pills make up what you lack in your diet. 维生素丸可补充你食物中所缺乏的营养。

name: California
example: 单词 California 的例句||||He was elected governor of the state of California. 他当选为加州州长。||||We were driving on a California freeway. 我们正沿着加利福尼亚的一条快车道驾车行驶。

name: route
interpret: n.路径，途径，路线；vt.确定路线，按规定路线发送
example: 单词 route 的例句||||On the way home, we took an indirect route. 回家的路上，我们绕了一个大圈。||||The plane did not fly the usual commercial route. 飞机没有沿通常的商业航线飞。

name: farewell
example: 单词 farewell 的例句||||He made his farewell to his family. 他向他的家人告别。||||We gave him a farewell dinner. 我们设宴为他饯行。

name: signature
example: 单词 signature 的例句||||Make sure that you get it down and his signature on it. 你一定要把它记下来，并让他在上面签字。||||Each person's signature is unique. 每个人的签名都是独一无二的。

name: bush
example: 单词 bush 的例句||||This bush has grown up a lot in the last few months. 这矮树丛几个月来已向上长高了很多。||||A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush. 一鸟在手，胜于二鸟在林。

name: gram
example: 单词 gram 的例句||||Your letter is fifty gram overweight. 您的信超重50克。||||The packet weigh twenty-five gram. 这个包裹重二十五克。

name: mosquito
example: 单词 mosquito 的例句||||I slapped at the mosquito but missed. 我打蚊子，但没打中。||||I was bitten in the leg by a mosquito. 我腿上被蚊子叮了一口。

name: grateful
interpret: adj.感谢的，感激的，受欢迎的，表示谢意的
example: 单词 grateful 的例句||||If you will help us, we shall be very grateful. 如果你愿意帮助我们，我们会很感激你。||||He closed his letter with expression of grateful thanks. 他在那封信的结尾表达了自己的感激之情。

name: miner
example: 单词 miner 的例句||||He was a miner all his working life. 他一辈子都是矿工。||||I think it is dangerous to be a miner. 我认为当矿工是很危险的。

name: personality
example: 单词 personality 的例句||||Einstein was a great personality. 爱因斯坦是个伟大的人物。||||She has a powerful personality. 她有坚强的个性。

name: drama
example: 单词 drama 的例句||||He acted his part very well in the French drama. 他在这出法国戏剧中演得很成功。||||The college published a drama review. 学院出版了一份戏剧评论刊物。

name: lap
interpret: n.(坐立时)大腿的前部，膝部；(跑道的)一圈
example: 单词 lap 的例句||||She is still going strong on the last lap. 她在跑最后一圈时仍然劲头很足。||||She was sitting with her hands on her lap. 她坐着，把手放到膝上。

name: edge
interpret: n.边(缘)；刃；优势；v.侧着移动，徐徐移动
example: 单词 edge 的例句||||Sight along the edge to see if it's straight. 顺着边目测，看看直不直。||||She lived on the extreme edge of the forest. 她住在森林的最边缘。

name: scale
example: 单词 scale 的例句||||The scale of this map is an inch to a mile. 这张地图的比例尺是一英寸代表一英里。||||He's in business on a small scale. 他做的是小本生意。

name: farmland
example: 单词 farmland 的例句||||They own 200 acres of farmland. 他们拥有200英亩的农田。||||If this wet land was drained, it would be good farmland. 如果把这块湿地的水排干，这块地就会成为良田。

name: fluent
example: 单词 fluent 的例句||||She is fluent in five languages. 她通晓五种语言。||||My father speaks fluent English. 我父亲讲一口流利的英语。

name: dustbin
example: 单词 dustbin 的例句||||These old shoes can go in the dustbin now. 这对旧鞋子现在可以进垃圾箱了。||||We put waste in the dustbin. 我们把废弃物扔进垃圾箱里。

name: generous
interpret: adj.慷慨的，大方的，慷慨给予的
example: 单词 generous 的例句||||She was kind and generous. 她心地善良，宽容大量。||||She was generous with her money. 她很乐于仗义疏财。

name: willing
interpret: adj.愿意的，自愿的，乐意的，心甘情愿的
example: 单词 willing 的例句||||We never lack food and clothing if we're willing to work. 如果我们愿意工作,就不会缺吃少穿。||||He's quite willing to pay the price I ask. 他很愿意照我的要价付钱。

name: eyesight
example: 单词 eyesight 的例句||||Her eyesight grew so bad that she could hardly see. 她的视力变得很糟，几乎什么也看不见了。|||| Everyone should pay attention to preserving his own eyesight. 每人都应注意保护视力。

name: humour
interpret: n.幽默，诙谐，情绪，体液；vt.使满足，迁就
example: 单词 humour 的例句||||We can't always humour the child the way we do. 不能总是顺着孩子。||||His new play is a mixture of saddness and humour. 他的新剧本融悲哀和幽默于一体。

name: softball
interpret: n.垒球(与棒球相似，但球场较小，球大而软)
example: 单词 softball 的例句||||The softball is solid. 垒球是实心的。||||I love sports, like volleyball and softball. 我喜欢体育运动比如排球和垒球。

name: senior
interpret: adj.年长的；资格较老的，地位较高的；n.年长者，前辈；大学高年级学生
example: 单词 senior 的例句||||My brother is senior to me by two years. 我哥哥比我年长两岁。||||They are senior students. 他们是高年级学生。

name: seagull
example: 单词 seagull 的例句||||A seagull skims the water. 海鸥掠过水面。||||A small dog barked at a seagull he was chasing. 小狗对着它正在追赶的一只海鸥吠叫。

name: sparrow
example: 单词 sparrow 的例句||||The boy has got a hen sparrow. 那男孩抓到一只雌雀。||||A sparrow may be small but it has all the vital organs. 麻雀虽小,五脏俱全。

name: shelter
interpret: n.掩蔽，掩蔽处，避身处；庇护所，避难所，庇护；vt.庇护，保护，隐匿；vi.躲避
example: 单词 shelter 的例句||||We took shelter from the rain in a cave. 我们在一个山洞里避雨。||||Trees are a shelter from the sun. 树木可以遮挡阳光。

name: rare
interpret: adj.稀罕的，罕有的，珍贵的，稀薄的，半熟的，非常的；adv.非常
example: 单词 rare 的例句||||It is rare to see a man over 160 years old. 很少见到一个人能活到160岁。||||The zoo has a lot of rare animals in it. 这个动物园有许多珍奇的动物。

name: polar
interpret: adj.两极的，极地的，南辕北辙的，南极的，北极的，极性的；n.极线，极面
example: 单词 polar 的例句||||It's very cold in the polar regions. 南北极地带是很寒冷的。||||Love and hatred are polar feelings. 爱与恨是完全相反的感情。

name: manners
example: 单词 manners 的例句||||You should mend your manners. 你的态度应当纠正。|||| His manners are rough, but he is a kind man at heart. 他虽然举止粗鲁，但心地善良。

name: unnecessary
interpret: adj.不必要的，无用的，无益的
example: 单词 unnecessary 的例句||||There's no sense in taking unnecessary risks. 做不必要的冒险毫无意义。||||It's unnecessary to go into details. 无须细说。

name: frost
interpret: n.霜，冰冻，冷漠；vt.覆着霜，冻结，结霜；vi.受冻，起霜
example: 单词 frost 的例句||||A lot of crops were damaged by the frost. 这次霜冻，受害的庄稼不少。||||Try to harvest the fruit before the first frost. 在第一次霜冻以前要设法把水果收摘完。

name: incorrect
example: 单词 incorrect 的例句||||Your answer is incorrect. 你的回答不正确。||||The method is incorrect. 方法不对头。

name: loss
interpret: n.损失，遗失，失败，输，浪费，错过，[军]伤亡，降低
example: 单词 loss 的例句||||His death was a great loss to the country. 他的逝世对这个国家是一大损失。||||Because of the continued loss, the factory closed down. 由于连续亏损，工厂关闭了。

name: suitable
example: 单词 suitable 的例句||||Tomorrow will be quite suitable. 明天挺合适。|||| Is she suitable for the job? 她适于做这工作吗？

name: fluently
example: 单词 fluently 的例句||||He speaks English very fluently. 他说英语说得很流利。||||He could speak English as fluently as an Englishman. 他说英语和英国人一样流利。

name: victim
example: 单词 victim 的例句||||What is your relationship with the victim? 您与受害人的关系？||||The victim was found lying dead on the river bank. 发现被害人倒毙于河岸。

name: arrival
example: 单词 arrival 的例句||||She's impatient for her father's arrival. 她急切地盼望着父亲的到来。||||The new arrival was none other than the President. 刚到的不是别人，正是总统。

name: hectare
example: 单词 hectare 的例句||||A hectare is equal to 15 mu. 1公顷合15市亩。|||| The lands were to be sold at $2. 50 per hectare. 土地的售价为每公顷2.50美元。

name: sandstorm
example: 单词 sandstorm 的例句||||Have you watched the news about sandstorm? 你看沙尘暴的新闻了吗？||||In the next few days there will be a sandstorm. 未来的几天将有沙尘暴。

name: signal
example: 单词 signal 的例句||||This is a signal failure. 这是明显的失败。||||A train must not pass a signal that is at danger. 火车切不可越过危险信号。

name: warning
interpret: n.警告，告诫，训诫，警戒，警报
example: 单词 warning 的例句||||The other side paid no attention to our warning. 对方不重视我方的警告。||||He realized that his doctor was warning him off drink. 他意识到医生在告诫他戒酒。

name: e.g.
example: 单词 e.g. 的例句||||They keep animals, e.g.goats and cattle. 他们饲养家畜，例如山羊和牛。||||The verb should be in the plural, e.g."have" in "they have". 这个动词应用复数形式，如：theyhave中的have。

name: etc.
example: 单词 etc. 的例句||||We had better buy tea, sugar, etc. 我们最好买些茶、糖等等。||||Plastics are used in many modern articles instead of metal, wood, etc. 塑料在许多现代用品中被用来代替金属、木材等。

name: km
example: 单词 km 的例句||||Our speed averaged out at 50 km an hour. 我们的平均速度是每小时50公里。||||The car runs ten km.per litre gas. 这辆汽车每升汽油跑10公里。

name: advertise
interpret: vt. 通知；为…做广告；使突出 vi. 做广告，登广告；作宣传
example: 单词 advertise 的例句||||It is worth to advertise. 做广告是值得的。||||Are lawyers allowed to advertise? 准许律师做广告吗？

name: benefit
interpret: n.好处，益处，福利；vt.有益于，对…有益；vi.受益于
example: 单词 benefit 的例句||||The money is to be used for the benefit of the poor. 这笔钱用来为穷人谋福利。||||He thought he would benefit from going to school. 他认为上学对他有好处。

name: convenient
example: 单词 convenient 的例句||||I have to find a convenient location for the shelves. 我得找一合适的地方放这些书架。||||Come at any time that is convenient to you. 你哪会儿方便就哪会儿来吧。

name: carelessness
example: 单词 carelessness 的例句||||You should make an apology to her for your carelessness. 你应该为你的粗心大意向她赔礼道歉。||||I have been punished for my carelessness. 我因粗心而被处罚。

name: Alps
example: 单词 Alps 的例句||||I'm going skating in the Alps next month. 下个月我去阿尔卑斯山滑雪。||||The river springs in the Alps. 这条河发源于阿尔卑斯山脉。

name: interrupt
example: 单词 interrupt 的例句||||It is not polite to interrupt when someone is talking. 在别人讲话时插嘴是不礼貌的。||||You'd better not interrupt him. He is sleeping. 你最好别打扰他，他在睡觉。

name: rot
interpret: n.腐烂，腐蚀，败坏；vi.腐烂，烂，堕落，憔悴；vt.使腐烂，使腐朽，使堕落
example: 单词 rot 的例句||||Dead plants rot and become part of the soil again. 枯死的植物腐烂，又成为土壤的一部分。||||Much rain will make the fruit rot. 这么多雨会使水果腐烂。

name: trap
interpret: vt.使陷入困境，使受限制；设陷，坑害；n.陷阱，诡计；困境；活板门，存水弯；（双轮）轻便马车；vi.设圈套，设陷阱
example: 单词 trap 的例句||||The hunter laid a trap for the tiger. 猎人设置了陷阱捕捉老虎。||||Cheese is very good for luring a mouse into a trap. 奶酪是引诱老鼠上钩的极好的东西。

name: burst
interpret: vi.（burst，burst）爆炸；爆破；爆裂；爆发；vt.使…破裂；使…炸破；n.突然破裂；爆发
example: 单词 burst 的例句||||We all held our breath till the bomb burst. 我们屏住呼吸直到炸弹爆炸。||||She suddenly burst into song. 她突然唱起歌来。

name: storey
example: 单词 storey 的例句||||There's a nine-storey apartment building next to the bank. 银行旁边有一座九层高的宿舍大楼。||||Tom's sister says he is weak in the upper storey. 汤姆的妹妹说他脑子笨。

name: costume
example: 单词 costume 的例句||||She had excellent taste in costume. 她对衣着特别讲究。||||The kimono is part of the national costume of Japan. 和服是日本民族服装的一部分。

name: legend
example: 单词 legend 的例句||||This is a popular legend. 这是一个民间传说。|||| According to ancient legend, the river is a goddess. 据古代传说，这条河是位女神。

name: teens
example: 单词 teens 的例句||||His son is in his teens. 他的儿子十几岁。||||She's not yet out of her teens. 她还不到二十岁。

name: sculpture
interpret: n.雕刻，雕塑；vt.雕刻，雕塑；vi.当雕刻师
example: 单词 sculpture 的例句||||He is skilled in sculpture. 他精于雕刻。||||His sculpture of a horse won first prize. 他雕塑的一匹马获得一等奖。

name: cafeteria
example: 单词 cafeteria 的例句||||In the cafeteria we serve ourselves. 在自助餐馆我们是自己拿菜的。||||I can't stand eating in the cafeteria. 我实在不想在自助食堂吃了。

name: responsible
interpret: adj.有责任的，应负责的；可靠的，可信赖的；责任重大的；vi.休息，睡；静止，停止
example: 单词 responsible 的例句||||He must be responsible to me for this matter. 这件事他必须对我负责。||||The police are responsible for the preservation of law and order. 警察负责维持法律与秩序。

name: throughout
interpret: adv.到处，自始至终；prep.遍及，贯穿
example: 单词 throughout 的例句||||These magazines are sold at bookstores throughout the country. 这些杂志在全国各地书店均有发售。|||| Guilin is known throughout the world for its scenery. 桂林以山水著称于世。

name: pea
example: 单词 pea 的例句||||They are sowing pea. 他们在种豌豆。||||Every Saturday dad made a beautiful pea and ham soup. 每个星期六爸爸都做美味的豌豆火腿汤。

name: bathtub
example: 单词 bathtub 的例句||||Please let the water out of the bathtub. 请把浴缸里的水放掉。||||Clean out the bathtub when you are done. 洗完澡后请把浴缸洗干净。

name: counter
interpret: n.柜台；计数器；adj.相反的；adv.与…相反地；vt.反对，反击；vi.反对，反击
example: 单词 counter 的例句||||This counter is closed now. 这个柜台现在已停止营业。||||Set the counter to zero and you'll know where the recording starts. 把计数器拨到零，你就会知道录音从哪儿开始。

name: Indonesia
example: 单词 Indonesia 的例句||||You see, I stayed in Indonesia for eight years. 你知道，我在印度尼西亚呆了8年。||||Indonesia has more active volcanoes than any other country. 印尼是世界上活火山最多的国家。

name: mathematics
interpret: n.（用作单）数学；（用作单或复）计算(能力）
example: 单词 mathematics 的例句||||He has come out in front in the study of mathematics. 他在数学方面已名列前茅。||||She is working at a difficult problem in mathematics. 她在做一道数学难题。

name: sailing
example: 单词 sailing 的例句||||Experienced seamen will advise you about sailing in this weather. 有经验的海员会告诉你在这种天气下的航行情况。||||The operation was plain sailing. 手术进行得顺利。

name: delight
interpret: n.高兴，愉快；vt.给（某人）乐趣；使愉快；vi.喜爱
example: 单词 delight 的例句||||Your new book is a real delight! 你的新书真讨人喜欢！ ||||He takes delight in annoying me. 他以惹我生气为乐。

name: click
interpret: n.点击，滴答声，拍答声；v.点击，作滴答声，使...作拍答声
example: 单词 click 的例句||||Click the Allow button on the yellow bar. 点击黄色栏中的允许按钮。||||Click on the links for each city's detailed map. 点击连接看城市地区详细地图。

name: designer
example: 单词 designer 的例句||||Carolyne is a fashion designer. 卡罗琳是一名时装设计师。||||He was a set designer. 他是一个布景设计者。

name: growth
example: 单词 growth 的例句||||All living things depend on the sun for their growth. 万物靠太阳生长。||||Youth is the time of physical growth. 青年时期是长身体的时期。

name: impolite
example: 单词 impolite 的例句||||It is impolite to get a word in. 别人谈话时插嘴是不礼貌的。||||It is very impolite of you to do so to customers. 你这样做对顾客太不客气了。

name: item
interpret: n.项目；条款；（消息，情报等的）一条
example: 单词 item 的例句||||We should go on to the next item for time is short. 时间不多了，我们应该谈下一项内容。||||Put this item on our daily work schedule. 把这项工作提到议事日程上来。

name: introduction
interpret: n.(to)介绍；传入，引进；导言，导论，绪论
example: 单词 introduction 的例句||||The introduction tells you how to use the book. 引言告诉你怎样使用这本书。||||A letter of introduction will ensure you an interview. 凭一封介绍信准保会接待你。

name: interviewer
interpret: n.接见者；会见者；面谈者；记者
example: 单词 interviewer 的例句||||The interviewer asked her to speak into the microphone. 采访者让她对着麦克风说话。||||I was spelling my last name out for the interviewer. 我正在为面试官拼写我最后一个名字。

name: meaningful
interpret: adj.意味深长的；富有意义的
example: 单词 meaningful 的例句||||They exchanged meaningful looks. 他们彼此意味深长地交换了一下眼色。||||The article has a meaningful ending. 这篇文章的结尾意味深长。

name: organizer
example: 单词 organizer 的例句||||A good organizer pays attention to detail. 善于组织者考虑问题无微不至。||||She was the organizer of the meeting. 她是会议的组织者。

name: performer
example: 单词 performer 的例句||||He was the greatest performer we have ever seen. 他是我们所见过的最伟大表演者。||||He is a good performer on the cricket field. 他是个出色的板球手。

name: paragraph
interpret: n.段落，短评；vt.将…分段，分段落；vi.写短评
example: 单词 paragraph 的例句||||Each paragraph begins on a new line. 每段都另起一行。||||There's a paragraph on the matter in the paper. 报纸对这件事有一短篇报道。

name: shiny
interpret: adj.有光泽的，发光的，辉煌的
example: 单词 shiny 的例句||||What shiny shoes you're wearing! 你穿的鞋子擦得真亮啊！  ||||All the cups are clean and shiny. 所有的杯子都很干净明亮。

name: prevention
example: 单词 prevention 的例句||||They have begun to do the prevention of crime. 他们已经开始防止犯罪行为。||||Prevention of forest fires is up to you. 森林防火是你们的责任。

name: traveller
example: 单词 traveller 的例句||||Almost every traveller carried about a camera. 几乎每个旅行者都带着相机。||||It is nothing but a traveller's tale. 这只不过是海外奇谈。

name: unpleasant
interpret: adj.使人不愉快的，使人厌恶的，煞风景的
example: 单词 unpleasant 的例句||||A very unpleasant thing has happened. 一件令人很不愉快的事发生了。||||The kind advices are often unpleasant to the ear. 好言常常不入耳。

name: trail
interpret: n.踪迹，痕迹，一串，尾部，小径，尾，持枪姿势；vt.拖，尾随，追踪，落后于
example: 单词 trail 的例句||||The car raised a trail of dust. 汽车掀起了一股尘土。||||The hound found the trail of the rabbit. 猎狗发现了兔子的踪迹。

name: web
interpret: n.网，蛛丝，蹼，织物，圈套，卷筒纸；vi.生蹼，形成网；vt.织蜘蛛网于，使落入圈套
example: 单词 web 的例句||||The spider weaves a web. 蜘蛛织网。||||You mean the World Wide Web? 你是说国际互联网?

name: voluntary
interpret: adj.自动的，自愿的，故意的，志愿的，非官办的，自发的；n.即兴演奏，志愿者
example: 单词 voluntary 的例句||||She is a voluntary worker at the hospital. 她是这家医院的义工。||||At election time the party needs a lot of voluntary helpers. 大选时，该党需要许多义务帮忙的人。

name: witch
example: 单词 witch 的例句||||The witch changed the prince into a frog. 巫婆把王子变成了青蛙。||||The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl. 狠心的女巫对孤苦无助的小女孩施了妖术。

name: stressed
example: 单词 stressed 的例句||||Loud music makes me stressed out. 大声的音乐让我很紧张。||||He stressed that we should always be honest. 他强调我们应该永远诚实。

name: reward
interpret: n.报酬，酬谢，赏金；vt.奖赏，酬谢，报应
example: 单词 reward 的例句||||He will expect some reward after working so hard. 他工作很努力，会得到报偿的。||||I didn't do it for reward, I did it for love. 我做这件事不是为了报酬，而是出于爱好。

name: rob
interpret: v.抢劫；vi.抢劫，盗窃；vt.非法剥夺，使丧失，抢劫
example: 单词 rob 的例句||||Two men formed a plot to rob the bank. 两人制定了抢劫那家银行的秘密计划。||||They were scheming to rob the bank. 他们在密谋抢劫银行。

name: studio
interpret: n.摄影棚（场）；演播室；画室；工作室
example: 单词 studio 的例句||||They are building a modern studio. 他们正在修建一座现代化的摄影室。||||He had to spend long hours in the recording studio. 他不得不花很长的时间在录音室里。

name: teenage
example: 单词 teenage 的例句||||His voice is very high for a teenage boy. 对一个十几岁的男孩来说，他的嗓音很尖。||||He is too old now for teenage parties. 他年龄太大了，不适于参加少年聚会。

name: series
example: 单词 series 的例句||||The students have put forward a series of questions. 学生们提出了一系列问题。||||He gave forth a series of works in rapid succession. 他很快连续发表了一系列的作品。

name: spaceman
example: 单词 spaceman 的例句||||I want to be a spaceman. 我想当一名宇航员。||||All Chinese are proud of our first spaceman Yang Liwei. 所有的中国人都为我们的第一位太空人杨利伟感到骄傲。

name: viewer
interpret: n.观察者，看电视者，视察员，观察器
example: 单词 viewer 的例句||||Every viewer has his personal rainbow. 每一个观察者各自看到不同的彩虹。||||These images are likely to evoke a strong response in the viewer. 这些图像可能会在观众中产生强烈反响。

name: shortly
interpret: adv.立即，不久；简略地，简言之
example: 单词 shortly 的例句||||You go along with him. I'll come shortly. 你陪陪他，我马上就来。||||He answered my questions rather shortly. 他相当简慢地回答我的问题。

name: theft
example: 单词 theft 的例句||||She served two years in prison for theft. 她因偷窃服了两年刑。||||Theft or murder is a crime. 盗窃或谋杀都是犯罪行为。

name: wisdom
interpret: n.智慧，明智的行为，学识，名言，贤人
example: 单词 wisdom 的例句||||Experience is the mother of wisdom. 经验为智慧之母。||||Ancient Greece was a fountain of wisdom and philosophy. 古希腊是智慧和哲学的发源地。

name: warmth
interpret: n.温暖，温情，暖和，激动，生气
example: 单词 warmth 的例句||||He answered with warmth. 他热情地回答。||||We felt the warmth of the Sun. 我们感受到太阳的温暖。

name: witness
interpret: n.证人，目击者，证据，证明，证词；vt.目击，作证，证明，表明，经历；vi.作证人
example: 单词 witness 的例句||||She was a witness of the incident. 她是事件的目击者。||||A witness was examined by him in a court of law. 他在法庭上质问一个证人。

name: economy
example: 单词 economy 的例句||||We must do our best to develop the national economy. 我们必须努力发展国民经济。||||The country's economy is not very healthy. 国家的经济不很景气。

name: label
interpret: n.卷标，标签，标记；称号，绰号；v.贴标签于，把…称为
example: 单词 label 的例句||||The label is on the inner side of the box. 标签贴在盒子内侧。||||He has been given the label of "playboy". 他被起了个“花花公子”的绰号。

name: underline
interpret: n.下划线；加下划线；vt.在…下面划线；强调
example: 单词 underline 的例句||||Underline all the sentences you do not know. 在你不懂的所有句子下面划一条线。||||Please underline the noun clauses in the passage. 请用线画出短文中的名词性从句。

name: checklist
example: 单词 checklist 的例句||||I was focused on my checklist. 我正专注于任务清单。||||See the general checklist at the beginning of this chapter. 请参阅本章开头的总清单。

name: booklet
example: 单词 booklet 的例句||||Detailed instructions are included in the booklet. 小册子中有详细说明。||||I picked up a free booklet on tooth care at the dentist's. 我在牙医那里拿了一本关于牙齿保健的免费小册子。

name: coral
interpret: n.珊瑚；adj.珊瑚色的，珊瑚红的
example: 单词 coral 的例句||||Kate is wearing a coral necklace. 凯特戴着一条珊瑚项链。||||The ship was wrecked on a coral reef. 这条船在珊瑚暗礁上撞毁了。

name: helper
example: 单词 helper 的例句||||The cook is in charge of the kitchen helper. 这位厨师负责管理厨工。||||She was a voluntary helper. 她是自愿帮忙的。

name: energetic
interpret: adj.充满活力的，精力充沛的
example: 单词 energetic 的例句||||The elderly man is quite energetic. 这位上了年纪的老人仍精力充沛。||||Her mother was a resourceful and energetic woman. 她母亲是一个足智多谋、精力充沛的女人。

name: guilty
example: 单词 guilty 的例句||||There wasn't enough evidence to prove him guilty. 没有充分的证据证明他有罪。||||Really honest people are often made to feel guilty. 真正老实的人常被弄得感到犯了罪似的。

name: characteristic
interpret: adj.特有的，典型的；n.特性，特征，特色
example: 单词 characteristic 的例句||||Bananas have their own characteristic smell. 香蕉有其特有的香味。||||Some animals possess the characteristic of man. 有些动物具有人类的特征。

name: Cheers
example: 单词 Cheers 的例句||||The crowd burst into cheers. 人群中爆发出一片欢呼声。||||To your health! Cheers! 祝您健康！干杯！

name: ballet
example: 单词 ballet 的例句||||Angela studied ballet for six years. 安吉拉学了六年芭蕾舞。||||She is a celebrated star of ballet. 她是一个芭蕾舞明星。

name: breath
interpret: n.呼吸，气息，微风，迹象，精神，一种说话的声音
example: 单词 breath 的例句||||I'm just going out for a breath of fresh air. 我正要出去呼吸新鲜空气。||||While climbing up the stairs the old man always loses his breath. 那老人上楼时总是气喘吁吁的。

name: bleed
interpret: vi.流血，悲痛，渗出；vt.使出血，榨取
example: 单词 bleed 的例句||||If you cut your finger, it will bleed. 如果你割破手指,它会流血。||||The cut on my arm bleed for a long time. 我胳膊上的伤口流了好长时间的血。

name: angel
example: 单词 angel 的例句||||The angel of death is in the house! 死神在屋里呢！  ||||I can say without exaggeration that she is an angel. 我可以毫不夸张地说她是个天使。

name: attractive
interpret: adj.有吸引力的；引起注意的
example: 单词 attractive 的例句||||Bright colours are attractive to children. 鲜艳的颜色对儿童有吸引力。||||The food has an attractive taste. 这食品的味道很诱人。

name: difficulty
interpret: n.困难，费劲；难事，难题；麻烦，困境
example: 单词 difficulty 的例句||||If there is any difficulty, please let us know promptly. 倘有困难，请迅速通知我们。||||A little difficulty like this is nothing to us. 这点困难算不了什么。

name: easy-going
example: 单词 easy-going 的例句||||She is an easy-going girl. 她是一个随和的女孩子。||||The students considered Mrs.Smith an easy-going teacher. 学生们认为史密斯夫人是一位宽容随和的老师。

name: cowboy
example: 单词 cowboy 的例句||||I felt sure I had all the skills to be a cowboy. 我确信自己具备当牛仔的一切本领。||||He loved to see cowboy movies. 他爱看牛仔影片。

name: confirm
example: 单词 confirm 的例句||||I'll call you back to confirm. 我会给你回电话确认的。||||I need to confirm my reservation on the next flight. 我要确认我预订的下一个航班。

name: clue
example: 单词 clue 的例句||||She will clue you in about this. 她将为你提供这方面情况。||||No clue to his whereabouts has been found. 至今没有找到有关他行踪的线索。

name: crime
example: 单词 crime 的例句||||You'll have to pay for your crime. 你得为你的罪行付出代价。||||Crime in our big cities is on the increase. 在我们大城市里犯罪率正在增长。

name: direct
interpret: adj.直接的；直达的；v.指挥；知道；监督；管理
example: 单词 direct 的例句||||This train is direct, you do not have to change. 这辆火车是直达的，你不必换车。||||The army is under the king's direct command. 军队由国王直接统帅。

name: envy
example: 单词 envy 的例句||||I envy your ability to work so fast. 我真羡慕你，能干得这么快。||||I was filled with envy at their adventurous lifestyle. 我很羨慕他们敢于冒险的生活方式。

name: director
interpret: n.主管，导演；主任；理事；董事；处长
example: 单词 director 的例句||||The director has taken the visitors off to his office. 经理把客人带到他办公室去了。||||The new director is easy to get along with. 新来的主任很好处。

name: devote
interpret: vt.将…奉献(给)，把...专用于，致力于
example: 单词 devote 的例句||||I devote myself to helping the poor. 我致力于帮助穷人。||||He is determined to devote his life to sicence. 他决心把毕生精力贡献给科学事业。

name: evidence
interpret: n.明显，显著，明白，迹象，根据，[物]证据，证物
example: 单词 evidence 的例句||||The first signs of spring are in evidence. 春天的最初迹象已显然可见。||||From the evidence I must conclude that you are wrong. 从证据看，我敢断定你错了。

name: arrow
example: 单词 arrow 的例句||||He was shot in the shoulder with an arrow. 他的肩膀被箭射中。||||The letter was nailed to the wall with an arrow. 一支箭把信钉在了墙上。

name: definite
interpret: adj.明确的，肯定的，确定的，限定的
example: 单词 definite 的例句||||It's definite that he will come to help us. 他肯定会来帮助我们。||||We demand a definite answer. 我们要求明确的答案。

name: concrete
interpret: adj.具体的，有形的；n.混凝土 ；v.用混凝土修筑，浇混凝土，凝结
example: 单词 concrete 的例句||||Could you give us a concrete case? 你能不能给我们举个具体事例？||||We should make a concrete analysis of each specific question. 对于每个具体问题要进行具体分析。

name: attraction
interpret: n.吸引人的事物；吸引；吸引力
example: 单词 attraction 的例句||||The main attraction of the place is the nightlife. 这个地方最具吸引力的是夜生活。||||Amy is always the centre of attraction at parties. 艾米总是聚会上的中心人物。

name: electronic
interpret: adj.电子的；n.[-s]电子学，电子设备
example: 单词 electronic 的例句||||It is an electronic device with many uses. 这是一部具有多种用途的电子仪器。||||Father needs a new electronic shaver. 爸爸需要一个新的电子剃须刀。

name: memorial
interpret: adj.记忆的；纪念的；n.纪念碑，纪念堂
example: 单词 memorial 的例句||||We visited the Lincoln Memorial. 我们参观了林肯纪念堂。||||He wrote a memorial of the late author. 他写了一篇纪念这位已故作家的文章。

name: motor
interpret: adj.机动的，有引擎的，汽车的；n.发动机，马达，汽车；v.（用引擎）驱动
example: 单词 motor 的例句||||A washing machine is run by a small electric motor. 洗衣机由一台小电动机驱动。||||The motor usually operates well. 这台发动机通常运转良好。

name: panic
interpret: n.恐慌，惊惶；adj.惊慌的，没有理由的，恐慌的；vt.使惊慌，使狂热；vi.惊慌
example: 单词 panic 的例句||||There was a panic when the building caught fire. 大楼起火时，人们一片惊慌。||||She suddenly got into a panic and stopped her car. 她突然惊慌失措起来，于是停住了车。

name: pause
interpret: vi.暂停，中止，停顿；n.中止，停顿，踌躇，休止符
example: 单词 pause 的例句||||After a little pause, he went on with his speech. 稍停一会儿后，他又继续讲演。||||He made a pause and then went on reading. 他停顿了一下，然后又读下去。

name: quote
interpret: n.引用语，语录；vt.引述，举证，报价；vi.引用
example: 单词 quote 的例句||||I can quote what he said. 我可以引用他的话。|||| This is the best price I can quote you. 这是我给你开出的最有利的价钱了。

name: phrase
example: 单词 phrase 的例句||||The phrase was caught on and immediately became popular. 这个短语被采用后很快就流行了。||||That's exactly the phrase I was looking for. 这就是我一直找的那个短语。

name: scold
interpret: n.好责骂的人，责骂；vi.责骂，唠唠叨叨地骂；vt.怒骂
example: 单词 scold 的例句||||Don't scold the child. It's not his fault. 别责怪那孩子，那不是他的过错。||||His father gave him a bad scold this morning. 他父亲今晨狠狠训了他一顿。

name: politeness
example: 单词 politeness 的例句||||His politeness was only on the surface. 他只是表面上客气。||||Although she hated him, she put on a show of politeness. 尽管她恨他，但还是装出一副很客气的样子。

name: unlike
interpret: adj.不同的，不相似的；prep.不像，和...不同
example: 单词 unlike 的例句||||She's very unlike her mother. 她一点也不像她母亲。||||It's unlike him to be late. He's usually on time. 他不是会迟到的那种人，他通常很准时。

name: thinker
example: 单词 thinker 的例句||||There lived in Greece a great thinker named Aristotle. 希腊有一个名叫亚里斯多德的伟大思想家。|||| He is a loose thinker. 他是个思维不严密的人。

name: statement
example: 单词 statement 的例句||||The government will put out a new statement tomorrow. 政府将于明天发布一项新声明。||||Put down your statement in black and white. 把你的话用白纸黑字写下来。

name: campaign
interpret: n.运动；竞选活动；战役；vi.参加运动；进行竞选；作战
example: 单词 campaign 的例句||||The election campaign heated up in that state. 该州竞选运动激烈起来了。||||The campaign had begun during his absence. 在他不在期间运动已经开始了。

name: immigration
example: 单词 immigration 的例句||||The government has decided to tighten its immigration policy. 政府决定实施更加严格的移民政策。||||Do British immigration laws conflict with any international laws? 英国的移民法与国际法有抵触吗？

name: battery
interpret: n.电池；一批；金属物件；群；【律】殴打
example: 单词 battery 的例句||||He is charging a storage battery. 他在为蓄电池充电。||||The battery has run down. 电池用完了。

name: agricultural
example: 单词 agricultural 的例句||||He was trained for gardening at the Agricultural College. 他在农业大学学园艺。||||France once was an agricultural country. 法国曾是个农业国。

name: focus
interpret: n.焦点，焦距；vi.聚焦，注视；vt.使聚焦，调焦，集中
