example: 单词 focus 的例句||||She was the focus of everyone's attention. 她是大家注意的焦点。||||The noise made it hard for me to focus on work. 噪音让我无法集中注意力工作。

name: firstly
example: 单词 firstly 的例句||||Firstly, you must be loyal to your homeland. 首先，你必须忠于你的祖国。||||Firstly, let us deal with the most important issue. 首先让我们来处理最紧要的问题。

name: dare
interpret: n.敢，挑战；aux.敢；vi.敢；vt.敢于，勇于面对
example: 单词 dare 的例句||||He didn't dare to look at her in the face. 他不敢正眼看她。||||How dare you?  Take your hand off me at once. 放肆！马上把你的手挪开。

name: harmony
interpret: n.调合，协调；和睦，和平相处；(音乐)和声
example: 单词 harmony 的例句||||The couple lives in perfect harmony. 这对夫妇和睦地生活着。||||His ideas were no longer in harmony with ours. 他同我们的想法不再一致了。

name: informal
interpret: adj.非正式的，不拘礼的，通俗的
example: 单词 informal 的例句||||I got an informal reception. 我受到了非正式接待。||||The leaders met over informal lunches. 领袖们在非正式午餐时进行会晤。

name: habitat
example: 单词 habitat 的例句||||The polar region is the habitat of the polar bear. 北极地带为北极熊的栖息地。||||This creature's natural habitat is the jungle. 这种动物的栖息地是丛林。

name: jewellery
example: 单词 jewellery 的例句||||She never wears jewellery. 她从不戴首饰。||||The police recovered the stolen jewellery. 警察追回了失窃的珠宝。

name: lifetime
interpret: n.一生，终身，寿命，使用期限
example: 单词 lifetime 的例句||||He wrote many books during his lifetime. 他一生著作甚多。||||During his lifetime his work was never published. 他的作品在他的有生之年从未出版过。

name: occupation
interpret: n.职业，工作；占领，占据；占用
example: 单词 occupation 的例句||||I haven't entered up your name and occupation yet. 我尚未记下你的名字和职业。||||Reading is a useful occupation to us. 阅读对我们是一种有益的消遣。

name: mourn
example: 单词 mourn 的例句||||We mourn over the child's death. 我们悲悼这孩子的死。||||When the old woman had died, she had very few to mourn for her. 那位老太婆去世的时候，没有什么人哀悼她。

name: practical
interpret: adj.实际的，实践的；实用的，应用的；有实际经验的
example: 单词 practical 的例句||||He is a practical person. 他是位很讲实际的人。|||| Your invention is clever, but not practical. 你的发明很巧，但不实用。

name: occur
example: 单词 occur 的例句||||Didn't it occur to you to close the window? 难道你没有想到去关窗户吗?||||I hope this won't occur again. 我希望不要再发生这种事情。

name: millionaire
example: 单词 millionaire 的例句||||The millionaire put up a lot of money for the church. 这位百万富翁为教会捐了许多钱。||||She wants to marry a millionaire. 她想嫁给一位有钱人。

name: represent
interpret: vt.表现，表示；描绘，讲述；代表，象征；回忆；再赠送，再上演；vi.提出异议
example: 单词 represent 的例句||||I'll represent to him the risk he is running. 我要向他指出他所面临的险境。||||We selected her to represent us. 我们选她作为我们的代表。

name: selfish
interpret: adj.自私的，利己主义的，自我中心的
example: 单词 selfish 的例句||||You must learn to share and not be so selfish. 你一定要学会与他人分享，不要那么自私。||||She is a selfish person. 她是一个自私自利的人。

name: protection
example: 单词 protection 的例句||||The protection of the country is the duty of everyone. 保卫国家是每个人的责任。||||The young in our society need care and protection. 我们社会的年轻人需要关怀和照顾。

name: revise
example: 单词 revise 的例句||||You should revise your opinion of him. 你应该纠正对他的看法。||||In the light of these changes, we must revise our plan. 鉴于这些变化，我们必须重新修订我们的计划。

name: powerful
interpret: adj.有力的，有权力的，强大的
example: 单词 powerful 的例句||||The UN began to get more and more powerful. 联合国开始变得越来越强大了。||||Such are the most powerful voices of our times! 这些就是我们时代的最有力的声音！

name: presentation
interpret: n.赠与，陈述，介绍；表演，展示
example: 单词 presentation 的例句||||Last week we went to the presentation of a new play. 上星期我们去观看了一场新剧的演出。||||The manner of presentation is highly important. 介绍的方式很重要。

name: realistic
interpret: adj.现实的，逼真的，现实主义的，实在论的
example: 单词 realistic 的例句||||She is a realistic woman. 她是位很实际的女人。|||| He will go down in history as a realistic poet. 他将作为一个现实主义诗人而永载史册。

name: heel
example: 单词 heel 的例句||||There is a hole in the heel of one of your socks. 你一只袜子的后跟有个洞。||||I'm training my dog to come to heel. 我在训练我的狗让它紧跟着我。

name: hopeful
interpret: adj.有希望的，怀抱希望的，保持乐观的；n.有希望之人，有前途之人
example: 单词 hopeful 的例句||||This is a hopeful news. 这是个鼓舞人心的消息。|||| We are hopeful about the future. 我们对未来抱乐观态度。

name: non-fiction
example: 单词 non-fiction 的例句||||I prefer non-fiction to fiction. 我喜欢散文类的作品，不喜欢小说类的。||||Another difference in the old readers is their greater use of serious non-fiction. 老读本的另一不同之处是更多地使用了严肃的非故事性文章。

name: outline
interpret: n.大纲，轮廓，概要，要点；v.描画轮廓，描述要点
example: 单词 outline 的例句||||Make an outline before trying to write a composition. 写作文之前先写个提纲。||||Draw an outline before you fill in the details. 先画个轮廓，再画细部。

name: philosophy
example: 单词 philosophy 的例句||||He believed in the philosophy of Russell. 他信奉罗素的哲学。||||I can't sum up his whole philosophy in one sentence. 我无法用一句话来概括他的全部人生观。

name: scratch
interpret: n.草稿，抓痕，搔，抓，擦伤，刮擦声，乱写，零，起跑线，未中的一击；vt.搔，抓，挖出，擦
example: 单词 scratch 的例句||||Scratch my name out please. 请把我的名字划掉。|||| The suggestion is that they should start from scratch. 提出的建议是，他们从头开始。

name: urban
interpret: adj.都市的，住在都市的，习惯于都市的
example: 单词 urban 的例句||||Traffic is a major urban problem. 交通是城市的一个主要问题。||||The spread of urban areas endangers wildlife. 扩大城市面积危害着野生物。

name: territory
interpret: n.领土，领地，版图，地区，活动范围
example: 单词 territory 的例句||||Resources in plenty can be found in this territory. 这一地区能找到大量自然资源。||||Our country has a vast territory and abundant resources. 我国土地辽阔，资源丰富。

name: wheelchair
example: 单词 wheelchair 的例句||||He used a wheelchair for the rest of his life. 他的后半生依靠轮椅生活。||||He collapsed the wheelchair and put it on the boat. 他将轮椅折叠起来放在船上。

name: world-famous
example: 单词 world-famous 的例句||||A world-famous violinist is playing at tonight's concert. 一位世界闻名的小提琴家将在今晚的音乐会上演奏。||||Xi'an is a world-famous city for her ancient culture. 西安是一座举世闻名的文化古城。

name: caller
interpret: n.打电话者，来访者，呼叫者
example: 单词 caller 的例句||||The operator told the caller that the line is busy. 接线员告诉打电话的人对方电话占线。||||The caller is on hold. 那个打电话的人正等着通话。

name: raft
example: 单词 raft 的例句||||I lay on the raft in the Sun until I was dry. 我在阳光下躺在木排上，一直到全身都干了。||||She spent seven days afloat on a raft. 她在一只木筏上漂泊了七天。

name: account
example: 单词 account 的例句||||She left out an important item in her account. 她的账目漏掉了一个重要的项目。||||He has made several withdrawals from his bank account. 他从银行账户上提了几次款。

name: commit
interpret: vt.把…交托给，提交；犯，干；使承担义务，使作出保证
example: 单词 commit 的例句||||He couldn't commit himself on any issue. 他不愿在任何问题上表态。||||A thinking person must commit himself to working for peace. 一个有头脑的人必须致力于为和平而工作。

name: complaint
interpret: n.诉苦，抱怨，牢骚，委屈，疾病
example: 单词 complaint 的例句||||This is a cause of complaint. 这是抱怨的原因。|||| He has a heart complaint. 他有心脏病。

name: essential
interpret: adj.必要的，必不可少的；本质的，基本的；n.要素，要点
example: 单词 essential 的例句||||The essential thing is that the two of you ought to agree. 根本的问题是你们俩应意见一致。||||It is essential for us to know all the facts. 对我们来说，了解所有的事实是必要的。

name: Greek
interpret: adj.希腊(人)的，希腊语的；n.希腊人；希腊语
example: 单词 Greek 的例句||||The Greek seaman went to the hospital five times. 这位希腊海员到该医院去过五次。||||Delta is the fourth letter of the Greek alphabet. δ是希腊字母中的第四个字母。

name: junk
example: 单词 junk 的例句||||I bought this old table in a junk shop. 我在旧货店里买了这张旧桌子。||||They cleared out the junk room to make a tiny beds. 他们将废品间清理用作小卧室。

name: interpreter
example: 单词 interpreter 的例句||||We must allow him to be a good interpreter. 我们必须承认他是个好译员。||||We employ her as an English interpreter. 我们雇用她作英语翻译。

name: locate
interpret: vt.查找…的地点；使…坐落于，位于；vi.居住下来，定居
example: 单词 locate 的例句||||The head company decided to locate in Qingdao. 总公司决定设在青岛。||||The general tried to locate the enemy's site. 那位将军想找出敌人营地的位置。

name: long-term
example: 单词 long-term 的例句||||It isn't a long-term policy. 这不是长久之计。||||We must calculate on a long-term basis. 我们要作长期打算。

name: offering
example: 单词 offering 的例句||||What is your competition offering? 你的竞争者提出的条件是什么？||||The police are offering a big reward for information about the robbery. 警方出大笔赏金要求提供那起抢劫案的破案线索。

name: politician
example: 单词 politician 的例句||||The job of a politician is to serve the whole community. 政治家的职责是为全体大众服务。||||You need to be a bit of a politician to succeed. 你要获得成功，就需要有一点政客的手腕。

name: unforgettable
example: 单词 unforgettable 的例句||||The trip had been unforgettable experience for both of us. 那趟旅行是我们两人难以忘怀的经历。||||He created many unforgettable characters in his novels. 他在他的小说中创造了很多令人难忘的人物。

name: verb
example: 单词 verb 的例句||||The sentence is formed from a verb and two nouns. 这句子由一个动词和两个名词构成。||||These are the finite forms of a verb. 这些是一个动词的限定形式。

name: sunlight
example: 单词 sunlight 的例句||||The room was flooded with warm and golden sunlight. 房间充满着温暖、金色的阳光。||||In the bright sunlight she had to narrow her eyes. 在强烈阳光下她必须眯着双眼。

name: abandon
example: 单词 abandon 的例句||||We had no option but to abandon the meeting. 我们别无选择，只有放弃这次会面。||||They abandon themselves to drinking. 他们沉湎于饮酒。

name: deeply
example: 单词 deeply 的例句||||I do feel deeply the strength of the collective. 我确实深深地感到了集体的力量。||||We're deeply honoured that you should agree to join us. 您能同意加入我们，我们感到很荣幸。

name: consumer
example: 单词 consumer 的例句||||The government instituted a consumer protection agency. 政府设立了一个消费者保护机构。||||The consumer should keep the following considerations in mind. 消费者应该记住以下几点。

name: Auckland
example: 单词 Auckland 的例句||||Auckland is the largest city in New Zealand. 奥克兰是新西兰最大的城市。||||Return to Auckland by bus in afternoon. 下午乘车返回奥克兰。

name: continuously
example: 单词 continuously 的例句||||They are repairing this road continuously. 他们一直在修这条路。||||Our foreign trade is continuously expanding. 我们的对外贸易不断发展。

name: reasonable
interpret: adj.合理的，有道理的；通情达理的，公道的
example: 单词 reasonable 的例句||||Many restaurants do a very reasonable set menu at lunchtime. 许多餐馆中午都提供价钱合理的客饭。||||I'll buy the car if the price is reasonable. 如果价钱公道，我就把这辆车买下。

name: legal
interpret: adj.法律的，依照法律的，合法的，法定的，正当的
example: 单词 legal 的例句||||He is my legal adviser. 他是我的法律顾问。||||This is partly a political and partly a legal question. 这个问题部分是政治问题，部分是法律问题。

name: poverty
interpret: n.贫穷， 贫困， 贫乏， 缺少
example: 单词 poverty 的例句||||We must continue to war against poverty and disease. 我们一定要继续同贫穷和疾病作斗争。|||| He showed his poverty in his knowledge of agriculture. 他表现出缺乏对农业知识的了解。

name: preference
interpret: n.偏爱，优先，优先权，优先的选择
example: 单词 preference 的例句||||What is your preference? 你有什么嗜好？||||A teacher should not show preference for any one of his pupils. 老师不应偏爱任何一个学生。

name: respond
example: 单词 respond 的例句||||I offered him a drink but he did not respond. 我请他喝酒，但他未作回答。||||I greeted him but he didn't respond. 我跟他打招呼，他没答理我。

name: scholarship
example: 单词 scholarship 的例句||||The girl who won the scholarship was quite outstanding. 得奖学金的女孩是相当杰出的。||||I made up my mind to apply for a scholarship. 我决定申请奖学金。

name: threat
interpret: n.威胁，恐吓，造成威胁的事物
example: 单词 threat 的例句||||Never submit to a threat. 永远不要屈服于威胁。|||| There was a threat of typhoon. 有刮台风的兆头。

name: vital
interpret: adj.生死攸关的，重大的，生命的，生机的，至关重要的，所必需的
example: 单词 vital 的例句||||These matters are vital to the national security. 这些事情对国家安全至关重要。||||This point is vital to my argument. 这一点对我的论据来说是非常重要的。

name: trial
interpret: n.审判，试验，艰苦，麻烦事，考验；adj.尝试的，试验性的
example: 单词 trial 的例句||||We shall put the machine to further trial. 我们将进一步试验这部机器。||||He appeared as a witness in the trial. 在审判中他出庭作证。

name: duke
example: 单词 duke 的例句||||His grandfather was a royal duke. 他的祖父是王室公爵。||||The duke was the king's most trusted adviser. 公爵是国王最信赖的顾问。

name: file
interpret: n.档案，公文箱，锉刀；v.列队行进，归档，申请；[计算机]文件
example: 单词 file 的例句||||Fran came in holding a blue file. 弗兰拿着一个蓝色的文件夹进来了。||||The door won't fit, you'll have to file it down. 这门关不上，你得把它锉一锉。

name: fade
interpret: vi.凋谢，褪色；（声音等）变弱；（光纤等）变暗；vt.使褪色n.淡入，淡出；adj.乏味的，平淡的
example: 单词 fade 的例句||||Will the colour in this material fade? 这种料子褪色吗？||||Flowers of true friendship never fade. 友谊之花永不凋谢。

name: bedtime
example: 单词 bedtime 的例句||||It's your bedtime. Go upstairs and go to bed. 到睡觉的时间了，上楼去睡觉。||||If you go to bed now, I'll read you a bedtime story. 假使你现在就上床睡觉，我就念个睡前故事给你听。

name: workday
example: 单词 workday 的例句||||Today is my workday. 今天是我的工作日。||||I walk 2. 5 miles in every morning of workday. 每个工作日的早晨我都要步行2. 5英里。

name: kind-hearted
example: 单词 kind-hearted 的例句||||She is one of the most kind-hearted girls that I saw. 她是我看到的姑娘中最善良的一个。||||Mike is a very kind-hearted boy. 迈克是一好心肠的小伙子。

name: herb
example: 单词 herb 的例句||||They usually ate the herb raw. 他们经常吃未煮过的药草。||||Treatment with medicinal herb is attended with good results. 用草药治疗效果良好。

name: superman
interpret: n.具有超人能力的人，超人
example: 单词 superman 的例句||||He is a superman in physical strength. 他在体力上是个超人。||||He was a successful actor, famous for the Superman films. 他是个成功的演员，以“超人”电影而著名。

name: warm-up
interpret: n.准备动作，热身，预热，热身赛
example: 单词 warm-up 的例句||||Warm-up exercises are necessary for competitors to start swimming. 对游泳运动员来说，在开始之前做热身运动是非常必要的。||||I never bother to do warm-up exercises. 我向来懒得做热身运动。

name: fee
interpret: n.费（会费、学费等）；酬金，小费；所有权；vt.付费给
example: 单词 fee 的例句||||Is this money enough for the tuition fee? 这些钱交学费够吗?||||The lawyer undertook the case without a fee. 这律师免费承办那个案件。

name: communist
interpret: n.共产主义者，共产党员；adj.共产主义的，共产党员的
example: 单词 communist 的例句||||In the following year he joined the Communist Party. 第二年他入了共产党。||||The People's Daily is the organ of the Chinese Communist Party. 《人民日报》是中国共产党的党报。

name: historical
interpret: adj.历史的，史实的，历史上的
example: 单词 historical 的例句||||The book is based on historical events. 这本书是根据历史事件写成的。||||We have shared the same historical experiences. 咱们有着共同的历史遭遇。

name: breast
example: 单词 breast 的例句||||The coat is too tight at the breast. 这件衣服胸部太紧了。||||He was wearing a nameplate on his left breast. 他左胸前佩带着一张名牌。

name: smelly
interpret: adj.(口)有臭味的，发出臭气的
example: 单词 smelly 的例句||||The river was smelly today. 今天这条河散发着一股臭味。||||The toilets in that restaurant were horribly smelly. 那个餐馆的卫生间气味难闻。

name: dormitory
interpret: n.集体寝室，宿舍；郊外居住区
example: 单词 dormitory 的例句||||She lives in the dormitory on weekdays. 平常她住在宿舍里。||||The boys were settled in their dormitory. 男孩子们被安排在宿舍里住下了。

name: disco
interpret: n.迪斯科舞厅，迪斯科舞会
example: 单词 disco 的例句||||Can you find a disco? 你能找到迪斯科舞厅吗？||||Disco was not my scene. 我对迪斯科舞不感兴趣。

name: shot
interpret: n.炮弹，射击，射手；v.射击，发出，发芽；vbl.射击，发出，发芽
example: 单词 shot 的例句||||He shot a wild duck. 他射中一只野鸭。||||All the children shot out their hands for the money. 所有的孩子突然伸出手来要钱。

name: discourage
interpret: vt.使泄气，使沮丧；阻拦，劝阻
example: 单词 discourage 的例句||||Don't let one failure discourage you. 勿因一次失败而气馁。||||We discourage smoking in this school. 在这所学校里我们劝阻吸烟。

name: whoever
example: 单词 whoever 的例句||||I'll find the person who did this, whoever he is. 我要找出干这件事的人，不管他是谁。||||Whoever does best will get the prize. 谁做得最出色谁就得奖。

name: hesitate
example: 单词 hesitate 的例句||||If you hesitate too long, you will miss the opportunity. 如果你老是犹豫不决，那就会错失良机。|||| If you get in trouble, don't hesitate to ask for advice. 如果碰到麻烦，要赶紧向人求教。

name: boating
example: 单词 boating 的例句||||They were fond of boating. 他们喜欢划船。||||The lovely river itself was ideal for fishing and boating. 这条美丽的河流本身就宜于钓鱼和划船。

name: headteacher
example: 单词 headteacher 的例句||||Our headteacher divided our class into eight groups. 我们班主任把我们班划分成八个小组。||||My mum used to be a headteacher. 我妈妈曾做过小学校长。

name: spy
interpret: n.间谍，侦探，侦察；vt.侦察，找出，发现；vi.做密探，侦查
example: 单词 spy 的例句||||I'm sure my neighbours spy on me. 我肯定邻居暗中监视我。||||The spy never told his family about his underground activities. 那个间谍从来不把他的地下活动告诉他的家人。

name: PLA
example: 单词 PLA 的例句||||A PLA man came up and asked if he could help. 一位解放军走上前来问他可不可以帮忙。||||First came the PLA men, then the people's militia. 人民解放军走在前面，其次是民兵。

name: man-made
example: 单词 man-made 的例句||||Nylon is a man-made fibre. 尼龙是一种人造纤维。|||| Many countries have sent up man-made satellites to circle the earth. 许多国家已经发射人造卫星围绕地球运转。

name: Frenchman
example: 单词 Frenchman 的例句||||John's house was sold to a Frenchman. 约翰的房子卖给了一个法国人。||||He speaks French well enough to pass for a Frenchman. 他说法语很流利，很容易被当作法国人。

name: smoking
example: 单词 smoking 的例句||||He was wise to give up smoking. 他戒烟是明智的。|||| He has decided to cut out smoking and drinking. 他已决心戒烟、戒酒。

name: workplace
interpret: n.工作面(工作位置，车间，工厂)
example: 单词 workplace 的例句||||A workplace where ships are built or repaired. 制造和修理船的工厂。||||Training can make people get along in the workplace. 培训能让人们在工作场所和睦相处。

name: untrue
example: 单词 untrue 的例句||||That is an untrue story. 那是一个不真实的故事。|||| The newspaper printed a denial of the untrue story. 报社刊登了否认不实消息的声明。

name: satellite
example: 单词 satellite 的例句||||The moon is a satellite of the earth. 月球是地球的一颗卫星。||||A man-made satellite has been launched. 人造卫星上天。

name: teamwork
example: 单词 teamwork 的例句||||Only teamwork will enable us to get the job done on time. 只有团结一致，我们才能按时完成这项工作。|||| Good teamwork between the players is not easy to get. 队员之间很难做到配合默契。

name: Swedish
interpret: n.瑞典人，瑞典语；adj.瑞典的，瑞典人的，瑞典语的
example: 单词 Swedish 的例句||||From his looks I'd say he was Swedish. 从他的相貌上看，我敢说他是瑞典人。||||He is going after that pretty Swedish girl. 他正在追求那位美丽的瑞典女郎。

name: farming
example: 单词 farming 的例句||||He lives by farming. 他靠务农过活。||||He is farming in Africa. 他在非洲经营农场。

name: Liverpool
example: 单词 Liverpool 的例句||||Are you traveling to Liverpool as well?  We can go together. 你也去利物浦吗？我们可以同行。||||His professional career started at Liverpool University. 他的职业生涯是从利物浦大学开始的。

name: Cairo
example: 单词 Cairo 的例句||||They get onto the plane at Cairo. 他们在开罗上飞机。||||Cairo is the capital of Egypt. 开罗是埃及的首都。

name: magical
interpret: adj.魔术的，有魔力的，不可思议的
example: 单词 magical 的例句||||I used to believe my mother had magical powers. 我以前一直相信我母亲有奇妙的魔力。||||The effect of the medicine on the sick man was magical. 药对病人的效力是不可思议的。

name: best-seller
example: 单词 best-seller 的例句||||This book is a best seller. 这本书是一种畅销的书。||||I hope for this book to become a best seller. 我希望这本书会成为一本畅销书。

name: rewarding
example: 单词 rewarding 的例句||||Gardening is a very rewarding pastime. 园艺劳动是非常有益的消遣。||||She finds motherhood very rewarding. 她认为做母亲得偿所愿。

name: sometime
example: 单词 sometime 的例句||||He came sometime last month. 上个月某个时候他曾经来过。||||It will happen sometime and somewhere. 有朝一日这总会在什么地方发生的。

name: confidence
interpret: n.信任，信托，自信，信心，把握，大胆，厚颜，过于自信，狂妄
example: 单词 confidence 的例句||||We have full confidence in our victory. 我们有必胜的把握。||||I should like to exchange a few words with you in confidence. 我想私下和你交换点意见。

name: reuse
example: 单词 reuse 的例句||||There are some ways to reuse the wastes. 有很多废品再利用的方法。||||The use and reuse of urban land. 城市土地利用与再利用。

name: cruelty
example: 单词 cruelty 的例句||||He was treated with great cruelty. 他受到残酷虐待。||||Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people. 对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍。

name: steep
interpret: adj.陡峭的，险峻的，急剧升降的，不合理的；n.悬崖，峭壁，浸渍，浸渍液；v.浸，泡，沉浸
example: 单词 steep 的例句||||The slope is too steep for us to climb. 这斜坡太陡，我们爬不上去。||||There was a steep climb on the road out of town. 市外公路上有一处很陡的上坡路。

name: karaoke
example: 单词 karaoke 的例句||||Most of the music in karaoke was popular music. 卡拉OK中大多数的音乐是流行音乐。||||What is your favorite karaoke song to sing? 你喜欢唱的卡拉OK歌曲是哪首？

name: grand
interpret: adj.豪华的，宏伟的，壮丽的，主要的，重大的；n.(美俚)一千美元
example: 单词 grand 的例句||||The pianist played several pieces of music on a grand piano. 钢琴家在一架大钢琴上弹了几首乐曲。|||| Come on, I'll give you the grand tour of the backyard. 跟我来，我带你去后院来一次盛大的旅游。

name: crew
interpret: n.全体船员，全体乘务员；vi.一起工作
example: 单词 crew 的例句||||A captain controls his ship and its crew. 船长管理他的船和船上的船员。||||The captain kept his crew at a distance. 船长与他的船员总保持一段距离。

name: fright
example: 单词 fright 的例句||||A tree fell on the house and gave him a fright. 一棵树倒在房子上，吓了他一大跳。||||She turned pale with fright. 她吓得面色刷白。

name: heater
example: 单词 heater 的例句||||If you are hot you can turn the heater down. 如果你觉得热，你可以把暖气拧小。||||The heater is on a timer switch. 加热器连在一个定时开关上。

name: investigate
interpret: vt.调查，调查研究；vi.调查，调查研究
example: 单词 investigate 的例句||||Police investigate the cause of car accident. 警察调查车祸的原因。||||The government of the United States began at once to investigate the case. 美国政府立即开始调查此案。

name: howl
example: 单词 howl 的例句||||He gave a howl of pain. 他发出一声痛苦的吼叫。|||| The child set up a howl. 这个孩子大哭起来。

name: lean
interpret: n.瘦肉，倾斜，弯曲；adj.瘦的，贫乏的，歉收的；v.倚靠，倾斜，依赖
example: 单词 lean 的例句||||The seats have no back against which to lean. 这些座位都没有靠背可倚。||||Please don't lean your chair back, you'll break it. 请不要坐在椅子上往后仰，你会把椅子弄坏的。

name: plug
interpret: n.塞子，消防栓，电插头；vt.插入，塞住，接插头；vi.被塞住

name: schoolmate
example: 单词 schoolmate 的例句||||He met an old schoolmate at the party. 他在宴会上遇见了一位老同学。||||My father still keeps in touch with his old schoolmate. 我父亲仍和他的老同学保持联系。

name: specialist

example: 单词 specialist 的例句||||She is a specialist in English. 她是一位英语专家。||||The peasants looked up to him as a specialist. 农民们尊他为专家。

name: spoonful
example: 单词 spoonful 的例句||||She put a spoonful of milk in each of the two cups. 她在两个杯子里各加了一匙牛奶。||||Tom added a spoonful of sugar to the coffee. 汤姆在咖啡里加了一勺糖。

name: stable
example: 单词 stable 的例句||||I'm glad she has become such a stable character. 我很高兴她变得如此沉稳。|||| This chair isn't very stable. 这把椅子不大稳固。

name: sweat
interpret: n.汗，汗水，水珠，焦急；vi.出汗，渗出，冒出水气，结水珠，烦恼，懊恼；vt.使出汗，流出，榨出，使汗流浃背
example: 单词 sweat 的例句||||She was all of a sweat. 她一身大汗。||||She is always all of a sweat before the exam. 她临考前总是急得不得了。

name: aboard
interpret: adv.在船上，在火车上，在飞机上；prep.在…之上
example: 单词 aboard 的例句||||They were all aboard the ship last night. 昨天夜里他们都在船上。||||He checked their names off as they went aboard the plane. 在他们登上飞机时，他登记上了他们的姓名。

name: cell
interpret: n.区，细胞，血球；小室，牢房；电池，光电管；基层组织

name: alien
interpret: n.外星人，外国人；adj.外国的；相异的；异己的；与...格格不入的；与...不同的；不相容的；外来的；adj.（常与to连用）与…相反的；与…不同的
example: 单词 alien 的例句||||Jim is an alien in this film. 吉姆在这部电影里是个外星人。||||Their ideas are alien to our way of thinking. 他们的思想和我们的想法不同。

name: Irish
interpret: n.爱尔兰语；爱尔兰人；adj.爱尔兰(人)的
example: 单词 Irish 的例句||||He is from the Isle of Man in the Irish Sea. 他来自爱尔兰海的马恩岛。||||The two volumes of collected Irish Stories are printed. 两卷本的《爱尔兰故事集》已经印好了。

name: option
interpret: n.选择，取舍，选择权，选择的自由

name: dishwasher
example: 单词 dishwasher 的例句||||Our dishwasher is out of order. 我们的洗碗机坏了。||||This dishwasher even washes pots and pans. 这个洗碗机还能洗坛坛罐罐呢。

name: discus
example: 单词 discus 的例句||||He was the first place in the discus throw. 他掷铁饼获得第一名。||||I see Britain did well in the discus. 我看英国队在铁饼项目中表现不错。

name: handstand
example: 单词 handstand 的例句||||Can you make a handstand? 你能做倒立吗？||||The handstand group gives up the contest. 倒立组放弃了比赛。

name: composer

name: lifelong

name: supporter

name: trader
example: 单词 trader 的例句||||The old man was a trader in tea. 那老头曾是茶商。||||He was a foxy old trader. 他是个老奸商。

name: babysit

name: mature
interpret: adj.成熟的，到期的，充分考虑的；vt.使成熟；vi.成熟，到期

name: appetite

example: 单词 appetite 的例句||||The baby has a good appetite. 这个婴儿食欲很好。|||| She feels pretty well, but she hasn't much of an appetite. 她精神还不错，不过胃口不太好。

name: concentrate
interpret: vt.集中；聚集；浓缩；vi.集中；全神贯注

name: ambition
example: 单词 ambition 的例句||||He achieved his ambition in the end. 他最终实现了他的抱负。||||Her ambition was to be a film star. 她的志向是当电影明星。

name: changeable
example: 单词 changeable 的例句||||The weather here is quite changeable. 这儿的天气变化无常。||||He has a changeable character. 他性格多变。

name: Shakespeare

example: 单词 Shakespeare 的例句||||Shakespeare is a giant among writers. 莎士比亚是作家中的巨擘. ||||He read Shakespeare to help his English. 他阅读莎士比亚的作品以提高自己的英语水平。

name: confused
example: 单词 confused 的例句||||They asked so many questions that they confused me. 他们问了许多问题，都把我弄糊涂了。||||A wise man is never confused. 智者不惑。

name: professional

name: united

name: recreation
example: 单词 recreation 的例句||||What kind of recreation do you go in for? 你在文娱方面有什么爱好？||||Saturday afternoon is for recreation and outings. 周六午后是休闲和外出游玩的时间。

name: co-worker
example: 单词 co-worker 的例句||||I went to visit my co-worker on Saturday. 周六去同事家做客了。||||My new co-worker comes to work late every day. 我的新同事每天上班都迟到。

name: military

name: cheaply

name: aggressive

name: Jew

name: slogan

name: structure

name: challenge

name: wounded

name: westwards

name: Antarctica

name: homesick

name: Brazilian

name: Ireland

name: confusing

name: disagreement

name: disgusted

name: educated

name: fingernail

name: holy

name: teammate

name: sacred

name: altitude

name: disappointed
