example: 单词 discipline 的例句||||She needs the discipline of having to write an essay every week. 她需要进行每周写一篇文章的训练。|||| Everyone should keep discipline and you are no exception. 每个人都应该遵守纪律,你也毫无例外。

name: facial
example: 单词 facial 的例句||||I've made an appointment for a facial tomorrow. 我约好明天去做美容。||||The chimpanzee uses facial expressions for communication. 黑猩猩用面部表情进行交流。

name: lower
interpret: adj.较低的；地位较低的，低等的；低年级的；下游的；vt.放下，降下，放低；减低
example: 单词 lower 的例句||||Society is divided into upper, middle and lower classes. 社会分为上层、中层和下层阶级。||||This price is his minimum. He refuses to lower it any further. 这个价格是他开的最低价，他拒绝再作任何降价。

name: server
example: 单词 server 的例句||||The server is introducing the pub. 侍者正在介绍这家酒吧。||||My server is having problems this morning. 我的服务器今天早上出了问题。

name: Tibetan
interpret: adj.西藏的；藏族人的；n.西藏语；西藏人；藏族人
example: 单词 Tibetan 的例句||||Winter wheat has made it at home on the Tibetan highlands. 冬小麦能在西藏高原生长了。||||The study of the Tibetan language is protected by law. 藏语文学习依法得到保障。

name: traditionally
example: 单词 traditionally 的例句||||Traditionally, people clean the house before the Spring Festival. 传统上，人们在春节前打扫房子。|||| Medicine is traditionally the first of the Nobel prizes awarded each year. 根据传统，医学奖是诺贝尔奖每年颁发的第一个奖项。

name: airmail
example: 单词 airmail 的例句||||I told her to send the letter by airmail. 我叫她把那封信寄航空。||||A letter sent by airmail will get to Europe quickly. 寄往欧洲的航空邮件马上就会到达。

name: annual
interpret: adj.每年的；一年的；（植物）一年生的 n.年刊；一年生植物
example: 单词 annual 的例句||||It's an annual report. 这是年度报告。||||The kind of plant is a hardy annual. 这种植物是耐寒的一年生植物。

name: bachelor
interpret: n.单身汉，未婚者；学士学位
example: 单词 bachelor 的例句||||She was a bachelor woman. 她是一个独立生活的未婚女子。||||I graduated from Qinghua University and got a Bachelor Degree. 我毕业于清华大学，获得学士学位.

name: qualification
example: 单词 qualification 的例句||||They had every qualification for success. 他们具备获得成功的各种条件。||||He has no qualification to teach college students. 他没有具备教大学的资格。

name: beneficial
example: 单词 beneficial 的例句||||I hope your holiday will be beneficial to you. 我希望你的假期会对你有益。||||Sunshine is beneficial to plants. 阳光对植物有益。

name: unload
interpret: vt.卸下，卸货，摆脱...之负担，(大量)倾销；vi.卸下货物，摆脱负担，退出（弹药，胶片等）
example: 单词 unload 的例句||||They want to unload the stocks on the market. 他们想把股票在市场上抛售掉。||||She began to unload her troubles on her mother. 她开始把她的烦恼告诉母亲。

name: bonus
example: 单词 bonus 的例句||||The workers expected to share out a year-end bonus. 工人们期望年终分红。||||The staff got a a special bonus payment. 员工得到一笔特别发放的奖金。

name: boundary
example: 单词 boundary 的例句||||A river forms the boundary between the two countries. 一条河流成了两国的分界线。||||The boundary questions still remain unsettled. 边界问题仍然没有解决。

name: dignity
example: 单词 dignity 的例句||||Only a truly free person has human dignity. 只有真正自由的人才具有人的尊严。||||He considered the job beneath his dignity. 他认为这种工作有失身份。

name: bucket
example: 单词 bucket 的例句||||The bottom of the bucket has worn through after all this time. 经过这么长时间，这只桶的底部终于磨穿了。||||Can you fill me a bucket of water, please? 请给我打一桶水好吗？

name: distribute
interpret: vt.分配，分发，分布，散布，分类
example: 单词 distribute 的例句||||Please distribute the examination papers round the class. 请把考卷发给全班同学。||||He started to print his own posters to distribute abroad. 他开始印刷自己的海报并发往国外。

name: conservation
example: 单词 conservation 的例句||||She is interested in conservation of environment. 她对环境保护这个问题十分关心。||||Our community is a leader in the conservation of wildlife. 我们社区在野生动物保护方面走在前头。

name: leap
interpret: n.跳跃，飞跃，跃进；vi.跳跃，跳过；猛然行动，迅速行动；vt.跃过，使跃过
example: 单词 leap 的例句||||In the last few years, this art has made a big leap. 近几年来，这一艺术有了新的跃进。||||Her marriage to John was a leap in the dark. 她与约翰结婚是贸然行动。

name: resign
interpret: vt.放弃，辞去；把…交托给；使顺从；vi.辞职
example: 单词 resign 的例句||||I've heard a whisper that he's going to resign. 我听到了一个传闻说他准备辞职。||||You must resign yourselves to waiting a bit longer. 你们要耐心多等一会儿。

name: videophone
example: 单词 videophone 的例句||||I will give you a videophone ring tonight. 今天晚上我给你打可视电话。||||Our videophone needs repairing. 我们的可视电话需要修理。

name: visa
example: 单词 visa 的例句||||You'll have to get a passport, and you'll also need a visa. 你必须申办护照，同时还需要有签证。|||| The visa expires next month. 签证下月到期。

name: vivid
interpret: adj.鲜艳的，鲜明的；活泼的，有生气的；生动的，逼真的
example: 单词 vivid 的例句||||The writer paints a vivid picture of his early life. 那位作家生动地描绘了他早年的生活。||||The changing vivid colours of the sunset are really fascinating. 日落时变化多端的色彩确实使人心醉神迷。

name: slavery
interpret: n.奴隶的身分，奴隶状态，奴隶制度
example: 单词 slavery 的例句||||The Americans abolished slavery in 1863. 美国于1863年废除奴隶制度。||||He is in a state of virtual slavery. 他实际上处于一种被奴役的状态。

name: suck
interpret: vt.吸，吮，吸入，吮吸，吸收，获得；vi.吸，吸奶；n.吸，吸入，吮吸
example: 单词 suck 的例句||||It's good to suck in such clean fresh air for a change. 换个环境，吸点清新空气，真是好极了。||||Bees suck honey from flowers. 蜜蜂从花中吸吮蜜汁。

name: sympathy
interpret: n.同情，赞同，同感，慰问，吊唁
example: 单词 sympathy 的例句||||He felt great sympathy for these people. 他很同情这些人。||||Sympathy is his best quality. 同情心是他最好的品质。

name: bandage
example: 单词 bandage 的例句||||The injured arm was bound by bandage. 受伤的手臂用绷带扎起来了。||||She wound a bandage round my wounded arm. 她用绷带包扎我受伤的手臂。

name: choke
interpret: vt.窒息，阻塞，噎，抑制；vi.窒息，阻塞，噎；n.窒息，噎，阻气门
example: 单词 choke 的例句||||He started to choke as he was eating too fast. 他吃得太快,噎住了。||||The fish bone in her throat made her choke. 她喉咙中的鱼骨使她哽噎。

name: added
example: 单词 added 的例句||||They have added a new scene at the beginning. 在开头他们又增加了一场戏。||||The pop music added to our enjoyment of the film. 片中的流行音乐使我们对这部电影更加喜爱。

name: customs
example: 单词 customs 的例句||||The customs officials turned the man over to the French police. 海关官员把那个人移交给了法国警察。|||| They are collecting customs. 他们正在收缴关税。

name: winning
interpret: adj.获胜的，胜利的；吸引人的，有说服力的
example: 单词 winning 的例句||||Team A has no chance of winning. A队没有获胜的可能。||||They have great hopes of winning. 他们获胜的希望极大。

name: worn
interpret: adj.用旧的，疲倦的；vbl.wear的过去分词
example: 单词 worn 的例句||||The child's trousers have worn through at the knees. 孩子裤子的膝盖处磨破了。||||My shoes are worn out. 我的鞋子穿坏了。

name: developing
example: 单词 developing 的例句||||Transport has always been the key to developing trade. 运输一直是发展贸易的关键。||||They are developing marketing network. 他们正在发展销售网络。

name: papers
example: 单词 papers 的例句||||I want to check with my secretary before I sign the papers. 在签署这些文件前，我要与我的秘书商议。|||| The lawyer read all the papers relating to the case. 律师阅读了与该案有关的全部文件。

name: cellphone
example: 单词 cellphone 的例句||||This type of cellphone is on the way out. 这种类型的手机即将过时。||||The cellphone is a useful tool. 手机是很有用的工具。

name: global
example: 单词 global 的例句||||A global environmental meeting is going to be held here. 一个全球环境会议将在这里举行。||||The report takes a global view of the company's problems. 这份报告对公司的问题作了综合性的论述。

name: gardening
example: 单词 gardening 的例句||||Dad is always in a good humour for gardening. 爸爸干园艺活时，心情总是很好。||||She's gardening outdoors every afternoon. 她每天下午都在户外搞园艺。

name: packaging
example: 单词 packaging 的例句||||The packaging does not conform to EU rules. 这种包装不符合欧盟规定。||||These materials can be recycled into other packaging products. 可以回收这些材料制成其他包装产品。

name: dissolve
interpret: vt.使溶解，使融化；vi.溶解，融化
example: 单词 dissolve 的例句||||Both salt and sugar dissolve easily in water. 盐和糖都容易溶解于水。||||The King agreed to dissolve the present commission. 国王同意解散目前的委员会。

name: observation
interpret: n.观察， 观测， 观察资料（或报告）
example: 单词 observation 的例句||||The new breed is under observation. 新品种正在观察中。||||Did you keep him under observation? 你对他进行监视了吗？

name: employee
example: 单词 employee 的例句||||Each employee received a like bonus. 每个雇员都得到了相同数目的奖金。||||They brought around a new employee this morning. 他们今天早晨请来了一位新雇员。

name: shooting
example: 单词 shooting 的例句||||The soldiers began shooting away at the enemy positions. 战士们开始朝敌人的阵地不断地射击。||||I was in the act of shooting him when I suddenly recognized him. 我正要向他开枪时，突然认出了他。

name: soybean
example: 单词 soybean 的例句||||They raised the baby on soybean milk. 他们用豆浆把这个孩子喂养大了。||||I will give you some soybean powder to wash the dishes with. 我会拿黄豆粉给你洗碗。

name: biologist
example: 单词 biologist 的例句||||The biologist advanced a new theory of life. 这位生物学家提出了一个有关生命的新学说。||||This is that biologist who rescued her life. 这就是救了她生命的那个生物学家。

name: accessible
interpret: adj.易于得到的，易于进入的，可处理的，可存取的
example: 单词 accessible 的例句||||The island is accessible only by boat. 这座岛只能坐船去。||||Such information is not really accessible. 这种信息不是很容易得到的。

name: gene
example: 单词 gene 的例句||||A single gene may have many effects. 单一基因可能具有很多种效应。||||The targeting of gene therapy has been paid close attention. 基因治疗的靶向性得到了密切关注。

name: dash
interpret: n. 破折号；冲撞 vt. 使…破灭；猛撞；泼溅 vi. 猛冲；撞击
example: 单词 dash 的例句||||The prisoners made a dash for freedom. 囚犯逃奔自由。||||Day and night the waves dash against the rocks. 波浪日夜冲击着岩石。

name: adjust
interpret: vt.调整，使适应于，校准；vi.调整，适应于，校准
example: 单词 adjust 的例句||||Foreigners take some time to adjust to our way of life. 外国人要花一些时间才能适应我们的生活方式。||||It is difficult to adjust one's habits to someone else. 一个人很难使自己的习惯适于他人。

name: joyful
example: 单词 joyful 的例句||||She was joyful of her good result of the scientific experiments. 她为自己的科学实验取得好成果而高兴。||||They were singing and dancing to celebrate this joyful occasion. 他们唱着、跳着庆祝这令人欢乐的时刻。

name: honesty
example: 单词 honesty 的例句||||I would never question his honesty. 我绝不会怀疑他的诚实。||||All respect him for his honesty. 他为人诚实，大家都尊敬他。

name: plough
interpret: n.犁，耕地；vi.用犁耕田，开路；vt.耕，犁，开路
example: 单词 plough 的例句||||Farmers plough in autumn or spring. 农民在秋天或春天犁田。||||If we plough on until it's dark, we should get this field finished. 如果我们一直犁到天黑，就可以把这块地犁完了。

name: Swiss
example: 单词 Swiss 的例句||||The Swiss I know all are clever. 我认识的瑞士人都很聪明。||||Today Swiss watches are sold in stores all over the world. 现今瑞士的手表在世界各地出售。

name: easygoing
interpret: adj.悠闲自在的；懒惰的，随便的
example: 单词 easygoing 的例句||||An easygoing life as a parttime consultant. 像兼职顾问一样悠闲的生活。||||Our manager's an easygoing person. She never gets angry. 我们的经理是个随和的人，她从不发怒。

name: inexpensive
interpret: adj.花费不多的，费用不昂贵的
example: 单词 inexpensive 的例句||||Those shoes are very inexpensive. 那些鞋子很便宜。||||This kind of car is inexpensive. 这种汽车便宜。

name: hallway
example: 单词 hallway 的例句||||The restroom is at the end of the hallway to the right. 洗手间在走廊尽头右转的地方。||||The two rooms connect by a hallway. 这两个房间有过道相连。

name: westerner
example: 单词 westerner 的例句||||The young man looks like a westerner. 那年轻人看起来像西方人。||||Her aim is to marry a westerner and live abroad. 她的目标是嫁给西方人,住到国外。

name: nutrition
example: 单词 nutrition 的例句||||Plants get the nutrition from the soil in which they grow. 植物从它们赖以生存的土壤中吸收养分。|||| This food provides nutrition for you. 这种食物为你提供营养。

name: enjoyment
example: 单词 enjoyment 的例句||||Your company adds to the enjoyment of our visit. 有您的陪同，我们这次访问更加愉快了。||||After each joke the old man cackled his enjoyment. 每逢讲完一个笑话，这老人就呵呵笑着表示他的高兴。

name: autograph
interpret: n.亲笔，自署，亲笔签名；vt.自署于，亲笔签名于，亲笔写
example: 单词 autograph 的例句||||I asked the author to autograph my book. 我请作者在书上亲笔签名。||||I'll be able to get you their autograph if you like. 如果你喜欢，我会让他们给你签名的。

name: grandchild
example: 单词 grandchild 的例句||||It's their first grandchild. 那是他们第一个外孙。||||His grandchild is a naughty boy. 他的孙子是个淘气的男孩。

name: resolution
interpret: n.坚定，决心，决心要做的事，决定，决议
example: 单词 resolution 的例句||||You must stand to your resolution. 你一定要坚守你的决心。||||I still haven't given up my resolution to do more reading. 我仍然还没有放弃多看些书的决心。

name: favor
interpret: n.好感；赞同；好事；vt.赞同，喜爱；有利于
example: 单词 favor 的例句||||She is out of favor with her employer. 她失去了雇主的欢心。||||The new teacher finds favor in the eyes of the parents. 那位新老师很受家长的欢迎。

name: renew
interpret: vt.使更新，复始，使恢复，补充；vi.更新，重新开始
example: 单词 renew 的例句||||The most important thing is to renew your health. 最重要的是恢复你的健康。||||We must renew our supplies of coal. 我们必须补充煤的储备。

name: creator
interpret: n.创造者，创作者，缔造者；造物主，神
example: 单词 creator 的例句||||He was without doubt the creator of the Roman Empire. 毫无疑问,他是罗马帝国的创始人。|||| One creator cannot have two procedures with the same name. 一个创建者不能有两个同名过程。

name: bid
interpret: n.出价；投标；vt./vi.（拍卖时）喊（价）；投标
example: 单词 bid 的例句||||How much do you bid? 你出多少钱？||||I bid 1000 dollars for that picture. 我对那幅画出价1000美元。

name: hairy
example: 单词 hairy 的例句||||The bear's chest is hairy. 那只熊的胸部毛茸茸的。||||I can see a hairy monster. 我能看见一个多毛妖怪。

name: illegal
interpret: adj.不合法的，非法的，犯法的
example: 单词 illegal 的例句||||I don't want to get mixed up with any illegal organization. 我不想与任何非法组织有牵连。||||It's illegal for people under 17 to drive a car in Britain. 在英国，不满17岁的人驾驶车辆是违法的。

name: imitate
interpret: vt.模仿，仿效，摹拟，学样；仿制，仿造，伪造
example: 单词 imitate 的例句||||James can imitate his father perfectly. 詹姆斯能逼真地模仿他父亲。||||Parrots imitate human speech. 鹦鹉学人说话。

name: humanoid
example: 单词 humanoid 的例句||||The humanoid Chinese character recognition system. 仿人汉字识别系统。|||| Eventually, advanced humanoid robots will escape from the laboratory. 最终，先进的人形机器人将走出实验室。

name: specific
example: 单词 specific 的例句||||The money is to be used for specific purposes. 这笔钱有专门用途。||||We haven't fixed a specific date for our meeting. 我们会议的具体日期还没有定下来。

name: comma
example: 单词 comma 的例句||||The two clauses are separated by a comma. 这两个分句由一个逗号分开。||||Not a comma was left out. 一个逗号也没漏掉。

name: ashamed
interpret: adj.感到惭愧，感到害臊，因为羞耻或勉强作某事
example: 单词 ashamed 的例句||||He is ashamed to show his face at the club. 他不好意思在俱乐部露脸。||||You ought to be ashamed of your foolish behaviour. 你应当为自己的愚蠢行为而感到羞耻。

name: fashionable
interpret: adj.时髦的，上流社会的，流行的
example: 单词 fashionable 的例句||||She is moving in fashionable circles in New York. 她活动于纽约上流社会之中。||||We lunched in a fashionable restaurant. 我们在一家上等的饭店吃午餐。

name: listener
example: 单词 listener 的例句||||I'm a regular listener to her show. 我经常收听她的节目。||||She became an attentive listener. 她变成了一个专心致志的聆听者。

name: known
interpret: adj.大家知道的；知名的，已知的
example: 单词 known 的例句||||He is a known artist. 他是一个知名的艺术家。||||He is known both as a painter and as a statesman. 他是知名的画家及政治家。

name: fascinating
interpret: adj.迷人的，吸引人的，使人神魂颠倒的
example: 单词 fascinating 的例句||||Your ideas are fascinating to me. 你的这些主意对我来说是有吸引力的。||||The very style of the book is fascinating. 这本书的风格本身就会引人入胜。

name: touristy
interpret: adj.游客很多的，游客常去的，适宜游览的，适合观光的
example: 单词 touristy 的例句||||The beach was touristy in summer. 夏季的海滩游客很多。||||Beijing is a touristy city. 北京是一个适合旅游的城市。

name: Confucius
interpret: n.孔子(中国古代教育家、儒家创始人)
example: 单词 Confucius 的例句||||Confucius was one of the wisest teachers of all times. 孔子是有史以来最为博学的教师之一。|||| Confucius's many words are wisdom. 孔子的很多话都是至理名言。

name: embarrassed
example: 单词 embarrassed 的例句||||He was very embarrassed to hear people speak so highly of him. 他听见别人这样夸他,感到很难为情。|||| He is somewhat embarrassed. 他稍微有点窘迫。

name: intelligence
example: 单词 intelligence 的例句||||He was a man of intelligence and of firmness of will. 他是个聪明而又意志坚定的人。||||He equals me in strength but not in intelligence. 他和我力气相等，但智力不同。

name: flee
example: 单词 flee 的例句||||Why does she always flee any kind of responsibility? 她为什么总是逃避责任？||||He was lucky to flee the burning hotel. 他很幸运逃出了失火的旅馆。

name: thrill
interpret: n.震颤，激动，刺激性，一阵激动；vi.震颤，抖颤，激动；vt.使激动，使颤动
example: 单词 thrill 的例句||||The news sent a thrill of joy to my heart. 这消息使我感到一阵喜悦。||||His speech caused a thrill among the audience. 他的演说引起了听众的极大兴奋。

name: crispy
example: 单词 crispy 的例句||||I like crispy spring rolls. 我喜欢酥脆的春卷。|||| It is a kind of fried food that tastes delicious and crispy. 它是一种油炸类食物，味道可口，香脆。

name: according
example: 单词 according 的例句||||According to the Bible we are all the seed of Adam. 根据《圣经》所说的，我们都是亚当的后裔。||||We must cut our coat according to our cloth this year. 今年我们必须学会量入为出。

name: political
interpret: adj.政治上的，政党的，政略性的，政治的
example: 单词 political 的例句||||He was forced to leave his homeland for political reasons. 因为政治原因他被迫离开自己的祖国。||||In ideas those two political parties are worlds apart. 那两个政党在思想上有巨大分歧。

name: creativity
example: 单词 creativity 的例句||||There is limited scope for creativity in my job. 我的工作中发挥创造力的空间有限。||||She got an unusually low score for creativity. 在创造力方面，她得了异乎寻常的低分。

name: accustomed
example: 单词 accustomed 的例句||||This is his accustomed hour to go to bed. 这是他就寝的惯常时间。||||They are accustomed to this sort of work. 他们惯于干这种工作。

name: robber
example: 单词 robber 的例句||||The robber told the woman to come across with her purse. 拦路抢劫者勒令那个女人把钱包交出来。||||The robber tried to run away but a man tackled him. 强盗企图逃跑，但有人把他抓住了。

name: advocate
interpret: n.提倡者，拥护者；vt.鼓吹，主张，支持，拥护，提倡
example: 单词 advocate 的例句||||I don't advocate doing such things. 我不主张干这样的事情。||||He got the best advocate in town to defend him. 他请城里最好的律师为他辩护。

name: anxiety
interpret: n.忧虑，担心，挂念，焦急；渴望，热望
example: 单词 anxiety 的例句||||Tom's anxiety to succeed led him to work hard. 汤姆对成功的渴望使他更加努力。||||He received the news of his father's sickness with great anxiety. 他得知父亲生病的消息时焦急万分。

name: appoint
interpret: vt.任命，指派，委派，分派，分配；给…提供设备
example: 单词 appoint 的例句||||We must appoint a day to meet again. 我们要约定好下次会面的日期。||||Appoint the time and place for the meeting. 决定开会的时间和地点吧。

name: appropriate
interpret: adj.适当的，合适的；v.拨出，挪用，盗用
example: 单词 appropriate 的例句||||It is appropriate that he should get the post. 由他担任这一职务是恰当的。||||We should take appropriate measures to improve our teaching. 我们应当采取适当的措施提高教学质量。

name: desperate
interpret: adj.不顾死活的，危急的，令人绝望的，极渴望的
example: 单词 desperate 的例句||||They made a desperate attempt to save the company. 他们为挽救公司作孤注一掷的努力。||||The city is suffering a desperate shortage of water. 这个城市严重缺水。

name: impact
interpret: n.冲击，碰撞；影响；vt.装紧，压紧
example: 单词 impact 的例句||||The computer had made a great impact on modern life. 计算机对现代生活产生了巨大的影响. ||||How will the war impact on such a poet? 战争对这样一个诗人会产生什么影响？

name: diversity
interpret: n.差异，多样性；vt.使不同，使多样化
example: 单词 diversity 的例句||||Our party believes in encouraging cultural diversity, not diversion. 我们党鼓励多种文化，而不是文化分歧。||||His object is to gather as great a diversity of material as possible. 他的目标就是尽可能多地搜集各种材料。

name: committee
example: 单词 committee 的例句||||We referred the matter back to the Finance Committee. 我们把这事转回给财政委员会处理。||||I am going to speak out against the committee's decision. 我打算直言反对委员会的决定。

name: effectively
example: 单词 effectively 的例句||||This method worked effectively. 这方法很见效。|||| The public should be educated to use resources more effectively. 应该教育大众更有效地使用资源。

name: due
interpret: n.应得物；adj.预定的，应付的，到期的，应有的
example: 单词 due 的例句||||I received nothing except what was due to me. 除了我应得的东西，我并未接受任何东西。||||The rocket is due to lift off at noon on Friday. 火箭定于星期五中午发射。

name: comprehension
example: 单词 comprehension 的例句||||The teacher set the class a comprehension test. 老师对全班同学进行了一次理解力测验。||||The problem is above my comprehension. 这个问题超出我的理解力。

name: honor
interpret: n.光荣；敬意；荣幸；vt.给…以荣誉；尊敬
example: 单词 honor 的例句||||I take your visit as a great honor. 您的来访是我莫大的光荣。||||It is a great honor to receive that prize. 能拿到那个奖是无上的光荣。

name: flesh
example: 单词 flesh 的例句||||A fat man has much more flesh than a thin man. 胖人较瘦人肉多。||||The flesh of the peach was sweet and juicy. 桃子的果肉甜而多汁。

name: flexible
interpret: adj.易曲的，灵活的，柔软的，能变形的，可通融的
example: 单词 flexible 的例句||||We need a foreign policy that is more flexible. 我们需要一种更灵活的外交政策。||||We should stick to the principles and be flexible as well. 我们既要有原则性，也要有灵活性。

name: evaluate
interpret: vt. 评价；估价；求…的值 vi. 评价；估价
example: 单词 evaluate 的例句||||I can't evaluate his ability without seeing his work. 我没有看到他的工作情况，无法评论他的能力。|||| Don't evaluate a person on the basis of appearance. 不要以相貌取人。

name: critic
interpret: n.批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人
example: 单词 critic 的例句||||The critic classed him with the best writers of the age. 评论家把他列入当代第一流的作家的行列之中。|||| He became a fierce critic of the tobacco industry. 他成了烟草业的强烈反对者。

name: heading
interpret: n.上标题，标题，起始字，方向
example: 单词 heading 的例句||||The heading was in large letters. 标题是用大号字母印刷的。||||He realized that he was heading in the wrong direction. 他意识到走错了方向。

name: hurricane
example: 单词 hurricane 的例句||||The hurricane destroyed the whole village. 飓风把整个村子都毁掉了。||||A hurricane struck the city. 飓风袭击了该城市。

name: consideration
interpret: n.考虑，思考；要考虑的事；体谅，关心
example: 单词 consideration 的例句||||John never showed any consideration for his mother's feeling. 约翰从来都不体谅他母亲的感情。|||| We did an overall consideration of the matter at last. 最后我们又对这个问题作了全盘考虑。

name: mountainous
example: 单词 mountainous 的例句||||A mountainous country is one in which there are many mountains. 山国是多山的国家。|||| The Antarctic is a mountainous area. 南极洲是一个多山的地区。

name: mouthful
example: 单词 mouthful 的例句||||He wants to eat it up at a mouthful. 他要一口把它吃掉。||||He scooped up some water with his hands and took a big mouthful. 他捧起水来喝了一大口。

name: react
interpret: vi.起反应，起作用；反抗，起反作用
example: 单词 react 的例句||||She didn't look up or react in any way. 她既不抬头，也没有任何反应。||||How did he react to your suggestion? 他如何对待你的建议？

name: preserve
interpret: vt.保护，保持，保存，保藏；vi.做蜜饯，禁猎；n.蜜饯，果酱，禁猎地，禁区，防护物
example: 单词 preserve 的例句||||What can we do to preserve the company from ruin?  我们怎么做才能保护这家公司不破产？||||It is the duty of the police to preserve public order. 维护公共秩序是警察的职责。

name: sneaker
interpret: n.运动鞋；卑鄙者，鬼鬼祟祟的人
example: 单词 sneaker 的例句||||More likely,their sneaker sponsors are telling them it’s a good business. 更有可能的事他们的运动鞋赞助商告诉他们这是个好买卖。||||They made a business about sneaker. 他们做成了一笔关于运动鞋的生意。

name: tournament
example: 单词 tournament 的例句||||He was the best boxer in the tournament. 他是本届联赛的最佳拳手。|||| The Council resolved that the next tournament should be held in Shanghai. 理事会决定下次比赛在上海举行。

name: vast
interpret: adj.巨大的，庞大的；大量的，巨额的
example: 单词 vast 的例句||||Tom has made a vast improvement in his German. 汤姆的德语有了很大的进步。||||China has a vast territory and a large population. 中国地域辽阔，人口众多。

name: sunburnt
example: 单词 sunburnt 的例句||||Turn over or your back will get sunburnt. 翻过身去，不然你的后背要被阳光灼伤的。||||He got sunburnt during the summer. 他夏天给晒黑了。

name: acre
example: 单词 acre 的例句||||The playground covers over an acre in extent. 操场的面积超过一英亩。||||They measured off a half-acre plot for a house lot. 他们划出一块半英亩的地皮来作房屋地基。

name: approximately
example: 单词 approximately 的例句||||Our English teacher is approximately in her forties. 我们英语老师有40岁模样。||||There are approximately one million people in the city. 全市人口估计大约有一百万。

name: atom
example: 单词 atom 的例句||||For many years the atom was believed to be indivisible. 在过去有很多年原子一直被认为是不可分割的。||||He could not get up an atom of sympathy for her. 他对她激不出一点同情心。

name: narrator
example: 单词 narrator 的例句||||He listens and waits for the narrator to explain more. 他听著，等待讲的人进一步解释。||||The story's narrator is an actress in her late thirties. 故事的叙述者是位年近四十的女演员。

name: bay
interpret: n.海湾，狗吠声，月桂；vt.吠，使走投无路；vi.吠
example: 单词 bay 的例句||||I enjoy the view of the bay in the starlight. 我喜欢星光下的海湾风景。||||Dogs sometimes bay at the moon. 狗有时会朝着月亮吠叫。

name: debt
interpret: n.债务，义务，负债状态，罪，过失
example: 单词 debt 的例句||||The man was pressed to pay off his debt. 那人被逼还债。||||The firm had to charge off the debt as hopeless. 公司只得把那笔没希望要回的债务注销。

name: digest
interpret: vt.消化；领会，领悟，融会贯通；整理，做…的摘要；vi.消化；n.摘要，文摘
example: 单词 digest 的例句||||It often takes a long time to digest new ideas. 吸收新思想往往需要很长一段时间。||||I read only this digest of the novel. 我只读过该小说的摘要。

name: consult
interpret: vi.商讨，商量，协商，会诊；vt.向…请教，查阅，考虑
example: 单词 consult 的例句||||I wish to consult you on a few questions. 我有几个问题向您领教。||||Parents can consult the teachers on children. 家长可以向老师询问孩子们的情况。

name: contrary
interpret: adj.相反的；adv.相反的(地)；n.反面，相反
example: 单词 contrary 的例句||||My sister's taste in dresses is contrary to mine. 在服装方面，我妹妹的爱好和我完全不同。||||The result is contrary to expectation. 结果跟预料恰好相反。

name: flavour
interpret: n.味道；香味；调味料；风趣；特色
example: 单词 flavour 的例句||||The tea has lost its flavour. 茶叶走味了。||||This movie really catches the flavour of New York. 这部影片真正抓住了纽约的特色。

name: issue
interpret: n.出版，发行，（报刊等）期、号，论点，问题，结果， （水，血等的）流出；vt.使流出，放出，发行（钞票等），发布（命令），出版（书等）发给；vi.发行，流出，造成...结果，进行辩护，传下
example: 单词 issue 的例句||||I bought the book the day after its issue. 这书出版后的第一天，我就去买了它。||||I'll support her down the line on that issue. 在那个问题上我将全力支持她。

name: troop
interpret: n.群，组，多数，军队；vi. 群集，结队，成群而行
example: 单词 troop 的例句||||The general has removed the troop to the front. 将军已把这支部队调往前线。||||He came out with a troop of followers. 他带着一大群随从走出来。

name: quake
interpret: vi.颤抖，颤动，震动，发抖；n.地震，颤抖
example: 单词 quake 的例句||||The earth suddenly began to quake. 大地突然摇晃起来。||||The quake was one of the strongest to hit Japan this year. 此次地震是日本今年发生的几次最强烈地震之一。

name: canal
interpret: n.运河；水道；管；沟渠；vt.开运河
example: 单词 canal 的例句||||South America is joined to North America by a canal. 南美洲和北美洲由一条运河连在一起。||||The ship is sailing towards Europe through the Suez Canal. 这条船正通过苏伊士运河驶往欧洲。

name: dusty
interpret: adj.积满灰尘的；无聊的，含糊的，粉末状的
example: 单词 dusty 的例句||||He was pulling dead roots from the dusty earth. 他正在从土中拔出枯死的根茎。||||One spring it was very windy and dusty here. 有一年春天这里风沙很大。

name: extreme
interpret: adj.末端的，尽头的；极度的，极端的；n.极度，最大程度
example: 单词 extreme 的例句||||She lived on the extreme edge of the forest. 她住在森林的最边缘。||||His views are rather extreme. 他的见解相当偏激。

name: frequent
interpret: adj.经常的，频繁的；vt.常到，常去
example: 单词 frequent 的例句||||There are frequent contacts between the peoples of the two countries. 两国人民之间交往频繁。|||| Rains are frequent here in spring. 这儿春季雨很频。

name: guidance
example: 单词 guidance 的例句||||Under his father's guidance, he learned how to swim. 他在父亲的指导下学会了游泳。||||It is hoped you will give us guidance. 请你多加指导。

name: settle
interpret: vi.安家；定居；停留；vt.使定居；安排；解决
example: 单词 settle 的例句||||I have to settle my affairs before leaving here. 离开这儿以前，我得把一些私人的事情安排妥当。||||She has decided how she should settle the matter. 她已做出决定如何来了解这件事。

name: source
example: 单词 source 的例句||||They mentioned you as a good source of information. 他们说你消息灵通。||||All works of art have life as their source. 一切文艺创作都来源于生活。

name: violence
interpret: n.暴力，暴虐，暴行，猛烈，强烈，强暴
example: 单词 violence 的例句||||It was an absolutely senseless act of violence. 这是毫无意义的暴力行为。||||They attacked with violence. 他们猛烈攻击。

name: voyage
interpret: n.航行，航海，航程，旅行，航空；vi./vt.航海，航行；渡过，飞过
example: 单词 voyage 的例句||||Life is compared to a voyage. 人生好比航海。|||| The December weather favoured our voyage. 12月的天气使我们的航行顺利。

name: adaptation
interpret: n.改编，适应，改编成的作品
example: 单词 adaptation 的例句||||This process is known as adaptation. 这个过程即所谓适应。||||The book described the adaptation of desert species to the hot conditions. 这本书描绘了沙漠物种对炎热环境的适应。

name: ape
example: 单词 ape 的例句||||Man has evolved from the ape. 人是从类人猿进化而来的。||||We can't ape the Japanese system. 我们不能完全仿效日本的体系。

name: associate
interpret: vt.使发生联系，使联合；把…联想起来；vi.交往，结交；n.合伙人，同事；adj.副的
example: 单词 associate 的例句||||I always associate that song with my visit to Hawaii. 听到那支歌我就会联想到我的夏威夷之行。||||I don't associate the two ideas. 这两个概念我联系不起来。

name: backyard
example: 单词 backyard 的例句||||I parked the car in the backyard. 我把汽车停在后院。||||The residents didn't want a new factory in their backyard. 居民不希望在他们住地附近建新工厂。

name: barbershop
example: 单词 barbershop 的例句||||For nearly two hours, I waited my turn at the barbershop. 我在理发店(排队)等了差不多两个小时。||||I have run into him in the barbershop there. 我在理发馆那儿遇到了他。

name: dingo
example: 单词 dingo 的例句||||The dingo is a wild dog of Australia. 澳洲野狗是澳大利亚的一种野狗. ||||The purpose of the fence is to keep out a kind of wild dog a Dingo. 篱笆的作用在于防御一种叫“澳洲犬”的野狗。

name: disgusting
interpret: adj.令人作呕的，可憎恶的，讨厌的
example: 单词 disgusting 的例句||||What a disgusting smell! 多么讨厌的气味！|||| The mosquito is the disgusting thing. 蚊子是讨厌的东西。

name: downward
example: 单词 downward 的例句||||All apples on apple trees are downward. 苹果树上的所有苹果都是向下的。||||Downward movement is much faster than upward one. 向下移动比向上移动快得多。

name: burden
interpret: n.负担，重载，担子，责任；vt.装货于，麻烦，使负担
example: 单词 burden 的例句||||The burden fell on the eldest son. 担子落在了长子身上。||||Too much praise is a burden. 太多的赞扬是一种负担。

name: widespread
interpret: adj.广布的，普及的，流传宽广的
example: 单词 widespread 的例句||||Plastic is in widespread use. 塑料已被广泛地使用。||||English is a widespread language. 英语是一种很普及的语言。

name: accomplish
example: 单词 accomplish 的例句||||He can accomplish more in a day than any other boy in his class. 他一天所完成的工作比他班上其他的孩子都多。||||They'll certainly accomplish something. 他们会搞出名堂来的。

name: acquire
example: 单词 acquire 的例句||||We should try to acquire good habits. 我们应该努力养成良好的习惯。||||We must work hard to acquire a good knowledge of English. 我们必须用功学习才能精通英语。

name: admirable
interpret: adj.可钦佩的，优良的，令人惊奇的
example: 单词 admirable 的例句||||His behaviour is always admirable. 他的行为很令人钦佩。||||The soldiers showed admirable bravery. 士兵们表现出了令人钦佩的勇敢。

name: ankle
example: 单词 ankle 的例句||||She twisted her ankle when she fell. 她摔倒时扭伤了脚踝。||||She turned her ankle while ice-skating. 她滑冰时扭伤了脚踝。

name: architecture
interpret: n.建筑学，建筑术；建筑物；组织，结构
example: 单词 architecture 的例句||||I'm interested in classical architecture. 我喜爱古典建筑风格。||||She studied architecture and art history at the university. 她在大学里学习建筑和艺术史。

name: assignment
example: 单词 assignment 的例句||||His assignment was to follow the spy. 分配给他的工作是跟踪这个间谍。||||He has got a new assignment. 他得到一项新任命。

name: backward
example: 单词 backward 的例句||||Because of his long illness, Tom is backward in his studies. 因为汤姆长期生病，所以在学习中成绩落后。||||The rainy season is backward this year. 今年雨季来得晚。

name: sceptical
example: 单词 sceptical 的例句||||He takes a rather sceptical view of love and romance. 他对爱情和浪漫持非常怀疑的态度。||||The public remain sceptical of this claims. 公众对这一说法仍持怀疑态度。

name: colleague
example: 单词 colleague 的例句||||He is a colleague of mine. 他是我的同事。||||The professor paid a return visit to his American colleague. 教授回访了他的美国同事。

name: ecology
example: 单词 ecology 的例句||||To keep ecology in balance is our duty. 保持生态平衡是我们的职责。||||She is an expert on the ecology of wetlands. 她是一个湿地生态学方面的专家。

name: communism
interpret: n.共产主义；Communism:共产主义学说，共产主义制度
example: 单词 communism 的例句||||Lei Feng devoted himself to the cause of communism. 雷锋把一生献给了共产主义事业。|||| Communism is based on Marxism. 共产主义是以马克思主义为基础。

name: complex
interpret: adj.复杂的，合成的，综合的；n.联合体
example: 单词 complex 的例句||||What he said was too complex for me to understand. 他说的太复杂了，我无法了解。||||Justice is part of the complex machinery of the law. 正义是复杂的法律机器的一部分。

name: conclude
interpret: vt.结束时说；（经推理）相信；达成；vi.结束，终结
example: 单词 conclude 的例句||||From the evidence I must conclude that you are wrong. 从证据看，我敢断定你错了。||||I would like to conclude with a few points. 我想用几点来做个结论。

name: enquiry
example: 单词 enquiry 的例句||||A major enquiry is underway after the death of a union official. 工会的一名官员死亡之后，大范围的调查已经开始。||||I want to make an enquiry about train times. 我想打听一下火车的时刻。

name: conflict
interpret: n.冲突，矛盾，争执；vi.争执，撞斗，冲突，抵触
example: 单词 conflict 的例句||||Your statement is in conflict with the rest of the evidence. 你的陈述同其余证据有矛盾。||||The conflict between them seems ceaseless. 他们之间冲突似乎没个止息。

name: constant
interpret: n.常数，恒量；adj.不变的，一定的，时常的
example: 单词 constant 的例句||||This suit has been in constant wear for two years. 这一套衣服已连续穿了两年。||||An absolute constant is fixed and can not be changed. 绝对常数是固定而不可以改变的。

name: furnished
example: 单词 furnished 的例句||||The room was furnished with a cupboard and some old furniture. 房间里有一个碗柜和几件旧家具。|||| They furnished their house with red carpets. 他们用红地毯装饰了他们的房子。

name: constantly
example: 单词 constantly 的例句||||The two countries have been warring constantly for years. 这两国多年来一直交战。||||We should constantly urge ourselves on to study hard. 我们要经常鞭策自己努力学习。

name: contribute
interpret: vt.有助于，捐助，投稿；vi.出力，捐献，投稿
example: 单词 contribute 的例句||||The rich will be asked to contribute money, the strong to contribute labour. 有钱出钱，有力出力。||||The three sons also contribute to the family business. 这3个儿子也为家族事业做出了贡献。

name: inject
example: 单词 inject 的例句||||We hope to inject new life into our work. 我们希望给我们的工作注入新的活力。||||He needs to inject himself once a month. 他需要每月为自己打一针。

name: masterpiece
example: 单词 masterpiece 的例句||||This book is a real masterpiece. 这本书是真正的名著。|||| Robinson Crusoe is Defoe's masterpiece. 《罗宾逊漂流记》是笛福的杰作。

name: mentally
example: 单词 mentally 的例句||||He was out of sorts physically, as well as disordered mentally. 他浑身不舒服，心绪也很乱。||||Male nurses are often employed in hospitals for the mentally ill. 精神病院常雇用男护士护理精神病人。

name: oppose
example: 单词 oppose 的例句||||The government called on the workers to oppose waste. 政府号召工人反对浪费。||||The old man can't bear anyone in the family to oppose him. 这位老人决不能容忍家里有人违抗他。

name: permanent
example: 单词 permanent 的例句||||The coat gives permanent protection against heavy rain. 这种防雨衣经久耐用。||||It's difficult to find a permanent cure for this disease. 这病很难除根。

name: soda
example: 单词 soda 的例句||||She doesn't enjoy drinking chocolate soda. 她不喜欢喝巧克力汽水。||||I will freshen your drink with more soda and ice cubes. 我给你的饮料重加一些苏打水和冰块。

name: possession
interpret: n.拥有，具有，占有，控制；所有物，所有权，财产；着魔，着迷
example: 单词 possession 的例句||||According to facts in my possession he can't possibly be guilty. 根据我所掌握的事实，他是不可能有罪的。||||The land is in the possession of the merchant. 这块地为该商人所有。

name: scholar
interpret: n.学者，公费生，有文化者，学习者
example: 单词 scholar 的例句||||There was no doubt that he was a fine scholar. 毫无疑问，他是位杰出的学者。||||To be a scholar is to be the top of society. 万般皆下品，惟有读书高。

name: reputation
example: 单词 reputation 的例句||||We are very anxious to keep up the reputation of the firm. 我们对于保持公司的名誉非常急切。||||He has not too good a reputation in the matter of honesty. 就诚实而言，他的名声不太好。

name: prejudice
interpret: n.偏见，成见；损害，侵害；vt.使…抱偏见；损害，不利于
example: 单词 prejudice 的例句||||Prejudice is a social disease. 偏见是一种社会弊病。||||He continued to smoke, to the prejudice of his health. 他继续吸烟，这不利于他的健康。

name: ridiculous
example: 单词 ridiculous 的例句||||It is simply ridiculous to attempt such a thing. 试图干这种事，简直可笑。||||It's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard in my life. 这是我有生以来听到的最为荒唐可笑的事。

name: sorrow
example: 单词 sorrow 的例句||||It helps to share your sorrow with someone else. 向他人诉说你的痛苦对你是有益的。||||I think she did it more in sorrow than in anger. 我觉得她这样做更多是出于悲哀而不是愤恨。

name: thunderstorm
example: 单词 thunderstorm 的例句||||Thunderstorm is common in summer. 雷电交加的暴风雨在夏天很常见。||||The thunderstorm will perhaps settle the weather. 大雷雨可能使天气稳定下来。

name: unconscious
interpret: adj.失去知觉的，不省人事的；无意识的，不知不觉的
example: 单词 unconscious 的例句||||She was unconscious but her heart was still beating. 她已经不省人事，但脉搏还在跳。||||He was unconscious of his mistake. 他没意识到自已的错误。

name: unfit
interpret: adj.不适当的，不胜任的，不健全的；vt.使不相宜，使不合格
example: 单词 unfit 的例句||||He is physically unfit for this kind of work. 他干这种工作身体不行。||||You look very unfit. 你看上去体格不佳。

name: tremble
interpret: n.战栗，颤抖；vi.战栗，忧虑，微动
example: 单词 tremble 的例句||||There was a tremble in her voice. 她声音颤抖。|||| I tremble for your safety. 我担忧你的安全。

name: trend
interpret: n.趋势，倾向，方位；vi.倾向，转向
example: 单词 trend 的例句||||Today's trend is toward less formal clothing. 眼下时尚趋向于穿着随便。||||The trend of prices is still upwards. 物价的趋向是仍在上涨。

name: visual
interpret: adj.视力的，视觉的，观看的，直观的，看得见的，光学的
example: 单词 visual 的例句||||The film is a visual art. 电影是一种视觉艺术。|||| His designs have a strong visual appeal. 他的设计在视觉上很有感染力。

name: steady
interpret: adj.稳定的，不动摇的，沉着的，稳固的，坚定的，可靠的；vt.使稳定
example: 单词 steady 的例句||||She has a steady income. 她有固定的收入。||||He is a steady young man. 他是一个稳重的年轻人。

name: strengthen
interpret: vt.加强，变坚固；vi.变强，股票上涨
example: 单词 strengthen 的例句||||We must strengthen our unity in the face of powerful enemies. 大敌当前，我们必须加强团结。|||| You wish to strengthen our forces in the south? 你想要加强我们在南部的势力?

name: workmate
example: 单词 workmate 的例句||||We have considered him to be the best workmate. 我们一直认为他是我们最好的同事。||||Her workmate is ill and she has to do double work. 她的同事病了，她必须做双倍的工作。

name: chairwoman
example: 单词 chairwoman 的例句||||The new chairwoman was very well-spoken. 新上任的女主席很会说话。||||She was pleased at being chosen chairwoman. 她被选为主席很高兴。

name: carbon
example: 单词 carbon 的例句||||Diamonds are pure carbon. 钻石是纯净的碳。|||| Carbon is an element, while carbon dioxide is a compound. 碳是一种(化学)元素，而二氧化碳则是一种化合物。

name: chant
interpret: n.有节奏的一再重复的话语；圣歌，赞美诗
example: 单词 chant 的例句||||Let's chant the sweetness of may with our songs. 让我们用歌声来吟唱五月的甜美。||||The chant of the crowd was "Work for all". 群众反复有节奏地呼喊的是“给大家工作”。

name: clone
example: 单词 clone 的例句||||The first clone farm has appeared in New Zealand. 第一家克隆农场在新西兰出现。||||A clone is identical with the original animal or plant. 克隆物与母本动物或植物完全相同。

name: disobey
example: 单词 disobey 的例句||||Soldiers must never disobey. 军人必须服从。||||I recommend you not to disobey your officers. 我劝你不要不服从你的长官。

name: environmental
example: 单词 environmental 的例句||||A global environmental meeting is going to be held here. 一个全球环境会议将在这里举行。||||We need to cure our environmental problems. 我们需要解决环境问题。

name: headset
example: 单词 headset 的例句||||How can I listen to this headset? 我怎么用这个耳机？||||Put on your headset and adjust the microphone. 将耳机戴上，并调整麦克风位置。

name: orally
example: 单词 orally 的例句||||Not to be taken orally! 不可入口！||||All candidates must first be orally examined. 所有的考生必须先参加口试。

name: preview
example: 单词 preview 的例句||||He had gone to see the preview of a play. 他去看一场戏剧的预演了。||||We saw a preview of the new movie. 我们看了一部新电影的试映。

name: rapidly
example: 单词 rapidly 的例句||||The company has grown rapidly in the last five years. 这家公司近五年来迅速地发展壮大。||||Ice changes into water rapidly on a hot day. 天气炎热的时候，冰很快就化为水。

name: puzzled
example: 单词 puzzled 的例句||||The student was puzzled about what to do next. 这个学生对下一步做什么伤透了脑筋。||||I was somewhat puzzled at his unwillingness to help. 他不愿意帮忙让我有点困惑。

name: rag
example: 单词 rag 的例句||||It looked like a piece of rag. 它看上去像块破布。||||It's just an old rag I had in the closet. 这只不过是我挂在壁橱里的旧衣服罢了。

name: battlefield
example: 单词 battlefield 的例句||||Her son died on the battlefield. 她儿子死在了战场上。||||The battlefield flowed with rivers of blood. 战场上血流成河。

name: diploma
example: 单词 diploma 的例句||||She won her diploma in only three years. 她仅用三年时间就取得了毕业文凭。||||She worked hard to earn her music diploma. 她刻苦用功，以求获得音乐学位证书。

name: peak
interpret: n.山峰，巅，山顶，顶点，尖峰，帽舌；adj.最高的，最大值的；vi.到达最高点，消瘦，变憔悴，逐渐缩小；vt.使竖起，使达到最高点
example: 单词 peak 的例句||||Traffic reaches a peak between 8 and 9 in the morning. 早晨八九点钟是交通的高峰时刻。||||He was the first to top the mountain peak. 他是第一个登上这座山峰的人。

name: revolution
interpret: n.革命，大变革；旋转；周期，循环
example: 单词 revolution 的例句||||The earth makes a yearly revolution around the sun. 地球每年绕太阳一周。||||This volume records the history of the country's revolution. 这卷书记载了这个国家的革命历史。

name: portrait
example: 单词 portrait 的例句||||There is a portrait of King Charles on the wall. 墙上挂着查尔斯国王的画像。||||She painted a beautiful portrait for us. 她为我们画了一幅漂亮的肖像。

name: madame
example: 单词 madame 的例句||||Madame Curie was the only famous woman scientist in the world. 居里夫人是世界上唯一有名的女科学家。|||| Radium is discovered by Madame Curie. 镭是由居里夫人发现的。

name: realise
example: 单词 realise 的例句||||Wish you realise your dreams as early as possible! 祝愿您早日实现自己的梦想！||||How much did you realise on the house? 这所房子你们出售后赚了多少钱？

name: factor
interpret: n.因素；要素；因子；因数；系数
example: 单词 factor 的例句||||Her previous experience in social work is a plus factor. 她先前在社会工作方面的经验是一个有利因素。|||| Poor organization was certainly a contributory factor to the crisis. 组织不善肯定是导致危机的因素之一。

name: garment
example: 单词 garment 的例句||||Every garment in the shop has a price mark sewn on it. 店里每一件衣服都缝有价签。||||She wore a shapeless knitted garment. 她穿着一件很没形的针织外套。

name: greengrocer
example: 单词 greengrocer 的例句||||I must go to the greengrocer's. 我还得到蔬菜水果店去一下。||||The greengrocer unloaded the potatoes from the van. 蔬菜水果商把土豆从车上卸下来。

name: hive
interpret: n.蜂房，闹区，蜜蜂群；vi.进入蜂房，储藏蜜于蜂房，如蜂般群居；vt.使进蜂房
example: 单词 hive 的例句||||The hive is made of wood. 这蜂箱是用木材做的。|||| The whole hive was busy. 整个蜂群都在忙碌。

name: honeycomb
example: 单词 honeycomb 的例句||||He built a special hive, containing only one honeycomb. 他特制了一个只有一个蜂窝的蜂箱。||||Bees store honey in the cells of the honeycomb. 蜜蜂把蜂蜜储藏在蜂巢里。

name: islander
example: 单词 islander 的例句||||What will we learn from islander? 我们从岛民身上可以学到什么呢？||||Islander points to inhabitant of an island. 岛民是指岛屿上的居民。

name: nevertheless
example: 单词 nevertheless 的例句||||The news may be unexpected, nevertheless,it is true. 这消息可能是出乎意料的，然而是真实的。||||We are going nevertheless we shall return. 我们要走了，不过我们还要回来。

name: noble
interpret: n.贵族；adj.高贵的，高尚的，贵族的，辉煌的
example: 单词 noble 的例句||||He is a noble man, we all admire him. 他是一个道德高尚的人，我们都敬佩他。||||Niagara falls is a noble sight. 尼亚加拉瀑布是一壮观的景色。

name: novelist
example: 单词 novelist 的例句||||He is really a fruitful novelist. 他真是一位多产的小说家。||||A good novelist needs great power of conception. 一个好的小说家需要丰富的想象力。

name: merely
example: 单词 merely 的例句||||Your scheme is merely a castle in the air. 你的计划只不过是空中楼阁。||||You merely caused a crash by cutting in on me like that! 你那样超我的车，差一点就撞车了！

name: prayer
interpret: n.祈祷，祈求，请求，恳求；祷文，祷告者，恳求者
example: 单词 prayer 的例句||||We heard the calling of the bells to prayer. 我们听见了召唤祈祷的钟声。||||Everyone in church knelt in prayer. 教堂里每个人都跪着祈祷。

name: receptionist
example: 单词 receptionist 的例句||||The girl is a receptionist of the Beijing Hotel. 这个女孩是北京饭店的前台接待员。|||| Ask the receptionist to put your call through to my room. 让接待员把你的电话接到我房间。

name: regulation
interpret: n.规则，规章；调节，校准；adj.规定的，普通的
example: 单词 regulation 的例句||||He explains this regulation to me word for word. 他逐字逐句地替我解释这项条例。||||This regulation is binding on everybody. 本规则皆须遵守。

name: semicircle
example: 单词 semicircle 的例句||||The village was formed of semicircle huts. 这个村庄是由半圆形的茅舍组成的。|||| They are sitting in a semicircle. 他们围成半圆形坐着。

name: promote
interpret: vt.促进；提升；发起，创立；宣传，推销
example: 单词 promote 的例句||||He was in town to promote his new books. 他在城里推销他的新书。||||Good habits promote longevity. 良好的习惯能增长寿命。

name: shabby
interpret: adj.衣衫褴褛的，不体面的，破旧的，吝啬的，卑鄙的
example: 单词 shabby 的例句||||You look rather shabby in those clothes. 你的衣着显得有点寒酸。||||The old house has grown shabby with age. 那座老房子因年代久远而变得破旧。

name: roundabout
interpret: adj.绕道的，转弯抹角的，间接的
example: 单词 roundabout 的例句||||Last night I got lost, and took a very roundabout way. 昨天夜里走错了路，绕了一个大圈子。|||| What a roundabout way of doing things! 这是个多么绕圈子做事的方法！

name: significance
example: 单词 significance 的例句||||This fact has little significance for us. 这一事实对我们没有什么意义。||||This is a matter of great significance. 这是一个具有重大意义的问题。

name: vain
interpret: adj.徒劳的，徒然的，无效的，空虚的，自负的
example: 单词 vain 的例句||||It was in vain that we tried to find his mother. 我们百般设法找他的母亲，但毫无结果。||||He's very vain of his abilities. 他对于自己的能力很自负。

name: bison
example: 单词 bison 的例句||||American bison are very large. 美洲野牛非常巨大。||||Herds of bison live in the park. 公园内住有成群的野牛。

name: religious
interpret: adj.宗教性的，虔诚的，宗教上的；n.修道士，出家人
example: 单词 religious 的例句||||She is very religious person who goes to church every Sunday. 她十分虔诚，每个星期天都上教堂。||||It is hard for me to reject religious beliefs. 要我抛弃自己的宗教信仰是困难的。

name: permit
interpret: n.许可证，许可，执照；vt.允许，容许；vi.容许
example: 单词 permit 的例句||||The doctor will not permit mother up until her leg is better. 在母亲的腿好些之前,医生不允许她起床。||||The soldiers had orders to permit no stranger through. 士兵们接到命令不许任何陌生人通过。

name: violent
interpret: adj.暴力的，猛烈的，激烈的，极端的，凶暴的，歪曲的
example: 单词 violent 的例句||||The madman was violent and had to be locked up. 这个精神病患者很凶暴，不得不把他锁起来。||||They caught him and gave him a violent beating. 他们抓住了他，把他狠狠打了一顿。

name: weep
interpret: n.哭，哭泣，滴下；vi. 哭泣，流泪，哀悼，滴落；vt.哭着使，悲叹，滴下
example: 单词 weep 的例句||||Don't weep about me. 别为我哭泣。||||Laugh and the world laughs with you, weep and you weep alone. 当你笑时，整个世界同你一起欢笑，当你哭泣时，却只有你一人独自悲哀。

name: attach
interpret: vt. 使依附；贴上；系上；使依恋 vi. 附加；附属；伴随
example: 单词 attach 的例句||||I do not attach much weight to the theory. 我不十分重视这学说。||||I advise you not to attach yourself to the party. 我劝你不要参加这个党。

name: glory
interpret: n.光荣，荣誉；壮丽，辉煌；v.自豪，得意，狂喜
example: 单词 glory 的例句||||I was fascinated by the glory of the sunset. 落日的壮观把我吸引住了。||||Let not the wise man glory in his wisdom. 智者不可夸耀自己智慧。

name: laptop
example: 单词 laptop 的例句||||Laptop is suitable for use on planes. 笔记本电脑适合飞机上使用。||||A laptop would be really useful for when I'm working on the train. 我在火车上工作时，便携式电脑真的很有用。

name: endanger
example: 单词 endanger 的例句||||You will endanger your health if you smoke. 你如果吸烟，就会危及健康。||||You will endanger your health if you work so hard. 如果你工作过度劳累，健康会受到损害。

name: competitor
example: 单词 competitor 的例句||||The first prize was awarded to the youngest competitor. 一等奖授给了最年轻的比赛者。||||After defeat of the new competitor, the prices can rise again. 新的竞争者被击败之后，价格就会重新上升。

name: incident
interpret: n.附带事件，小事件；事件，事变；adj.易发生的；附属的；入射的
example: 单词 incident 的例句||||With the passage of time the incident was forgotten. 随着时间的消逝，那个事件被忘却了。||||The incident had left him visibly angry and upset. 那起事件显然让他既恼火又心烦。

name: inspect
interpret: vt.检查；视察；查看；检阅；vi.检查
example: 单词 inspect 的例句||||The mayor will inspect our school tomorrow. 市长明天要来视察我们学校。||||The captain wants to inspect your kit. 船长想检查你的行装。

name: laughter
example: 单词 laughter 的例句||||I don't know how my story caused so much laughter. 我不知我的故事怎么引起如此大笑。||||The audience gave way to uncontrollable bursts of laughter. 听众忍不住发出一阵阵笑声。

name: mercy
example: 单词 mercy 的例句||||Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people. 对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍。||||It is a mercy that you did not go. 你幸好没有去。

name: sensitive
interpret: adj.敏感的，灵敏的，过敏的，感光的
example: 单词 sensitive 的例句||||He's very sensitive about his ugly appearance. 他对自己丑陋的外貌很敏感。||||It's difficult to avoid stepping on her sensitive feelings. 很难不伤害她脆弱的情感。

name: rely
example: 单词 rely 的例句||||I rely upon you to finish the work on time. 我相信你会准时完成这项工作的。||||You should rely on your own efforts. 你应该靠自己的努力。

name: similarity
example: 单词 similarity 的例句||||There were points of similarity between them. 他们之间有某些相似之处。||||There was a wonderful similarity between the twins. 这对孪生儿相像得惊人。

name: simplify
example: 单词 simplify 的例句||||That will simplify my task. 那可简化我的工作。|||| Try to simplify your explanation for the children. 你给孩子们讲解要设法讲得简单明了。

name: reunite
interpret: vt. 使重聚；使再结合；使再联合 vi. 重聚；再结合；再联合
example: 单词 reunite 的例句||||She is trying her best to reunite with her father. 她想方设法与父亲团聚。||||Traditionally, Chinese New Year is a time for families to reunite. 传统上，中国新年是家人围聚的时光。

name: universal
interpret: adj.宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的，一般的；通用的，万能的
example: 单词 universal 的例句||||First of all we should make primary education universal. 首先我们应普及初等教育。|||| Climate change is a universal problem. 气候变化是个世界性的问题。

name: virus
interpret: n.病毒，滤过性微生物，毒害，恶毒；（一个能够复制、感染其他程序或破坏操作系统的程序）
example: 单词 virus 的例句||||He is suffering from a virus infection. 他受到病毒感染。||||There is a virus going round the world. 世界上流行着一种病毒性疾病。

name: currency
example: 单词 currency 的例句||||How much foreign currency do you take when you go abroad? 你出国时带多少外币？||||The dollar has been revalued against all world currency. 美元对所有国际货币比，做了重新调整。

name: infection
example: 单词 infection 的例句||||He is suffering from a virus infection. 他受到病毒感染。||||White blood cells fight infection. 白血球抵抗感染。

name: instant
interpret: adj.紧迫的；立即的；本月的；已配制好的时刻；瞬息，霎时
example: 单词 instant 的例句||||If you don't leave this instant, I will scream. 你要是不马上离开，我就喊了。||||It all happened in an instant. 这一切都发生在一刹那间。

name: interviewee
example: 单词 interviewee 的例句||||What should we ask the next interviewee? 我们应怎样要求下一位受访者？||||The success depends on good rapport between interviewer and interviewee. 成功取决于采访者与被采访者之间的良好沟通。

name: optimistic
interpret: adj.乐观的，乐观主义的，乐天的
example: 单词 optimistic 的例句||||She is not optimistic about the outcome. 她对结果并不乐观。||||I have this image of you as always being cheerful and optimistic. 你留给我的印象总是快活和乐观。

name: outbreak
interpret: n.(疾病的)发作，(战争等的)爆发
example: 单词 outbreak 的例句||||At the outbreak of the war he lived in London. 战争爆发时他住在伦敦。||||Experts fear that there will be new outbreak of the disease. 专家们担心这种疾病会再度流行。

name: physician
example: 单词 physician 的例句||||He is under the care of a physician. 他正接受一位内科医生的治疗。||||A physician was called in. 医生请来了。

name: representative
interpret: n.代表，众议员，典型；adj.描写的，表现的，代理的，代表性的，代议制的，典型的
example: 单词 representative 的例句||||He is a representative for a large steel company. 他是一家大型钢铁公司的代理人。||||We have a representative sample. 我们有一个代表性的样品。

name: scheme
interpret: n.安排，配置，计划，阴谋，方案，图解，摘要；v.计划，设计，图谋，策划
example: 单词 scheme 的例句||||The scheme seems on the surface to be quite practical. 这个方案表面上看来似乎很实际。||||The scheme was a bad egg. 计划失败了。

name: severe
interpret: adj.严格的，凶猛的，严肃的，严重的，严厉的，朴素的
example: 单词 severe 的例句||||The severe storm did for most of the crops. 猛烈的暴风雨毁掉了大部分庄稼。||||The pace was too severe to be kept up for long. 跟上这步伐太难了，无法持久。

name: symptom
example: 单词 symptom 的例句||||The crime rate is a symptom of social unrest. 犯罪率是社会不安定的征兆。|||| Fever is a symptom of many illnesses. 发烧是许多疾病的征兆。

name: astonish
example: 单词 astonish 的例句||||My news will astonish you. 我的消息会让你感到十分惊讶的。||||The decision makes everybody feels astonish. 决定使大家都感到震动。

name: astonishing
example: 单词 astonishing 的例句||||The new houses have been built with astonishing speed. 这些房子的修建速度快得惊人。||||I find it quite astonishing that none of you liked the play. 我感到惊讶的是你们谁都不喜欢那个剧。

name: bacteria
example: 单词 bacteria 的例句||||Bacteria are invisible to the naked eye. 细菌是肉眼看不见的。||||The biology of bacteria can be quite hard to understand. 细菌生物学有时会很难理解。

name: welfare
example: 单词 welfare 的例句||||They are concerned about my welfare. 他们关心我的健康。||||Patrick works for social welfare. 帕特里克为社会福利工作。

name: carpenter
example: 单词 carpenter 的例句||||I have a complete set of carpenter's tools. 我有全套的木工工具。||||He worked in a carpenter's shop. 他在一家木工厂工作。

name: decade
example: 单词 decade 的例句||||Prices have risen steadily during the past decade. 过去的十年间，物价一直在上涨。||||The century has rounded into its ninth decade. 本世纪已进入了90年代。

name: defence
example: 单词 defence 的例句||||The lawyer produced a clever defence of his client. 律师机智地为委托人辩护。||||We must see that there is no gap in our defence. 我们必须确保我们的防御没有漏洞。

name: considerate
interpret: adj.考虑周到的；体谅的，替…着想的
example: 单词 considerate 的例句||||It was very considerate of you to send me a postcard. 你想得真周到，寄给我明信片。||||He is always considerate to old people. 他对老人一向体贴入微。

name: equip
example: 单词 equip 的例句||||Your education will equip you to earn a good living. 你所受的教育会使你过上富裕的生活。||||We equip our children with a good education. 我们使孩子们受到良好的教育。

name: property
interpret: n.财产，所有物，所有权，性质，特性，（小）道具
example: 单词 property 的例句||||He has made over his property to a hospital. 他已将财产转交给了一家医院。||||Oil has the property of floating on water. 油有浮在水上的特性。

name: rider
example: 单词 rider 的例句||||The rider forced his horse on through the storm. 骑手在暴风雨中策马前进。||||The jury added a rider to their verdict recommending mercy. 陪审团在裁决后加了一条建议宽恕的附文。

name: storage
interpret: n.存储器，储藏，保管，库存，仓库
example: 单词 storage 的例句||||How much will you have to pay the warehouse for storage? 你得付多少仓库保管费？||||He is charging a storage battery. 他在为蓄电池充电。

name: surgeon
interpret: n.外科医生，军医，船上的医生
example: 单词 surgeon 的例句||||His injuries were not such as to need a surgeon. 他的伤还不是那种需要外科医生治的伤。||||The surgeon is now operating. 外科医生正在做手术。

name: unemployment
example: 单词 unemployment 的例句||||The government will look into how to reduce unemployment. 政府将研究如何降低失业率。||||He gave a talk on the theme of teenage unemployment. 他就青少年失业的主题作了一次报告。

name: unrest
interpret: n.不安的状态，动荡的局面
example: 单词 unrest 的例句||||People are predicting civil unrest in the area. 人们预言该地区将发生动乱。||||There was a faint feeling of unrest at the table. 餐桌上稍微有一种不安的气氛。

name: alternative
interpret: n.两者挑一的，可供选择的；adj.选择性的，二中择一的
example: 单词 alternative 的例句||||There was no alternative for them to vote in favor. 他们别无选择，只有投票赞成。||||She had no alternative but to ask for a few days'leave. 实在不得已，她只好请几天假。

name: analysis
example: 单词 analysis 的例句||||He made a very thorough analysis on the situation. 他对形势的分析很透彻。||||Analysis showed that water was present in the mixture. 分析的结果表明混合物中含有水。

name: via
example: 单词 via 的例句||||The news reached me via my aunt. 那消息是通过我婶婶转告我的。||||The ticket reads to Beijing via Shanghai. 车票上写明经上海到北京。

name: category
example: 单词 category 的例句||||These questions may be included in the same category. 这些问题可以归入一类。||||Class the books in this category. 按目录把书分类。

name: chin
interpret: n.下巴，下颚，不气馁，不灰心
example: 单词 chin 的例句||||You've got some egg on your chin. 你的下巴上沾着一点鸡蛋。||||He hurried on with his shaving, cutting his chin twice. 他急急忙忙地剃胡子，把下巴割破了两次。

name: engage
interpret: vt.使从事于，使忙着；使订婚；雇用，聘；接合，啮合；vi. 从事于，参加
example: 单词 engage 的例句||||I have no time to engage in the debate. 我没时间参加辩论。||||It is difficult to engage teachers of quality. 很难招聘到优秀教师。

name: equality
interpret: n.等同性，同等，平等，相等，等式
example: 单词 equality 的例句||||They are fighting for the equality of women. 她们在为争取男女平等而奋斗。||||Women must battle on until they have gained equality. 妇女必须坚奋战到底，直至取得平等权利。

name: fairness
interpret: n.公平，正直，美好，明亮，清晰，适当，顺利性
example: 单词 fairness 的例句||||Their reputation for fairness is a matter for pride. 他们公正的名声令他们引以为豪。|||| Her sunburnt skin accentuates the fairness of her hair. 她那晒黑了的皮肤突出了她的一头金发。

name: conscious
interpret: adj.有意识的，自觉的；有意识的，神志清醒的
example: 单词 conscious 的例句||||I was not conscious of having made a mistake. 我没意识到犯了错误。||||He is badly hurt but still conscious. 他伤得很重，不过神志还清醒。

name: exploration
example: 单词 exploration 的例句||||Their team will undertake exploration for oil. 他们队将着手进行石油勘探工作。||||This book is descriptive of a scientific exploration. 这本书是描写科学探险的。

name: genetics
example: 单词 genetics 的例句||||He gave me a piece of advice on how to learn genetics. 他就如何学好遗传学给我提出了一条建议。|||| Population genetics owes its origin to Francis Galton. 人体遗传学的创立应归功于弗朗西斯·高尔顿。

name: contract
interpret: n.合同，契约，婚约；v.使缩短，感染，订约
example: 单词 contract 的例句||||The terms of the contract are acceptable to us. 我们认为这个合同的条件可以接受。||||I'm under contract to teach here for one year. 我按照聘约要在这里教一年书。

name: fulfillment
example: 单词 fulfillment 的例句||||After many years, his plans have come to fulfillment. 很多年之后，他的计划实现了。||||He was willing to face any hardship in fulfillment of his duty. 他愿意面对任何困难去履行他的职责。

name: critical
interpret: adj.批评的，评论的；危急的，紧要的；临界的
example: 单词 critical 的例句||||We are at a critical time in history. 我们正处在历史的危急时刻。||||Now that the situation becomes critical, one must keep calm. 事到临头，要沉住气。

name: proverb
interpret: n.谚语，格言，箴言；vt.使成为谚语，用谚语表达
example: 单词 proverb 的例句||||As the proverb goes, time is money. 俗语说，时间就是金钱。||||"Practice makes perfect." is a proverb.”熟能生巧” 是一句谚语。

name: tobacco
example: 单词 tobacco 的例句||||Tobacco is considered by some to be an evil. 烟草被有些人认为是一种祸害. ||||A large amount of money is spent on tobacco every year. 每年在烟草上花去大量的钱。

name: twist
interpret: n.一扭，扭曲，曲折，歪曲，螺旋状，手法；vt.拧，扭曲，捻，编织，使扭转，缠绕，盘绕
example: 单词 twist 的例句||||Too much force will twist the key. 用力过猛会把钥匙扭弯。|||| Pull the wire tight and then twist the ends round. 把金属线拉紧，然后把两头捻紧。

name: sow
interpret: n.母猪；vt.播种，散布，使密布；vi.播种
example: 单词 sow 的例句||||It is too soon to sow yet. 现在还不到播种的时候。|||| Let's sow our field with spring wheat. 让我们在田里种春小麦吧。

name: apologise
example: 单词 apologise 的例句||||You forgot to apologise. 你忘记道歉了。||||I must apologise that if I offended you I didn't mean to. 我必须向您道歉，如果冒犯了您，我不是有意的。

name: cast
example: 单词 cast 的例句||||You can cast your vote at the local polling station. 你可以在当地的投票站投票。|||| He cast off fear and decided to make a try. 他去掉害怕心理，决定试一试。

name: resource
example: 单词 resource 的例句||||All pollution is simply an unused resource. 所有的污染只不过是一种未被利用的资源。||||He is full of resource in any emergency. 他富有随机应变的才能。

name: unfold
example: 单词 unfold 的例句||||The facts started to unfold before them. 真相开始在他们面前显露出来。||||Buds unfold in the sunshine. 花蕾在阳光下开放。

name: delay
interpret: vi. 延期；耽搁 vt. 延期；耽搁 n. 延期；耽搁；被耽搁或推迟的时间
example: 单词 delay 的例句||||The strike caused a great delay in the delivery of the mail. 这次罢工严重地延误了邮件的投递。|||| I couldn't judge whether the delay was good or bad. 我不能断定这样延迟是好还是坏。

name: socialism
interpret: n.社会主义，社会主义运动
example: 单词 socialism 的例句||||At present, China is still on the initial stage of socialism. 现在，中国仍然处在社会主义的初级阶段。|||| Scientific socialism originated in the middle of the nineteenth century. 科学社会主义创始于19世纪中叶。

name: starvation
example: 单词 starvation 的例句||||Disease often follows on starvation because the body is weakened. 疾病的产生往往是由于饥饿的缘故，因为身体很虚弱。||||The animals had died of starvation. 动物因饥饿而死亡。

name: insert
interpret: vt.插入，镶补；vi.附着；n.插入，插入物
example: 单词 insert 的例句||||I wish to insert an advertisement in your newspaper. 我想在贵报上登一则广告。||||The newspaper had an insert of pages of pictures. 该报带有数页插图。

name: courtyard
example: 单词 courtyard 的例句||||Tell children to go and play in the courtyard. 叫孩子们到院子里耍去。||||This passage leads into the courtyard. 这条路通向院子。

name: strait
interpret: n.海峡，困难；adj.困难的，窘迫的，狭窄的
example: 单词 strait 的例句||||The sea narrows into a strait. 海变窄形成海峡。|||| The ship passed through the strait between two islands. 船从两岛之间的海峡穿过。

name: disappointment
interpret: n.失望，挫折；令人失望的事
example: 单词 disappointment 的例句||||The disappointment was cruel. 失望是令人痛苦的。|||| She couldn't hide her disappointment. 她无法掩饰自己失望的情绪。

name: current
interpret: n.涌流，趋势，电流，水流，气流；adj.当前的，通用的，流通的，现在的，草写的，最近的
example: 单词 current 的例句||||Electric current is often powerful enough to kill a man. 电流常强得足以致命。|||| There is a story about her in the current number. 最近一期上有关于她的故事。

name: challenging
interpret: adj.大胆的(复杂的，有前途的，挑战的)；n.复杂(有前途，大胆，挑战)
example: 单词 challenging 的例句||||She performed the most challenging task without a mistake. 她毫无差错地完成了这一最富有挑战性的任务。|||| We have changed the course to make it more challenging. 我们改了课程以使其更具挑战性。

name: originally
interpret: adv.本来，原来，最初，就起源而论，独创地
example: 单词 originally 的例句||||Originally I didn't want to go. 我本意不想去。|||| After much discussion they settled on the plan originally proposed. 他们讨论了很久，然后确定了原来提出的那个计划。

name: publicly
example: 单词 publicly 的例句||||Extra shares of common will be sold publicly. 额外的普通股份将公开出售。|||| He acknowledged publicly that he might have made a mistake. 他当众承认自己可能犯了个错误。

name: Venice
example: 单词 Venice 的例句||||Venice is one of the great tourist attractions of the world. 威尼斯是世界上令人向往的旅游胜地之一。|||| Venice is celebrated for its beautiful buildings. 威尼斯以美丽的建筑而闻名。

name: lifelike
interpret: adj.栩栩如生的，逼真的，酷象实物的
example: 单词 lifelike 的例句||||The mask was so lifelike it was quite frightening. 该面具非常逼真以至看起来有点恐怖。||||The horse he painted is very lifelike. 他画的马很传神。

name: media
interpret: n.(medium的复数)媒体，新闻媒介，传播媒介
example: 单词 media 的例句||||The local media reported rioting across the country. 当地媒体报道了全国范围的骚乱。||||His latest movie is being hyped up by the media. 他新近的电影正被媒体大肆炒作。

name: passion
interpret: n.热爱，强烈的感情，热情，耶稣的受难
example: 单词 passion 的例句||||He had a passion for music. 他酷爱音乐。||||In his passion, he tore the letter into pieces. 在盛怒之下，他把那封信撕得粉碎。

name: radioactivity
example: 单词 radioactivity 的例句||||Radioactivity is a special quality of radium. 放射性是镭的一种特性。|||| The soil contains 30 times the acceptable level of radioactivity. 这片土壤受到了高于标准30倍的辐射。

name: seashell
example: 单词 seashell 的例句||||He gave us a big seashell as a gift. 他给了我们一个大贝壳作为礼物。||||I'm making you another seashell necklace. 我再给你做一条贝壳项链。

name: reform
interpret: n.改革，改正，感化；vt.改革，改过，革新，改善，重新组成；vi.革新，改过，重组
example: 单词 reform 的例句||||All their efforts at reform have been set back. 他们所有的改革努力都遭受到挫折。|||| Frankly speaking, I'm not opposed to reform. 坦率地说，我不反对改革。

name: pulse
example: 单词 pulse 的例句||||His pulse is low, but his heart is still active. 他脉搏很弱,但心脏还跳着。|||| The patient's pulse quickened. 病人的脉搏加快了。

name: spiritual
interpret: adj.精神上的，神圣的，崇高的，高尚的，鬼的，招魂论的&n.有关教会的事
example: 单词 spiritual 的例句||||His spiritual nature is good. 他心灵本质上是善良的。 |||| Their friendship was strictly spiritual. 他们的友情完全是精神上的。

name: undertake
interpret: vt.从事，保证，承担，同意，接受
example: 单词 undertake 的例句||||I can undertake that you will enjoy the play. 我保证你会喜欢这个剧。||||I want you to undertake all the responsibility. 我要你承担所有的责任。

name: sustainable
interpret: adj.足可支撑的，养得起的，可以忍受的
example: 单词 sustainable 的例句||||What is sustainable economic development? 什么是可持续的经济发展？||||Our capability for sustainable development was enhanced. 我们可持续发展能力增强。

name: self-determination
example: 单词 self-determination 的例句||||Women have gained the right of self-determination in marriage. 中国妇女获得了婚姻自主权。||||Is armed struggle the only way to achieve self-determination? 武装斗争是达到民族自决的唯一途径吗？

name: self-improvement
example: 单词 self-improvement 的例句||||Reading is meantime a process of self-study and self-improvement. 同时，阅读又是一种自主学习、自我提高的过程。||||Only through self-improvement can one be respected by others. 只有自强，才能受到别人的尊重。

name: calorie
interpret: n.热卡，热量单位，卡路里，卡，卡路里
example: 单词 calorie 的例句||||The unit of heat energy commonly used in physics is the calorie. 在物理学中，热能单位一般用卡表示。|||| High calorie food was excepted from the menu since last year. 从去年开始，高卡路里食物就被从菜单上去掉了。

name: cattle
example: 单词 cattle 的例句||||He has twenty head of cattle on the farm. 他在农场养了20头牛。||||On big farms cattle are usually stamped with brands. 在大农场，牲畜通常是打烙印的。

name: burial
example: 单词 burial 的例句||||The priest prepared the body for burial. 牧师给死者作安葬准备。|||| The Premier's burial was a solemn occasion. 总理的葬礼是个庄严的场面。

name: labor
interpret: n.劳动，努力，工作，劳工；分娩；vi.劳动，努力，苦干；vt.详细分析；麻烦
example: 单词 labor 的例句||||We are never late in satisfying him for his labor. 我们从不延误付给他劳动报酬。||||He was completely spent after two weeks of hard labor. 艰苦劳动两周后，他已经疲惫不堪了。

name: handshake
example: 单词 handshake 的例句||||He welcomed me back with a smile and a handshake. 他微笑着和我握手，欢迎我归来。||||Fawcett gave me a hearty handshake. 福西特和我亲切地握了握手。

name: hardship
example: 单词 hardship 的例句||||He was willing to face any hardship in fulfillment of his duty. 他愿意面对任何困难去履行他的职责。||||If other people can endure hardship,why can't I? 人家能吃苦，我就不能？

name: hilly
interpret: adj.多丘陵的，多山岗的，险峻的
example: 单词 hilly 的例句||||This flower grows on a hilly area. 这种花生长在山地上。||||Our area is a hilly area surrounded on three sides by mountains. 我们这儿是一个山区，三面都是大山。

name: irrigation
example: 单词 irrigation 的例句||||Irrigation is easy in the South because of the abundance of water. 南方多水，利于灌溉。|||| Irrigation is important for farming. 灌溉对农业是非常重要的。

name: botany
example: 单词 botany 的例句||||He studied botany at university. 他在大学学习植物学。||||To what degree are you interested in botany? 你对植物学的兴趣达到什么程度？

name: breakthrough
example: 单词 breakthrough 的例句||||The discovery is nothing less than a breakthrough. 这个发现无疑是个突破。||||He made his major scientific breakthrough. 他在科学上取得突破性的进展。

name: constitution
interpret: n.宪法；体格，体质；构成，构造，组成
example: 单词 constitution 的例句||||He was responsible for the constitution of a new committee. 他负责组成一个新的委员会。||||The constitution guards the liberty of people. 宪法保障人民的自由。

name: depression
interpret: n.压抑，抑制，沮丧；萧条，衰退
example: 单词 depression 的例句||||During a depression money circulates slowly. 在商业萧条时期，货币流通滞缓。||||He suffers from acute depression. 他患有严重的忧郁症。

name: element
interpret: n.元素；组成部分，成分；零件，元件
example: 单词 element 的例句||||Justice is an important element of good government. 公正是仁政的要素。||||Carbon is an element, while carbon dioxide is a compound. 碳是一种(化学)元素，而二氧化碳则是一种化合物。

name: discrimination
example: 单词 discrimination 的例句||||He spoke out against racial discrimination. 他声言反对种族歧视。||||These robots are capable of shape discrimination. 这些机器人能辨别形状。

name: distinction
interpret: n.差别，区别；特性，特征；卓著，荣誉
example: 单词 distinction 的例句||||There is a nice distinction between the two words. 这两个词有细微的区别。||||I can't see any distinction between these two cases. 我看不出这两个案例有什么不同。

name: downhill
interpret: adj.下坡的，倾斜的；adv.往下，每况愈下
example: 单词 downhill 的例句||||Is Western society going downhill? 西方社会是在走下坡路吗？||||This restaurant has definitely gone downhill since I last came here. 从我上次来过之后，这家餐馆越来越糟。

name: evolution
example: 单词 evolution 的例句||||A cultural and social evolution now becomes rapid. 现在文化和社会发展很快。||||It has passed through an interesting procedure of evolution. 它经过了一个有趣的进化过程。

name: funeral
interpret: n.丧葬，葬礼；adj.丧葬的，出殡的
example: 单词 funeral 的例句||||Her bright clothes were not appropriate for a funeral. 她那身鲜艳的衣服不适合参加葬礼。||||A funeral is a somber occasion. 葬礼是个忧郁的场合。

name: participant
interpret: n.参加者，参与者，比赛的人
example: 单词 participant 的例句||||He is an active participant in the civil rights movement. 他是人权运动的积极参加者。||||Man himself is a participant in this environment. 人类本身是其环境的参与者。

name: merciful
example: 单词 merciful 的例句||||The merciful king saved him from death. 宽大的国王免他一死。|||| He is accounted a merciful man. 人们认为他是一个宽厚的人。

name: patent
interpret: n.专利权，执照，专利品；adj.专利的，显著的，新奇的；vt.取得…的专利权
example: 单词 patent 的例句||||Try some of this new patent medicine. 试试这一种新的专利药品吧。||||It is patent to all that this is a good chance. 大家都明白这是一个好机会。

name: prairie
example: 单词 prairie 的例句||||A single spark can start a prairie fire. 星星之火，可以燎原。||||The vast prairie stretches west to the horizon. 茫茫大草原向西伸展,直至天边。

name: resist
example: 单词 resist 的例句||||It is vain to resist. 抵抗是没用的。|||| I couldn't resist telling him the secret. 我忍不住把那个秘密告诉了他。

name: motivate
interpret: vt.给与动机，刺激，提高…的学习欲望，促动
example: 单词 motivate 的例句||||You have first got to motivate the children and then to teach them. 你首先得激发孩子的学习兴趣，然后再去教他们。||||Use the salary tool to motivate and manage the workers. 利用薪资工具对员工进行激励和管理。

name: racial
interpret: adj.种族的；种族间的；由种族引起的
example: 单词 racial 的例句||||We should have racial pride. 我们应该有种族优越感。|||| He spoke out against racial discrimination. 他声言反对种族歧视。

name: regardless
interpret: adj.不留心的，不注意的；不管，不顾；adv.无论如何，不管怎样
example: 单词 regardless 的例句||||I protested, but she carried on regardless. 我极力反对，但她仍一意孤行。||||I shall go regardless of the weather. 无论天气好坏我都要去。

name: separation
example: 单词 separation 的例句||||After a long separation, they held a glad meeting. 阔别多年之后，他们举行了一个令人愉快的聚会。|||| Separation from his friends made him sad. 与朋友们分离使他伤心。

name: spear
example: 单词 spear 的例句||||He thrust her with a spear. 他用矛刺她。||||It's more like a spear than anything else. 它比别的东西来更象矛。
